tretaẏā yugare tumbhe madhyabhmabane hoiba abatāra | 197 |

lg.note: īśvaraṁka pāuṁśa medi puruṣeka jāta kari |–ka, kha, ga, gha

lg.l: nāma hoiba tumbhara ye karṇṇa arajuna | 201 |
se brahma daitā āditye dileka śrīpati | 203 |
puṇa dvāpara yuge ādityara bīryye upujilā karṇṇa
tohora bīryye hāde jāta hoilā arjuna | 206 |
yugateṇa bāsaba aṭai ẏe tohora bīryya
se se dhanañjaẏe tohora aṭai ātmaja | 209 |
ābara biśeṣa se janama mānuṣīra garbhe
teṇu se nibongātakapaca tāra hāthe pāiba prābhabe | 210 |
ẏemanta sandeśa kiṁpā na kaha hāde mote | 211 |
br̥haspati boile tu āmbhanta na pachāru
arjuna yeuṇa dinuṁ jāta ye hoilā
sehinuṁ nibongātakapaca svrge dhāḍi ye na dilā | 213 |
tohora mr̥tubheda nikaṭa ye hoilā yukate | 214 |
śutrara bacana śuṇi ghuñchiṇa ye thilā
ẏehikṣaṇi caḷa tu puṣyeka ratha gheni | 216 |
puṣyaka ratha gheni mātaḷi bāsabara āgyāṁ pramāṇe
kahani śāhāsra kathā śukabrahmā pothi gheni | 219 |
ki abā bijaẏe kale debarāja svāmī | 223 |

lg.note: sehinu nibongāta amaraku dhāḍi debāra rahilā |–gha, jha

lg.l: yebaṇa arthe muhiṁ tohora tahiṁki āgata | 225 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile pitāra kisa āgyāṁ
pitāra āgyāṁẏe amara bhmabanaku yāa dhanurjaẏe | 228 |
bhīmasena boilā deba arjuna bāsabe bibādī
khāṇḍaba bana dahi agni debatākaiṁ dilāka mauṣadhi | 229 |
na puṇa bāsaba kapaṭa karanti gatadoṣa rāge | 230 |
byāse boile śuṇa ho mantrī cūḍamaṇi sahadeba
amara bhmabanaku arjuna yiba ki na yiba | 231 |
caurāśi beḷe pariyante bāseba tāku hāri | 233 |
brahmā indra candra sūryya kehi nohile tāku yuddhe sari
apār bele svarga nelāni jura kari
teṇu kari indra pāile bahuta aprāṁjaẏe
ājara beḷa aṇatiriśa daṇḍaṭhāre amaraku dhāḍi deba

div.note: ājara dina tiriśa daṇḍaṭhāre amaraku dhāḍideba | ja, ḍha, tha, ta
(aṇachāḷiśa, uṇeiśa daṇḍa prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntara madhya acchi |)

lg.l: bālamīke boile tohora jībana sādha re sahadeba
arjuna gale nibongātakapaca kemante badha hoiba | 237 |
nibongāta badha hoi arjuna ṭhākuraṁka hāthara | 238 |
bara māga boli bolanti arkadatya bidāraṇa
rudra ādidebatāhiṁ nohibe mote raṇe sari
indra candra pabana kubera yama ādi kari | 241 |
jala sthaḷa anaḷa pabane muṁ nohibi prāne nāśa
astu prāpata hou boli boile chāẏāra biḷāsa | 242 |
nibongātakapaca boilā mora pure na paśiba bāta
teṇu kari mora nāma hoiba nibongāta | 243 |
asaṁkhyā bara māgilu re kaḷebara sañchi | 244 |
jāta hoileṇa ye abaśya hoai mr̥tu
ẏehā kimpāi re manare na kalu tattu | 245 |
nibongāta boilā nātha kahila yebe mote
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara jiṇibi indrara sahite | 246 |
mama prāṇa bisarjana hoibāka deba teṇe | 247 |

div.note: tāhāra mr̥tyubheda acchi nice pārthaṁkara hāthara |–ṭha, na
ẏehā kiṁpe bichāra na karu dāneba duṣṭa he tu |–ṭa, ca
ẏe kiṁpe maṇi nuārilu duṣṭa tattu |–ḍha, jha, ṅa

lg.l: chāri debatāẏe ẏeka hoi manuṣye hebe jāta
ẏekamūrtti ta nohanti ẏe chāri debatā | 249 |
tiniyuge dhāḍidila amare caurāśi beḷa pariyante | 250 |
byāse boile bahana yāa yā phālaguni | 252 |
nibongātakapaca badhakara boli boile dharmarāja svāmī | 253 |
puṣyeka rathe bijaẏe pātha māhīnda yogabeḷe | 254 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna boliṇa samasteheṁ bhāṣi
tāḍa toḍara ye bāhuṭi saraḷa jagadaḷā
bida mudi kacaṭi hr̥dare aṣṭaratna māḷā | 257 |
bābu amara maṇḍaḷaku hāde nibongāta bāhilā | 267 |
arjuna boilā ho loḍu abā kisa
bāhā bege ratha tuho asura baḷa pāśa | 268 |
mātaḷi boilā āga draśana karibā ākhaṇḍaḷa
jaẏamāḷa ābharaṇa kariṇa se jiṇaiṁ daitā | 270 |
arjuna boile amarādhinātha hāde mora pitā
mote tu na kaha mātaḷi se jaẏamāḷāra kathā | 271 |

div.note: “mātaḷi boilā bāsaba tohora pitā”
mātaḷi boilā se maghabāna tohora pitā
tāhāku kahi se sāṁgrāmaku kara ho gamitā |
arjuna śuṇi kari ye bolai bacana
śuṇa ho mātaḷi tumbhe ẏethira bidhāna |
tumbhe ye kahila jaẏemāḷā kathā
jaẏemāḷā thāuṁ asuraku kiṁpe hārai suranāthā |

lg.l: se jaẏamāḷā thāi yebe bāsaba hr̥dagatā
ẏebe nibongātakapacaku badhakari yibaiṁ pitā tahiṁ
tebe se jaẏamāḷā mote deuntu surasāiṁ | 273 |
svāmī nibongātakapaca badha nimante arjuna bijekale | 277 |
svāmī nibongātakapaca dhāḍi dilā amara svargaku
debadatta śaṅkha phurai ghana ghana bāṇī
asura baḷa biṣāda hoile tāhā śuṇi | 279 |
kisa śabada śubhilā śaṁka lāgilā mora mati | 280 |
śutra boile rājā hr̥daẏe mora biṣāda
sañchaẏa asureśvara ho āja tote paḍilā pramāda | 281 |
mr̥tu nikaṭa hoilā rājā bahana hoi ẏethuṁ paḷā | 282 |
brahmā biṣṇu rudra indra candra yama pabana ye sūryya
caurāśi beḷa muṁ amarakaiṁ dilaiṁ dhāḍi
indra paḷāilā amara āṇili jara kari | 285 |
ke mote samāna achaiṁ ẏe rabitaḷe
śutra boile ye tohora sahodra chāribhāi
kumbhīrī kinnarī baka hiḍimbaka māilāka sehi | 287 |
ẏebe se nicaẏe tote paḍilā paramāda | 290 |
mantrīra bacane bolai se nibongātakapaca rāẏe
mānaba mātrake mora acchi kisa bhaẏe | 291 |
kāhāku na hārili muṁ birañchi nārāẏaṇa parasāde
tu mahāpaṇḍita mote ẏemanta buddhi na de | 292 |
tohora buddhi baḷeṇa āmbhe śatr̥ku jiṇimuṁ| 293 |
bāhā rahubara re mohora sainibaḷa aneka | 294 |
rājāra āgyāṁẏe se amanātya bīra yodhī
rahile dakṣiṇa mūrati deba śasra sanddha | 295 |

div.note: kāhāku na hārili muṁ birañchi nārāẏaṇa parasāde
aneka pratagyāṁ karai se kr̥tānta

lg.l: mātaḷi boilā ẏeṭi damana baḷa trailokya nirodhi | 297 |
tu kemante ẏehāṁku bināśa kara ho suta kontī | 298 |
arjuna boile mane kicchihiṁ na bhāḷa
tuho mātaḷi rathare nithara hoi thāa
bāhāsi rahubara mane śaṁkā tu na pāa | 300 |
dhanure guṇa dei ṭaṁkāra karai phālaguni
bindhanti kauṇopa baḷa kareṇa śasra gheni | 302 |
ẏekā rathīki beḍhile pāñchamarbhuta ye rathī
ghāẏe na ghuñchanti asura baḷa sanya | 306 |

div.note: tu kemante ẏehānta yujhibu suta kontī |–jha, ṭa
nithara = niṣkampa = na thari |
gāṇḍima dhanure śara pūroi āmañchi |–ṅa, jha
ẏekā dhanubongāṇe asurabaḷa ghoṭi |–ka, ca, cha, ṇa, na, kha, ṭha

lg.l: aneka śabada ye śubhai abheda cahaḷa | 308 |
samasta chedana karai pāṭha ẏekāśara ghāte | 310 |
lāghaba śasre yahuṁ nuārile bīre jiṇi
hāboḍā śareka ye māilā bīra pātha
sehimati praẏe diśanti asura teja anargaḷi | 316 |

div.note: samara sambhabonge ye śubhai mahāgoḷa |–jha, ka, ca
aneka sanyaku ẏekā bindhai phālagunye |–ka
mātha chedana prāẏe arjuna śaraghāte |–cha, ṇa, na
śate śate nārāja bindhanti nācai kabandha (kobandha) |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: pañchu marbhmata yoddhā ye śate śate luhā bāṇa
tinibhmabana diga hāde na diśai kicchi | 319 |
ẏe mahāyuddhaku se aṭai muhiṁ raha | 320 |
dekha dekha samara mohora parātrama kathā
ātreṣiṇa arjuna ye kare dhaile gāṇḍima dhanu
pañchamarbhmata yoddhaṁku nārāja pūroi binddhalā bāsabara tanu | 322 |
dekhi praśaṁsā kale asura baḷa saini
sādhu re pāṇḍabā jībana tohora dhani | 324 |
āho caitana yesaneka gaganu paḍanti nakṣatra panti
juḷu juḷu pokda yehne niśāẏe bihaḍanti | 326 |
tāhā dekhi arjuna nārāja kalā dhāti | 327 |
nabasāgara asura sanya chedilā tiraṇa pramāna jāṇi | 328 |

div.note: raha = samartha
puṇa nidrāgha bāṇa pūroile danuja

lg.l: sādhu sādhu arjuna boli śubhilā ākaśe | 329 |
debaṁka bhmabane ye śubhilā jaẏe jaẏe
puṇa nabalakṣa śara binddhalā bāsabara tanu
chedi pakāilā se asuraṁkara sabong dhanu | 336 |
puṇa āreka dhanu dhaile bīre hāthe | 337 |
ātreṣiṇa binddhalā ye nārāja lakṣa tini | 338 |
lakṣe yoddhāṁku hoilā daśalakṣa nārāja br̥ṣṭi | 340 |
praśu nārāja ye bindhilā pārtha kope | 342 |
āgiāṇi thāṭheṇa se bīre caḷuṇa achanti | 345 |
asura baḷa bhaṅgāṇa dekhiṇa bīra beni
re re kāre uṭhile se lakṣeka yoddhā gheni | 346 |
re re mānabā re āja pūrilā tora kāḷa
gāreḍi na jāṇi re kāḷasarpa saṅge kalu khaḍīāḷa | 348 |
re re mānabā tu kebaṇa kuḷe jāẏā
tiraṇa pramāṇe re kāṭibu tora kāẏā | 349 |
re re mānabā tora sumara pitāmātā
re re mānabā sumara to iṣṭadebatā | 350 |
mātaḷi boilā bābu ẏe kaṭāḷileṭi bahuta
arjuna boilā tu na jāṇuki pitāmaha ẏe mote samaste śrikāḷa yūtha | 351 |
ākāśa ghenileṭi ẏe beni ye daita | 352 |
meru samāne baḷabantā ẏe aṭanti beni bīre
ẏe se dahija kale bābu svargapure | 353 |

div.note: ẏe se dahija kale bābu mañcha sargapua |–tha, ka, ta, jha, cha

lg.l: śārddoḷa bāhāne ye garjanti bīra beni
gaja yūthakaiṁ ki bhaẏe karai keśarī
dusaha pratagyāṁ pātha baḍhilā kahuṁ kahuṁ
bāhā mora rahubara bhaẏe na kara kicchi | 359 |
dekha dekha svāmī mora bīraśūra paṇa
dusaha pratagyāṁ yahuṁ karai bīra phālaguni
lakṣe yoddhāṁku binddhalā nārāja lakṣa tini | 361 |
bajraghāta prāẏe ye abheda sehnā phuṭi

div.note: nāgabaḷa dekhi bhaẏe karai ki khaga ari | pāṭhāntara
sehi śira cchedana hoile bāsebira śaraghāte | jha, ḍa

lg.l: amarapura rakṣākalā tora putra ye arajana | 366 |
amaragaṇanta gheni airābata piṭhire bijaẏe suradebā | 369 |
aho mahāmantrī muṁ sāṁgrāmakaim kali bije
śutra boile mohora bola na kalu mahārāje | 374 |
āho baḷī tuleṇa muṁ yebe satyayuge thili
aneka yantra mantra ye bidyānta śikhāili | 375 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa se samasta brahmāṇḍa jiṇantā | 376 |
dāna debā beḷe muṁ bārili rājāku
kiñchita kari dāna na debā bābana paṇḍāku | 378 |
kaṭākṣiṇa bāmana boilā śutra tu ho baḍa manda aṭu
mohora bola na kari baḷī saṁpoḍe nāśagalā | 380 |
tu mohora bacana na kalu nibongāta
yāa yā śutra tuho rahithāsi mohora pacha | 382 |
deba dānaba mānaba jiṇite muhiṁ sāmarathā
sapata brahmāṇḍe camaka paḍai yāhāra kathā | 383 |
mr̥tu āgata kariṇa hoilāka rāẏe dvandī | 384 |
mātaḷi boilā bābu śuṇa tu sabongsācī
arjuna boilā tāta tu hoithāa sāṣṭama
āgiāṇi thāṭha re re kāra ḍāka dei
lakṣepura kari arjunaku bedhile bīre yāiṁ | 390 |
kakaḍā māsa br̥ṣṭi prāẏe śara baraṣile caudiśe | 391 |
puṇa hāboḍā śareka kalā bīra br̥ṣṭa
ratha dhanu chedana yahuṁ hoilā samare
dui dui gadā bulāi dhāmanti asure | 394 |
āho caitana keśa khāṁkara urddhvakapāḷa batranetrā
romeke śate śate paḍilā yāiṁ bāṇa
kāmyeka śara gheniṇa arjuna puṇa binddha
tuleṇa yoddhā tāra ye chanti pāñchalakṣa | 402 |

div.note: paḍile danujabaḷa māḍiṇa daśaguṇa pāṭhāntara
asuraṁkara śaramāna pakāilā chedi |–apapāṭha
pāñcha koṭi, koṭi koṭi, saturi koṭi prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntara acchi |
tuleṇa yoddhā tāra chanti pañcha ye mebaccha |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: re re kāra kariṇa se ḍākilā daita | 403 |
baḷānika madhupiṅgaḷa bāhu subāhu ẏe beni | 407 |
gaganā pabanā śoṣaṇā kṣepaṇā senāpatiṁkara nāma
jaẏatu madhusūdana tuhi se mote sākṣī | 410 |
mahāpaṇḍita nātha tu tohora bidyā mahākhaḷā | 421 |

div.note: jūrasena, moṭā, kāḷa, ghoṭā, bāga, nāga, bidhibāna,

lg.l: bedamantra bidyāguru tu sādhanā siddha guru | 414 |
ẏe durāntaka baḷa dhvaṁsibi svāmī tohora parasāde | 415 |
bidyāguru droṇa ye mama hr̥de bhāṣi | 416 |
se guru prasanne muṁ sādhili sabongbidyā
tuhi se gañjilu nātha kṣatrīṁkara darpamāna | 418 |
ẏekabiṁśa bāra tuhi nichatra kalu pr̥thī | 419 |
bīra nāma deba na thoilu saṁsāra bhitare | 421 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsaku nāśakara pāśuṁ bañchā | 423 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
caturtha khaṇḍa mahābhāratha āraṇyaka pabong rīti | 424 |

div.note: akāḷa akāma tu puruṣa sabongsañchā |–ka, ṇa

lg.l: pabongtā śahasra gheni se binddhalā durāpāta | 427 |
arjuna rakha rakha boli boile svargabāsī | 429 |
mahateja bikāśilā se bajra ye śakati | 431 |
sehi bajra śakati arjuna peṣilā ātreṣi
dekhiṇa nibongātakapaca hā hā kāra śadda(?) kalā
sādhu re mānabā boli aneka praśaṁsilā | 434 |
ātroṣi ghoṭilā se arjuna puṣyeka ratha | 347 |
pañchabiṁśa nārāja ye arjuna bege sanddha
nidrāgha baḷa nārājanta se pakāilā chedi | 438 |
kaustubha nārāja ye dvādaśa munā śakati
yuddhare na jiṇile ẏe yāiṭi leuṭi | 445 |
atiẏa baḷabantā ẏe na paḷāi nibongāta | 446 |
na puṇa āmbhanta ẏe bandhana karai kapaṭa | 447 |
jaḷaphāśi gheni arjuna ratha bānddhalā mahābaḷī | 448 |
bege nibongātakapaca tahiṁki ratha mora bāhā | 449 |
mātaḷi boilā bābu tote kapaṭa kalāka daita
āho anibāraṇa catreka se gheniṇa phālaguni
mudugara paḍante se nibongātakapaca ratha bhāji
kuhuḍi teja phāṭigalā samasta pura diśi | 455 |
muhiṁ ye boili tāta paḷāiba nibongāta
kāḷeṇa lucilā ẏebe karibā keuṇa kr̥tya | 457 |
bābu pātāḷa bhmabanaku nibongātakapaca paḷāuacchi puṇi | 458 |
āre raha raha boli arjuna nibongāta ratha ye ogāḷi | 460 |
āre āre pāmara tohora ẏeḍeka gārimā
bhāñju svargapura tu re debatāṁkara sīmā | 462 |
dhanya re danuja aṭe tohora mahimāṁ
sāṁgrāme jiṇilu indra candra rudra brahmā | 463 |
mote dekhi pāmara re apasari paḷāu ki nimante | 464 |
sāṁgrāma chāḍiṇa tuhi dharma laghuachu puṇi | 465 |
nisata hou kiṁpe re na karu sāṁgrāma | 466 |
kareṇa dhanu dhari āmañche ghana ghana | 467 |
kautuke bañchāi ye pratagyāṁ bīra pātha
puṇa puṇa aneka bāṇa bindhai nibongātakapaca | 469 |
tāhā dekhi meghā śahasreka binddhalā bīra pāthe | 472 |
ātreṣi binddhilā puṇi andhāra ghora śara | 475 |
mahaghora andhakāre na diśai kicchi aṅga | 476 |
ẏehikṣaṇi durānteka puṇa kariba kapaṭa bhāba | 477 |
ẏeṇe ye kapaṭa kalā asura mahārathī | 478 |
khaṇḍa khaṇa kari nāgaphāśa bandhana bege pakāilā kāṭi | 481 |
āho candracūḍa nārājeka ye binddhalā phālaguni
andhāra phiṭilā ye diśilā bhmabana tini | 484 |
bege tu datyaku māra paṇḍura nandane | 487 |
mātaḷiki boilā tu bāhā mora yāna | 489 |
arjunahiṁ binddhalā nārāja lakṣa ye pandara | 493 |

div.note: ākāśara bāṇī śuṇiṇa arajuna |–ḍha, jha, ka, ta, tha, ḍa, gha

lg.l: anibongāraṇa śara paḍi bhedilā asuraṁka bajrasehna | 494 |
debadatta śaṅkha arjuna kalāka ghana ghana bādya | 495 |
ābara tuleṇa achai tāhāra nausahasra ratha | 497 |
pātāḷa svargaru bāhāra ye hoilā daita ari
nibongātara chāmuku bege ratha mora bāha | 499 |
kehi paśantā nāhiṁṭi se bhmabana bhitare | 501 |
ajaẏe gaḍa kāhārabeḷe jaẏa nayāiṭi śuṇa phālagunye | 502 |

div.note: yadyapi rudra indra candra pabane |–ḍa, ḍha, ṭha
aniryāpa śara paḍi bhedilā asuraṁka bajrasehnā |–na, ṭa, ka, ḍa
pabana śare tāhā dhanurjaẏe chedi | ṭha, ṭa
daitaari–daitaśreṣṭha |

lg.l: mātaḷiki boilā ratha mora bāhā nibogātakapaca yahiṁ acchi | 504 |
mātaḷi boilā tāku kāhiṁ bheṭiba pārthiba
ẏehikṣaṇi nibongātapaca hiraṇyagarbha pure ye paśiba | 505 |
nibongāta ratha bāhai se lohatīkṣa sārathi
śarapīḍāẏe ratha hāboḍilā yāi nuārai śūnyagati | 508 |
nibongātakapaca boilā ratha bāhā mora bābu
sārathi boilā āra kāhiṁ tuhi yibu | 509 |
rahi yuddhakara tu ho nuhasi nisata | 510 |
paḍanti nārāja āsi arjuna puṣyaka rathe | 512 |
binopi arjuna ye mātaḷi pāde bandi
gāṇḍime pūroi arjuna ātreṣiṇa śara binddha | 513 |

div.note: śarapīḍāẏe arjuna asuranta kalā bandī |–ṭha, na, jha, ṭa, ṅa, ca

lg.l: ẏekā prahārake paḍile asura tini sahasra śata
dekhiṇa birasa ye asura bīra nātha | 515 |
bege tā chedai śara bindhiṇa kirīṭī | 516 |
rāgeṇa arjana bīra kalā śara br̥ṣṭa
hr̥de śara paḍi chaichāḍe galā phuṭi | 517 |
hr̥de bājiṇa kāhāra piṭhikatiki galā gaḷi | 518 |
rahi rahi yuddhakara nuhasi re nisata
tiraṇarāśi parāẏe hoi uḍile asura saini | 522 |
caurāśi lakṣa juṇa āẏatana yebaṇa svarga bhmabana
śareṇa śarapīḍā tāhā kalāka bīra arjuna | 524 |
benitāḷa uccharga bahaḷa hoilā śara chāẏeṇī
asaṁkhya agocara hoilā yāhā śrabane na śuṇi | 525 |

div.note: ẏekā prahārake paḍile datya sahasra tini | (pāṭhāntara)

lg.l: sanyabaḷa saṁge tāra kehi nāhiṁ sākhā
āho pabana bighāte hāde uḍile asurabaḷa saini
ẏekā dhāiṁ rākṣasa kare bajrakoṭhāra gheni | 527 |
arjuna upare bege piṭai kopa bhari | 528 |
āho caitana tripura badha hara kale yebaṇa śare
biṣṇura teja śara agnira teja phaḷa
tini debatāṁkara teja ẏe hoichanti bāṇa

div.note: pañchabhmabana pātha nirodhilā ẏekā |–ṭa, ḍa, ṭa, jha, ja
“ẏekā dhāiṁ rākṣasa kare bajrakoṭhāra gheni”
bulāiṇa koṭhāra pabana ghāta kari
arjuna uparaku dhāmaiṁ bega kari |
baiṣṇabī catra peśilā paṇḍura dulāḷa
nibongāta karu chedilā koṭhāra triśūḷa |
gāṇḍimare pūroiṇa paśupatra śara
peśante na bhedilā se datyara śarīra |
biṣṇura teja śara rudraṁkara teja phaḷa |–kha, ṇa, na, ḍha
mahātejabanta śara ẏe aṭai anibāraṇa |–ka, jha, kha, tha, cha

lg.l: āho caitana se debaśahasra aṭai śata pabongtahuṁ garu
trailokya kampilā śara ādhāna karum karuṁ | 534 |
rome rome rodhira bāhāra hoilā kaṇṭi
rodhireṇa tripaṇḍa ye hoilā tāra kāẏe

div.note: yesaneke indra karai jaḷabr̥ṣṭi |–ñja, ta
toṣe gandhabonge karāile kaṇaẏa srāhāna |–ta, ca, ka, ḍa, tha, ñja, cha, gha, ja

div.head: {@arjuna nibongātakapacaku badha karithibāru

lg.l: parimaḷa bhmabana ye bārasvatī pura jāṇi
aneka bhmabanuṁ bhala bhala padārtha thilā āṇi | 3 |
yama boile ẏe maṇi thile na paḍibaṭi pramāda
śaśadhara debatā dile āṇi amr̥tākṣa maṇi
arjuna hr̥dagate ābharaṇa kale tāhā āṇi | 8 |
ẏehmā thile jārā roga byādhire nohai bikḷi | 9 |
aṇaicchā kale bābu na paḍai mr̥tu | 10 |
ẏe maṇi hr̥de thile bhutabhabiṣa kathā jāṇa | 11 |
ẏe maṇi thile bābu meṇṭai akāḷa akāma | 12 |
bahuta ratna gheniṇa debatāẏe kale pūjā
amara bhmabane arjunakiṁ gheni bijaẏe biḍojā | 13 |
bhārathe bhāroi malla arjuna acchi koḷe
aneka ratna gheni pūjā karai ākhaṇḍaḷe | 15 |
marddaḷa tāḷa kaṁsāḷa kāma kāhāḷa bidhāne | 16 |
dhi dhi kāra śabade ye gaṇikāẏe nāṭa

div.note: madana mādana ye abheda bheda nr̥tye
dhi dhi kāra śabadeṇa śoṇitākṣa nāṭa

lg.l: beṇu bīṇā baiṁśī āu śaraguṇā adhāṭi
upāẏeṇa samāgama se gīta rase khaṭi | 21 |
kokiḷa dhuni susvare madhura kari bhāṣi | 26 |
susvara svare madanikā biṣama śare khaṭi | 27 |
madanikā tilottamā mohanikā kāmaśeṇī ẏe aṣṭa nāẏikā | 28 |
amara svarga sabhāre āsi samaste ubhāri | 29 |

div.note: ḍhaḷiṇa apakṣarīẏe nr̥tyaraṅge bhaṅgī |–ca, cha
jhama jhama pādagati nācanti tribhaṅgī |–kha, ṇa, na
madhura mr̥dura se nr̥tyagīre rasi
bāṇī rasa binode khaṭanti abaḷā |–jha, cha, ca, jha, ja, ca
bīṇā baiṁśī śabade khaṭanti abaḷā |–ṭa, ṭha, ñja, tha, ta

lg.l: dekhiṇa biḷāsuṇī ye paḍile madana bhoḷe | 32 |
mānaba tanu dhari ki mañche utapanna | 33 |
jaḷasthaḷa anaḷe deba dānabe nāhiṁ śaṁkā | 35 |
uttāuḷa rase mitāhāsya rase gīta gāi
bāsaba boile bābu tohora parāẏe suta
arjunara śire ābharaṇa kale indra mukuṭa kirīṭī | 39 |
madana śare acetana ye hoile amara biḷāsuṇī
kiraṭī mukuṭa bānddha kirīṭī dile sasrayoni | 43 |

div.note: uttāuḷi niruta ratiraṅga rasagīta gāi

lg.l: indra debatā boile mora sādhuputra goṭi
nibongātakapacara bhaẏe muhiṁ hoithili baḍa kaṣṭi | 45 |
bābu satyayuge dhāḍidilā caubana beḷa pariyante
ẏebe dvāpare amaraku dhāḍidilā bāra daśa
bābu ẏemante caurāśi beḷa pariyante tiniyuge amaraku dilā dhāḍi
sakaḷa sampada mohora beḷe beḷe niai jura kari | 48 |
tu mohora amara pure thākura putragoṭi
nibongāta bhaẏaru tohora prasāde tarilu sakaḷa ariṣṭi | 49 |
kisa dei nandana re karibi tote pūjā
mānili satya satya yāhā māgu baḷā
svāmī tote yebe bara māgibi maghabāna
āmbhara sahodra hoi driyodhanara maitra hoilāka karṇṇa | 52 |

div.note: “karapatra yoḍi chāmure arjuna kahilā”
svāmī mote yebe bara debu maghabāna
āmbhara sodara aṭe rājā driyodhana |
tāhāra saṅgate ẏebe āmbhara bibādī
sāṁgrāmare yepari hoiba sehu sādhi |
svāmī driyodhana maitra aṭai bīra karṇṇa
āmbhara bhrātha aṭe se kuntīṁka nandana | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: abaśya samara hoiba āmbhara driyodhanara tule
sāṁgrāme hāribu driyodhanaku karṇṇa āmbhara tahiṁki nuāsile | 53 |
karṇṇaratahiṁ acchi abhedakapaca bajrachauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa
ẏe tini padārtha tāhāratahuṁ mote deba ākhaṇḍaḷa | 54 |
indra boilā bābu satya āmbhe kaluṁ
arjuna boilā tāta nice yebe hoiba samara
ẏe kathā śuṇile ye deba karatāra
birañchi nārāẏaṇa yāiṁ kahile karṇṇara āgara | 58 |
bābu karṇṇa re arjuna badhakalā nibongātakapacaku
indra debatā hāde arjanaku satye bara dilā
karṇṇaratahuṁ amr̥takuṇḍala bajrachauṁrī abhedakapaca āṇideba boilā | 60 |
bābu indra āsibaṭi tohora tahiṁki brāhmaṇa rūpa hoi
bajrachauṁrī amr̥takuṇḍaḷa abhedakapaca māgile na debuti tuhi | 61 |

div.note: (pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
ābara biśeṣe sehu āmbhe nohu bhinma |
abaśya samara hoiba driyodhana tule
karṇṇabīra senāpati heba tahiṁ bhale |
bhārate bhāroimalla mahābaḷī karṇṇa
tāku na jiṇile kāhiṁ āmbha subidhāna |
nitānta samara yebe kariba rādheba
tini brahmāṇḍare tāku kehi jiṇantā nohiba |

lg.l: karṇṇa hāstya kale ye ādityaṁka bacane
bho tāta ẏemante se digapāḷa hoiachu śūnye | 62 |
muhiṁ abā tāhā na debi kemante | 63 |
āditya boile muṁ ẏehā tote dili bāḷakāḷe
adhareṇa paśante sahasra baḷa hoiba sāmaratha | 65 |
tāhā thibayāẏeṁ śahasra na bhediba tohora śarīre | 66 |
śarīre acchi ye tohora bajra chauṁrī
bajra śakati paḍile śarīre hoibāka cūri | 67 |
ẏeteka thile tu ye aṭu jagujitā
ẏehā kemante debu nāśa yibuṭi re putā | 68 |
karṇṇa boilā tāta muṁ dāne śūrabantā
śatebhāra subarṇṇa muṁ dāna diai nitipratyā | 69 |

div.note: svāmī digapāḷa hoi ẏemante kahu kehne |–ja, ṭha, ta, ñja
“muhiṁ abā tāhā na debi kemante”
āditya boile muṁ ẏehā tote bāḷakāḷe sneha
karṇṇa boile yāa yā tāta daẏā rakhithāa |
tāhā śuṇi dinakara birasa hoile
markataliṅgeka karṇṇa hāthe bege dile |
ẏehā bhakṣya re putra thāu tora garbhe
pramādamāna na paḍibaṭi tote ẏehā garbhe thile |
sūryyaṁka bacane karṇṇa garbhare rakhile
tahuṁ dinakara nātha bije karigale |

lg.l: sahasre aśvamedha yāga ẏehākaiṁ nohai sari
ẏekābeḷeke dāna debaiṁ indra kaiṁ upara hātha kari | 70 |
āditya boile karṇṇa tu ẏete sampada dānadebu
muṁ yāhā boili tu abaśya nāśayibu | 71 |
karṇṇa boilā tāta muṁ samare jagajja tā
samaraku nisata muṁ nohe jāṇa pitā | 72 |
āditya boile muṁ tote chāḍili ājaṁ moha
karṇṇa boilā tāta yāa ya kṣaṇaheṁ na raha | 73 |
śuṇa ho caitana kahai manu puruṣa
bicitra nr̥tya karante arjuna heṭha māthe | 79 |

div.note: arjunakaiṁ dekhi apacharī ubongśī
ubongśīra mukhachāhiṁ jāṇile suranātha |–ja, ca, jha,

lg.l: indra debatāẏe āgyāṁdile ye nr̥tya rahu rahu
bahuta utsaba ye kale amara svarga | 83 |
arjanaku aneka se arghya dile debā | 85 |
bābu mora bhāriyāku nibongātakapaca nelā hari
tuhi se badhakalu dārā bairi mohori | 86 |
ẏe śveta chāriaśva dili yoca tohora rathe
sāṁgrāme śatr̥ jiṇimuṁ jaẏa hoiba pāthe | 87 |
śahasramāna bheda nohai ẏe chāriṁkari kāẏe | 88 |
bābu muhiṁ tote pūjākare chāri śvetaaśvanta gheni
ājhuṁ tohora nāma hou śveta ye bāhinī | 89 |
bidyādhara mukhyapāna ye aṭai pracaṇḍa mahābaḷī
tāhāra bhāriyā nāma ye aṭai mohinī cañchaḷī | 91 |
se pracaṇḍābaḷī arjunaku pūjā kalāka bahuta | 92 |
mohora dārā bairi nāśakau arjuna bara māga bega | 93 |

div.note: tāhāra bhāriyā nāma ye aṭai gandhakāḷī |–ta, ṭa, ñja

lg.l: tu yebe anugraha kalu ho debasvāmī | 94 |
pracaṇḍābaḷī bacane arjuna bīramaṇi bara māgi
svamī agyāṁta banabāsa āmbhara hoiba baraṣe teradina
debāsura gandhabonge kehi na āsibe tora kati
mr̥tupiṇḍa hoi śahasramāna tuhi thibu rakhi | 97 |
yojane pariyante ke na yibe sehu panthe
yadyapi bahuta jana dekhibu tu dūre
bara deiṇa galā pracaṇḍa nāme mahābaḷī
bijaẏe purandara ye arjuna śaẏanara stāna | 103 |
ẏeṇe madana śare ārata hoiṇa urbaśī

div.note: pañchabhūta ātmā mohora baḷilā tāhāku – ja, jha, ṭa, ṭha, ṅa, ca

lg.l: arjune na pāile muṁ bratibi kemante | 107 |
brahmā indraṁku ye muhiṁ mohili rūpa guṇe
mama pañchu ātmā ye houcchi baikulya
sabunti rakhi mote arjuna kala bhala | 109 |
hārili śarīra mohora kemante hoibi rakhi
prasanne yogeśvarī go karibā mote rakṣā
anaṁga śaraghāte mote na kara gañjaṇā | 112 |
muhiṁ tohora śaraṇa go jagata mohinī
pāṣāṇe jaḍāi pāruṁ āmbhe tohora sāhā gheni | 113 |
samasta śāsrakaiṁ tuhi se anadi siddhā | 114 |
ẏe dusaha saṁkaṭu māgo mote rakṣā karibāka śakāmbherī | 115 |
tuhi ye mahata māo muhiṁ ye tohora āśrite
arjune prāpata āṇi karāa go mote | 116 |

div.note: pāṣāṇe jaḍāipāru taba mantra gheni |–jha, ka, ḍha, tha, ḍa

lg.l: tapaphaḷa āśra ta mātā go jagata mohantā
tu se mahādebī go mohilu rudra ye debatā | 118 |
paramabrahma mūrtti tu go prasanne gosāmaṇī | 119 |
muhiṁ tāhāra śaraku ki hoibi bhārjanā | 120 |
tu mote prasanna hoasi go sabongmaṅgaḷe
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa praṇapatya śrī sabongmaṅgaḷā pādataḷe | 121 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
durgāṁkaiṁ ubongśī yahuṁ aneka kalā stuti | 122 |
se kāmakṣī prasanna hoile bāsaba kaṇṭheṇa
tu bābu caḷasi yā ubongśīki gheni
bāsaba debatāra āgyāṁẏe bege hoasi bāhāra | 127 |

div.note: arjunaku prāpata mote karāa go jagatamātā |–jha, ca, ja, ṭa, ṅa
ubongśī aneka tustikalā abhaẏe pābongtī |–jha, ñja, ḍa, ḍha, ṭa, na
se paraloka bāndhabī hoile prasanna |–ka, tha, ñja, ga

lg.l: tu bābu caḷasi yā ubongśīki gheni
bāsaba debatāra āgyāṁẏe bege hoasi bāhāra | 130 |
tu debī bheṭibu āja go kointāṁka dulāḷa
se svāmīra prasanne sakaḷa kāryya siddhi | 133 |
śarīra ānanda hoilā se amr̥ta pāna jāṇi | 134 |
parama ānande ḍāka diai bāsabara gaṭa | 136 |
bābu mote rāiṇa āgyāṁ dileka jambhobhedī
ubongśī āsicchi ye tote bacana saṁpādi | 137 |
arjuna arjuna boli ḍāka diai uccasvare | 138 |
arjuna boile māgo acchi muṁ samādhi saṁyoge
kabāṭa pheḍa bābu kahhibaiṁ muhiṁ yāiṁ
bābu śīghreṇa aili muhiṁ bāsaba āgyāṁ pāi | 141 |
ābara kemante go uṭhibaiṁ muṁ tohora bole
tu mote kebaṇa sampāda kahibu raẏeṇī pāhele | 143 |
ubongśī boile tu kṣatriẏa janma hoi
aḷasa bhojana nidrā se ki hoai saṁsiddhi | 146 |
sakaḷa dharma na rahai yāhāra śahasra thāi hāthe | 147 |
yugte cañchaḷā se aṭanti bākya ruci
samasyā ẏehāri pātha ṭeki na bolai kicchi | 148 |
madana asāṣṭame bāḷī pāthaku bahana diẏe ḍāka
mauneṇa bāsabi ye na diai sambhāṣi
bāsabara bhmanaku caḷi yāasi go māẏe | 151 |
mānaba dūṣitaku kimpā karu tu grāhijyā | 152 |

div.note: garuḍaku sumari muṁ nicinte śutili |–ta, ñja
chānde śoithibu parā tāhāṁkara bāhile |–ñja, ḍa, jha, ḍha
śuṇiṇa pārthiba ye basilā urddhvamukha |–ṅa, jha, ja
śuṇikari arjuna ye na diai bākya |–kha, na

lg.l: muhiṁ tora dāsara dāsa sabongdā caraṇe go sebi | 153 |
ubongśī boile āmbhe aṭu ye cañchaḷā
pramadā nāma bahu samasta saṅge meḷā | 154 |
ye badhāi diai tāhāku deu aṅga
baḍhāu pīrati āmbhe sabuṁkari saṅge saṅga | 155 |
candra debatāra putra budha ẏethe indra hoithilā
sehi puṇa yugaka pariyante indra hoithilā bābā | 157 |
ẏehāṁkara ante naghoṣa puṇa indrapaṇe basile ẏethi | 158 |
svargara apacharī āmbhe saburi saṅge thāuṁ
yete puruṣa icchā āmbhe se sabunti ramaṇa deuṁ | 161 |
se yayāti indraṁka bhāriyā āmbhe aṭuṁ
aneka indra nāśayāi sabunti āmbhe khaṭuṁ | 163 |

div.note: pradhana nāśe āmbhe bhabe hou bhoḷā |–na, ṇa, kha, cha
ye bhāba karai tāhāku deu aṅga |–ḍa, ñja, jha
yāhāku rucai tāhāku deu aṅga |–ṭa, tha
ye bodha diai tāhāku deu aṅga |–ja, ca

lg.l: arjana boilā tu go kahilu yathārtha
māgo baẏasa adhika stirīṁki ye haranti abichāre
asura yonire jāta hoanti se neñchaṁkara ghare | 166 |
guru guru paramaguru tu go aṭu mahātmāṇī
mārāga maṇi tulakaru kāhiṁ kāca tule āṇi | 167 |
muhiṁ mānaba go, mātā mohora mānuṣī
debastirī hoi tu loḍu mote dūṣi | 168 |
māgo bhojana ramaṇa ye ẏeka kṣaṇakara kathā
jāti antare āchāra kale śāsti diai jantunāthā | 169 |
muhiṁ tohroa caraṇe janme janme karai sebā
kalyāṇa kariṇa mātā go bāhuḍi ẏethu yibā | 170 |
ubongśī boilā bābu tu kṣatrī baḷabantā
madana rāẏe mote karaṇa chā(?)pa dhari
birahiṇī kanyā muhiṁ paśili tohore śaraṇa
tuho arjuna mote karibu nāhiṁki kāraṇa | 174 |
trailokye śatr̥ bināśi to kirīṭī nāmagoṭi | 175 |

div.note: tuho arjuna mote karibu kārana |–ṭa, ṭha, na
trailokye dhabaḷilā tora kirīṭī nāma goṭi |–ṭha, jha, ṭa
trailokye śubhigalā tora kirīṭī nāmagoṭi |–ṇa, cha, ca, kha

lg.l: bābu puruṣe baśya huanti āmbhara rūpa dekhi
bābu nirbātakapaca badhakalu amare tote pūjā
rajanī prabhāte puṇi nohuṁ nā kāhāri | 178 |
āmbhe beśyānārī bābu aṭu sakaḷaṁku ruci
ẏethaku saṁkoca bābu na kara mane kicchi | 180 |
karmeṇa dhanurjaẏe tu mote hoilu prāpata
dhana prāṇa dei na pāi āmbhanta loḍi
puṣṭa bhojana dekhi paḷāile tu ḍare
aneka ratna aḷaṁkāra tote muhiṁ debi

div.note: puruṣa ātmā hoi kimpe āmbhanta upekhi |–ḍa, ḍha
tohora nimante muṁ hoili nirimākhi |–kha, ṇa, na
tohora nārāje muṁ hoili nirimākhi |–jha, ca, ja
kiraṭī mukuṭa bānddha kirīṭī nāma dilāṭi debarājā |–ja, jha
gaurobī strī āmbhe na mānu pitāmātā |–ta, ñja, ja
āmbhe beśyājāti aṭu puruṣa manaruci |–ka, ḍha
yācilā rasaku kiṁpe pakāu udugāri |–kha, na, ḍa
aneka ramaṇa karāi kutūhoḷe niśā puhāibi |–jha, ñja

lg.l: guṇa na jāṇi pātha kimpe houachu baṇā
bhmañjilāra lokahiṁ se svāda jāṇaiṁ sinā | 185 |
āho arjuna apūbong padārtha yacaneheṁ loḍi
svāda hāde pāile puṇa kṣaṇeka na pāsori | 186 |
arjuna boile tu go kahiluni bahuta
muhiṁ tohora putra tuhi go aṭu mohora māẏe
ẏehiṭhāre thāiṇa mātā go paḍucchi tora pāẏe | 188 |
brāhmaṇa bhāriyā go chāṇḍāḷare meḷa kāhiṁ
urbaśī boilā bābu tu na kaha ẏemanta
bābu buḍilā śarīra mora paḍagali mr̥cchā
rāgeṇa arjuna boilā tu kahilu anīti
beśyāpaṇa stirī tume aṭa lo mandajāti | 192 |
arjuna boilā dāsīṁkara pāśa samārjanīra bāta
pākāsparśi stirī āu jāti antara loke
ẏehānta chuiṁle urbaśī lo doṣa ye aneke | 194 |
paraloke akāraṇa go sajja na sabhāre dūṣita hoi | 195 |

div.note: –bhmañjilā loka se jāṇe luṇi ki alaṇā |–ṅa, ḍha, jha
beśyāṁkara śarīra kūpa kāṭha saṁgata |–ka, cha, ṇa
beśyāstirī jāti āmbhe aṭu ho manda ajāti |–ṭha, na
ayogya stirī ẏete lokaṁka saṁgata |–ta, ṅa
jīrṇṇakūpa narakare se nice paḍai |–ṭha, ca, jha

lg.l: paḷā yā moḍhī tu aṭu ye pāpiṣṭhī
gyāna buḍāiṇa tuhi yatane hou naṣṭi | 196 |
āho caitana aneka bhrasanā kari yahuṁ pārtha dilā gāḷi
raẏaṇī prabhāte tahuṁ urbaśī galā caḷi | 197 |
āre pāmara pāṣāṇa jarai āmbha rūpa dekhile
mānaba mātraka tu re āmbhanta miche gañju | 199 |
tāhāku pradāna hoile paṇḍu ye nr̥pati | 200 |
se puṇa paradārā karāilā karyya arthe
yogījana prāẏe tu kathā kahu mote | 201 |
kṣīrodra prāẏe tote kali muhiṁ āśa
agyāna pāmara tu re mote kalu yā nirāśa | 202 |
kopeṇa śāpya tāku hāde dilāka ubongśī
yāa re arjuna tu napuṁsaka huasi | 203 |
raẏaṇī prabhāte ye mājaṇā khaṭaṇira beḷe
puṇyeṇa ẏemāna se prāpata jāṇa huanti | 207 |

div.note: gyāna buḍāi kari tu yatane hou kaṣṭi |–cha, ka, jha, ñja, ṭa

lg.l: pitā abā tumbhe hoila mātā manuṣya yoni gheni | 208 |
ye yāhāra prakr̥ta chāḍai ki yugate
rātreka khaṭili deba nirāśa kalā mote | 209 |
sahi nuāriṇa deba rāge dilaiṁ śāpye
ẏeḍe śāpya mohora putraku dilu anamite
tu leñcha yonire jāta hoasi lo martte | 212 |
urbaśī boile nātha na kara mote kopa
ẏe tumbhara putrakaiṁ kāḷe hita hou mohora śāpya | 213 |
ẏe samaẏe arjuna prabeśa helā yāiṁ
āsa ās boliṇa bāsaba koḷa kari
ẏe śāpyakaiṁ kāraṇa kehne hoiba pārthaku | 217 |
agyāta bāsaku ẏe śāpya hoiba kahita | 218 |
kīñchaka badha nimante ẏe debaṁka bhiāṇa | 219 |

div.note: pitā abā tumbhe hoila mātā se manuṣyeṇa janmi |–ḍha, ca
akāraṇe kopa kiṁpe kalu lo tu naṣṭi |–ka, ñja

lg.l: matsa magha deśare ye birāṭa nr̥pabara
birāṭara duhitā nāma ye uttarā bāḷī | 226 |

div.note: ubongśīra śāpye se pāṇḍaba kirīṭī

div.head: {@pāṇḍabamānaṅkara banaru pratyābarttana nimante

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
hastinā rājya āstāneṇa ye bijaẏe kurupati | 1 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya śakuni bhūriśrabā
ākāśe yāiṁ baḍa mahimāṁ kalāka arajuna | 3 |
caurāśi beḷa se amarakaiṁ dilā dhāḍi | 4 |

div.note: “debatāẏe rahi nuārile amara svarge |”–pare ‘ṅa’
pañchakoṭi marbhmata baḷa apramita
ajāge svargakaiṁ dhāḍi dilāka bahuta |
ati upadrapa datya svarge yahuṁ kalā
mātaḷi paṭhāi indra arjunaku nelā |
tāhātule pātha ye aneka yuddha kalā
praharaka madhye sabong sanya nāśagalā |
arjuna datyakaiṁ nāśa kalāka ākāśe
aneka utsaba karāile suraindra toṣe |
koḷe dhari ākhaṇḍaḷa bahuta ānande
kiraṭī mukuṭa bānddha kirīṭī nāma dile debaindra |

lg.l: kiraṭī mukuṭa bānddha kirīṭī nāma dileka deba indre | 7 |
bābu bidura tu sumaraṇā kara catrapāṇi | 8 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa bhīṣṁa droṇa caraṇe kale pūjā
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile svāmī biduraṁku gheni pāṇḍabaṁka tahiṁki yāa yā | 11 |
pāẏe yāiṁ keśaba ye karanti niuchāḷi | 17 |

div.note: banabāsa saṅkaṭa ājahuṁ galā pāra |–ṇa, kha, jha, jha, ṭha, na
bārāṇasī kṣetre bijaẏe jaṇa chāri |–ṅa, cha, kha, na, ta, jha, ḍha, ḍa, ñja

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhārile nakuḷa mukha chāhiṁ
nakuḷa boilā ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ hoilā uṭha ho gosāiṁ | 19 |
kṣameṇa brati achantinā mātā ye gāndhārī
yujheṣṭhi deba boile bābu indra daibata

div.note: “sannidhye jagannāthe śutile gaḍaghāli”
yujheṣṭhi debe drahasita hoile śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka badana chāhiṁ
nakuḷa boilā ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁ hoilā uṭhibā gosāiṁ
driyodhana dhuśāsana bhīṣma droṇa ādikari

lg.l: bheṭi tāṁka saṁge datya yujhilā kapaṭe | 28 |
svargare śubhilā bāṇī sādhu jaẏe jaẏe | 29 |
kiraṭī mukuṭa śire bānddhale abhiṣeka bidhāna | 31 |
sehu amare nāma dilā śveta ye bāhanī | 33 |
svāmī arjuna rūpa dekhiṇa ḍhaḷilā ubongśī
bāsaba debatā ubongśīki pāthaṭhāku dile peṣi | 34 |
tāhāre ramaṇa se na dile kirīṭī | 35 |
napuṁsaka hoa boli boilā ati kopa | 36 |

div.note: aneka beśa beśana apasarī khaṭi |–ṭa, kha, ṇa
“śuṇiṇa birasa deba hoile yujheṣṭhi”
manare birasa hele śrīkr̥ṣṇa bidura
baḍa birasa hoilyā śakuni manara
agasti boile tumbhe śuṇa ho rājana
teṇe amara āstāne bijaẏe maghabāna |

lg.l: ẏe bāratā kaha yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi debaṁku | 39 |
puṇa samaẏeka bāhi āsanti se boli
teṇu kari arjunaku muṁ amare ruhāili | 41 |
sānande arjunara bāratā pucchanti deba svāmī | 44 |

div.note: puṇa samaẏeka āsanti na puṇa boli |–ka, jha, ḍha
“teṇukari arjunakuṁ muṁ amare ruhāili”
yujheṣṭhiṁka āgare tu kahibu apāra
nibongātaku māri pātha acchi svargapura |
kisa deiṇa tāku muhiṁ karibaiṁ sebā
ẏemanta boli kahibu boile maghabā |

lg.l: caurāśi beḷa dhāḍidilā amara ye svarge | 48 |
arjuna boilā asura chāmuku ratha mora bāhā | 52 |
muhiṁ boili āga draśana karibā ākhaṇḍaḷa
se māḷā thile ye raṇe nāhiṁ aprāñjaẏe
se māḷā thāi ye indradebatā hr̥dagate
nirbātakapacakaiṁ hārile kimpe caurāśi beḷa pariyante | 55 |
ẏekā arjunake deba kalāka samara mahāghora
bābu pratakṣe dekhili to arjunara mahimāṁ
sāṁgrāme sari tāhāku nohanti hara brahmā | 58 |
samasta bāratā kahilā yahuṁ mātaḷi sārathi
sāṁgrāma ḍare aneka asure paḷāi achanti | 59 |
puṇa bāhāntini ki se amara bhmabanaku
teṇu kari indra debatā amare ruhāiacchi arjuna | 60 |
mote rāikari ye āgyāṁ dile maghabāna
yujheṣṭhiṁki kaha yāiṁ muṁ ẏethe ruhāili arajuna | 61 |
tu deba arjunaku cintā na kara ẏebe
baraṣa sāta pāñcha rahiba amara svarge | 62 |
arjunaku cintā na kara mane bābā | 63 |
binaẏa bacana ye kahilā dr̥ḍha bāki | 65 |
chāri bhāinta ābharaṇa ābara sohodrā dropatī
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bhīma ratnamānaṁku kalu ki tu icchā
pūbonge se śibasebā na kalu manabāñcchā | 69 |
bābu āmbhe thibā re gahana araṇya bane
banaste thānti ye aneka rākṣasa pichāśamāne | 70 |
bābu bipatti kāḷe ye na yogāi ratana

div.note: dhana thile kāẏāṭi hoai nāśapana |–ca

lg.l: aneka praśaṁsā ye kale dekhiṇa tā mātaḷi
amara svargakaiṁ gale puṣyeka gheni caḷi | 74 |
samasta bāratā yāiṁ kahile indra debatāṁku
gaẏā tīrtheṇa se kalāka śuddha ye srāhāna
maṇikarṇṇikā kuṇḍe srāhāna kari biśvanāthakaiṁ dekhi
bāhuḍi yibā chāla ho indra praśastaku
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tāta miḷai ki ẏe yugata
dharma laṁghilā prāṇīṁkara kisa ye jībita | 81 |
āpaṇāra kalākr̥tyaku karma se ye boli

div.note: praẏāga beṇīre ye karanti srāhāna |–tha, ṭha, ja, kha, ca, ḍa
sarilā banabāsa saṁkalpa upekṣi |–ṭa, cha, ḍha, ṭa

lg.l: baraṣaka prānta āsi ye hoilā ẏeka dina
kahani ṭhākure ẏethu yibe ki na yibe | 85 |
sahadeba boilā svāmī āmbhara nicaẏe banabāsa
yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi mukta hoiba nr̥pati naghoṣa | 86 |
svāmī dharmadebatā achanti ẏetheṁ baka rūpa hoi
sehi ruṣi śāpye aniḷabasu acchi andha hoi | 89 |
kandhapura nagre acchi ye baidhr̥ti nāme rākṣasa
bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁka hāthe se hoiba prāṇe nāśa | 91 |

div.note: “tīrthaiṁ thokāẏe kari arajibi puṇyamāna”
dekha dekha mātuḷa he kete brahmadvijā
hastināẏe thile ki karanti ẏāṁka pūjā |
ẏeṇe sahadebakaiṁ gheniṇa bāsudebe
bichāri kaha ṭhākure yibe ki na yibe |
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka chāmure kahai mantrībara
mote pachāra kisa na jāṇa ki catradhara |
bidura boile deba banabāsa na karibā |–ṭha, jha, ca
aneka dinu brahmahatyā karichanti sehu |–ṭha, ca, ja, jha

lg.l: sahadeba boile svāmī yujheṣṭhi deba na galeṇa bane
kare kumbha gheni debasabhāre kāndi kahilā basumatī
kīcaka badha hoiba āmbhara agyāṁta banabāse | 96 |
kīñcheka śatebhāiki badha karibe ye brikodara ṭhākura | 97 |
sahadeba boile deba yujheṣṭhiṁkara bane baḍa icchā
satya satya banabāsa yibu ẏeheneka acchi manabāñcchā | 98 |
banabāsa saribā yāẏe antepure thāāntu bābu | 101 |
yujheṣṭhi debe yāiṁ paḍile kointāṁka pāẏe
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku se kointāẏe bahuta tiāri

div.note: dante tiraṇa gheni debasabhāre kāndilā basumatī |–ḍa, ca, ja, ṅa, ga, jha

lg.l: bābu bhīma arajunaku nāhiṁ mora cinte
nakuḷa sahadeba mo kṣame thāānti yemante | 104 |
bidura boile bābu dr̥pada rājāra dulaṇī
kointāṁkara tule yibu āmbhe ẏehānta ye gheni | 106 |
dropatīṁki boile tumbhe yiba ki mātāṁkara tule | 107 |
āmbhe śubhe banabāsa sāri yāuṁkinā hastinā
tumbhara thile āmbhanta bahuta jañjāḷa sinā | 108 |
dukhakāḷe kaṣṭa hoi bhāriyā na thile | 109 |
janaka dohitā sītaẏākaiṁ na chāḍile pāśa | 110 |
sītā yoge śrīrāma aneka kaṣṭahiṁ pāile | 111 |
tahuṁ puṇa kāḷe rābaṇa sītāṁku harinele | 112 |
bhīmasena boile prohite se kathāmāna ẏebe chāḍa
ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe ke āmbhatahuṁ acchi baḍa | 113 |
sahadeba boile ho saṅge thāāntu dropatī
nānā tīrthe srāna karibā bhāriyā thileheṁ yugati | 114 |
dvārakā se prabeśa hoile deba dāmodare | 117 |
aneka sampada gheni pāṇḍabe bane gale | 119 |
dhaumya purohita achanti lakṣeka brāhmaṇanta gheni | 121 |
puṇyabanta prāṇī thāiṁ yahiṁ tahiṁ thileheṁ sampada
dharma āśrite prāṇīki na paḍai paramāda | 122 |
yeuṁṇa stāne yujheṣṭhi thāāṇḍi ye basi
anubrate purāṇa paḍhu thānti jaẏamuni śuka maharuṣi | 123 |
yujheṣṭhi boile sebā mora sadā dhr̥tarāṣṭa pāde
ẏe bana kaṣaṇuṁ biñchibi muṁ pitāṁkara parasāde | 124 |
dharma laṁghibāku yebe na kaleka icchā
agyāṁtabāsa bañchibe se kebaṇa ye stāne
abaśya jāṇantā hoile se puṇa yibe bane | 127 |

div.head: {@aniḷa basura cakṣudāna@}

lg.l: amare prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ mātaḷi sārathi | 1 |
nicaẏe āmbhara rājya hoilā ẏete kāḷe | 4 |
ubongśī ye śāpa dilā arjunaku se kisa kalā kahibā mote bāki | 5 |
se śāpa arjuna kemante kalā pāra
ẏehā mote sañchapi kahibā paṇḍita bigyaṁbara | 6 |
pābongtī prāẏe seba kari ubongśīkaiṁ thāi khaṭi | 8 |
arjunaku ābara tu na baḷāa manīṣī | 9 |

div.note: ubongśī ye śāpadile arjunaku se napuṁsaka hoiba ki |–ṭa, ṭha
mātāra prāẏe kari ubongśīki thāi khaṭi |–ka, tha, ga

lg.l: kiṁpāiṁ abhiśāpa dilu tu na jāṇi
tohora ye abhiśāpa na yiba meṇṭaṇa
mātā hoi putraku tu dilu abhiśāpa
kāraṇa karasi go khaṇḍaṇa hou pāpa | 13 |
bolai ubongśī tu śuṇa ho dhanurjaẏe
birāṭa bhmabane se sabonge gopyāne nebe dina
āmbhara śāpa tote re tahiṁ phaḷiba arjuna | 15 |
ẏe tohora bāma aṅga bhmaja śarapantha

div.note: “kiṁpāiṁ abhiśāpa dilu tu najāṇi”
śuṇiṇa karayoḍi ubongśī kahanti
mohora bacana tumbhe śuṇa surapati |
mohora śāpa arjunaku hita heba
agyāmta kāḷe se ye napuṁaka hoiba |
agyāṁta bāsa ye sariba youṁ dina
puruṣa lakṣaṇa se hoiba arjuna |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye hoile debasāiṁ
ānanda kautuke haraṣa ye hoi |

lg.l: ẏe mohora śāpa tote hoiba prāpata
hoibu na stirī na puruṣa yugata | 18 |
tohroa rūpa gheni rahibi svarge muhiṁ
gopyāna sarile to nija rūpa debi bāhuḍāi | 19 |
āho caitana pāṇḍabe ye bārāṇasī tīrthe rahithile
se nagra jiṇiṇa ye caḷanti chāribīre
pāñchāḷī mātra achanti ye tāhāṁkara saṁgatare | 23 |
biṁjhaśikhara boli kari se pabongtara nāma
tahiṁ yāiṁ pāṇḍabe ye kaleka biśrama | 26 |
se nadīre srāna kale debī jighnasenī | 27 |
nityekarma sārile tahiṁ chāri ye pāṇḍabe | 28 |

div.note: “rahilā acintare sehu amara bhmabane”
tahuṁ siddhapura nagre prabeśa turita
sehiṭhāre pāṇḍabe rahile ẏeka rātra |
sādhupura nagre yāiṁ prabeśa hoile |–ca, ṭa, gha

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe mātra mr̥gamāṁsa na bhmañji | 30 |
kodua māṇḍaā mahula śuāṁ kāṅgula bāḷuṅgā dhāna ādikari
ye yāhā māgnti tāhā dianti jāṇi mana | 33 |
jaẏatu jaẏatu bhāskara deba kamaḷa locana | 34 |

div.note: padaṭhāru 32 pada madhyare ca, jha, ja, ṭha pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
karanti mr̥gaẏāmāna sehi ye pāridhi
saurī pākeṇa ye dropatī sampādi |
kāhiṁ kandamūḷa kāhiṁ mr̥gamāṁsa bhakṣi
yujheṣṭhi debe ye mr̥gamāṁsa na bhakṣi |
kadaḷī naṭīkāla guā āmba paṇasa ādikari
kendu kaiṁtha kañchā āhāra kari |
ẏemanteṇa banaste bañchanti chāribhāi
ẏepari aṭhāśisahasra ruṣiṁki bhojana karāi |
ye yāhā māganti tāhā dyanti pratidina
yujheṣṭhi debe ye karatāraṁku karanti dhyāna |
ẏā loḍiāṇi pāṇḍabe āhāra ācari |–kha, na
bīrabhadrā nadīre karanti ācamana |–kha, na
“jaẏatu jaẏatu bhāskara deba kamaḷalocana”

lg.l: ẏe dusaha kaṣaṇu mote karibāka pāra
aṭhāśi sahasra ruṣiṁki nityāprati yogāḍa āhāra | 35 |
tohore śarana muhiṁ karatāra ye gosāiṁ | 36 |
tohora prasāde deba mote na lāgiba cintā | 37 |
aniḷabasuku śāpya dile tohora cakṣaku na diśu | 41 |
baśiṣṭhaṁka śāpyuṁ kari aniḷa basu andha
se andha hoi paḍiacchi bana asakanda | 42 |
askanda nāmeṇa tahiṁ pabongta ẏeka goṭiẏe
tahiṁra upae aniḷabasu rañchile parṇṇa kuṭīẏe | 44 |

div.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
ẏe dusaha saṁkaṭu karibā mote pāra
ẏethakaiṁ pratyikāra karibāra karatāra |
aṭhāśi sahasa ruṣi nityāprati mo bhojana
ẏethi sāhāpakṣa hua kamaḷalocana |–
askanda nāmeṇa tahiṁ pabongta ẏekagoṭi

lg.l: tretaẏā yugahiṁ galā na diśilā beniḍoḷa
yāiṁ dekha bābu ke karai kāruṇya | 48 |
yujheṣṭhi pratikāra kara boli ḍākai ghana ghana
dekhiṇa āsu tu gahana ghora bana | 49 |
dhātikāre miḷilā se askanda pabongta upara | 50 |
dekhilā dibya puruṣeka ye pabana tanaẏe
beni cakṣu adr̥śya tāra sabonge ẏekajaṇa | 52 |
svāmī andha hoi puruṣeka pabongte acchi basi | 54 |

div.note: cakṣu na pāi basu houthāi bikaḷa |–kha, ṇa, na
bikaḷe ḍaka dilā rakṣākara paṇḍubāḷa |–kha, ṇa, na
dineka ḍāka dilā yujheṣthi pratikāra kara |–tha, ḍha, jha, ka, ṅa, ga, gha |
beni cakṣu adr̥ṇya tāra svabhābe ẏeḷajaṇa |–ka, jha
ārambhita = prayatnabāna |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe boile tumbhe kebaṇa jana heṭi
urddhakari chāhāṁ bolante andhapaṭaḷa galā phiṭi | 56 |
markata rasāṇilā prāẏeka diśilā beni ḍoḷā
pachārilā bho mahātmā tumbhe yujheṣthideba ki | 58 |
bhīmasena boilā ẏehiṭi yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākure
uṭhiṇa aniḷabasu aneka praṇapatya hoilā paẏare | 59 |
jaẏa dharma nirañjana dukhī loka uddhārantā | 64 |
jaẏa satya puruṣa saṁsiddha tora bāñcchā | 65 |

div.note: jaẏatu prajāpati jaẏa somabongśā |–ṭa, gha
jaẏatu rājyeśvara saẏaḷa jana cintā |–kha, na, ḍa

lg.l: bana gahana bipuṇya kaṣṭaru tuhi se uddhari dharantā | 67 |
satya tretaẏā dvāpara ye tini yuge
tini yuga hoilā muṁ andhahoi ẏetheṁ acchi basi | 69 |
taba laẏa kari nātha bheṭili ẏete kāḷe tote | 70 |
śrī dharmadebatā yujheṣṭhi deba caraṇe mora sebā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsaku mukati gati debā | 71 |
kebaṇa doṣe mahātamā tu basilu cakṣu andhe | 72 |
śuṇa tu dharmarāẏe badaẏanti aniḷeka basu
śuṇa deba sābadhāne yāhā tu prakāśu | 73 |
aṣṭabasu āmbhe aṭu gārgaba gotra bhedi

div.note: aṣṭabasu āmbhe aṭu prāgyaṁ gotrī |–ḍha, ñja, ta, ga
aṣṭabasu āmbhe śāntanu gotrī |–ṭha, jha
bihantā puruṣa āmbhe samasta sampādi pare” “ḍa, ḍha”
ẏe jambodīpa maṇḍaḷe hāde biśvamitra rājā
baḍāi sampade se pāḷai janaprajā |
se dine biśvāmitre paśile pacchima dige
pāñchapadma ratha gheni batiśa padma nāge | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: samadaṇḍa gheni mr̥gaẏāku gale biśvāmitra rāẏe | 76 |
mr̥ga hariṇa bāhuṭiā saambara āna na pāile duje | 77 |
bhuta ḍiṅgara jiṇi paśilāka ghoa bana
nabamī dina sanyaku tāra na miḷilā anna | 78 |
ẏekādaśī dina nirāśe upabāsa mahāsanya śrame
banare bhramante āsi miḷile baśiṣṭhaṁka āśrame | 80 |
bho mahārājā tohora saini mahāśrama diśi | 82 |

div.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
pāñcha sāgara tule bājī ye turaṁge
pāñcha sāgara ye gheniṇa bihaṁge |
pañchadaśa kṣauṇī saini pañchalakṣa biratūra bāje
samadaṇḍa gheni biśvātra pacchima diga bije |
aneka dānaba ye duṣṭante niśodhana
kṣīra pāṇi na aṇṭāi ye bulante mahā araṇya |

lg.l: meṁjana debāku nāhiṁ deba dudha puṭi | 87 |
kuḍoẏākara bhāta gāī goṭikara dudha samastakaiṁ aṇṭa
samasta saini bhojana kale ādhāra santuṣṭi | 88 |
kemante anna aṇṭi lāṭi mohora ẏeteka saini | 90 |
śuṇi biśvāmitraṁku ye na phurai kicchi | 91 |
biśvāmitre boile muni tumbhaṁku mora sebā
ẏe kāmadhenu gāī goṭika mote debā | 92 |

div.note: “meṁjana debāku nāhiṁ deba dudha phuṭi” pare kha, na,
sumante boile bābu duhiṁ tumbhe gāī
yehne biśvāmitra sanya sukhe anna khāi |
ẏete boli biśvāmitre baśiṣṭha ḍakāi
tu basa bābu sanyamānaṁku saṅge nei |
śuṇikari gādhisuta bhmañjiṇa basilā
sanyamānaṁku tāhāra sumanta paraśilā |
kuḍoẏāka bhāta ẏekāgoṭi gāīra dudha
khāiṇa biśvāmitra sanya hoigale bodha
“ẏe kamadhenu gāī goṭiki mote debā” pare ḍa, ḍha
ẏehā samāna kari tumbhaṁku debi sahasreka gāba
baśiṣṭha boile rājā tāhā ke āmbhara sambhāḷiba |
ẏekā gāī goṭika āmbhe sambhāḷi thāuṁ
biāṇe boile āmbhe manuẏeka pariyante duhuṁ |
aneka kaṭāḷe ye māgile biśvamitre
kāmadhenu baśiṣṭhe na dileka kadācite |

lg.l: māgante gāī goṭiki na dile brahmaruṣi
duṣṭa yoddhāẏe boile baḷe nemā paśi | 93 |
āho yaṣṭi gheniṇa bege oḍāile gāī
aḍānte na caḷai se durudanta ṅāī | 95 |
paḷābanti saini tāra na rahiṇa kati | 96 |
thāṭha bhagna hoiṁ se paḷāile rāẏe
samasta tejyā kari se hoilā udāsī | 98 |
śuṇa he yujheṣṭhi deba kahai aniḷa basu
baśiṣṭhaṁka gāīgoṭi āmbhe cauryyapane gheni āsuṁ | 101 |
āmbhanta dekhiṇa se nohilā duṣṭa khaṭi | 102 |
loḍiṇa baśiṣṭhe āsi kaleka tahiṁ ṭhāba | 103 |

div.note: baśiṣṭhaṁka gāīgoṭi āmbhe cauryyapaṇe gheniāsuṁ
bīrasūndara pabongte thoilu luchāi

lg.l: gāīgoṭi banaste bānddha āmbhe mr̥gagoṭi māri
gāītahuṁ dudha duhiṁ khāuṁ māẏeṁsa poḍi kari | 104 |
muhiṁ pabongtaru ḍeiṁ paḍili kare gheni yaṣṭi | 105 |
āre aniḷabasu andha hoia boli baśiṣṭhe śāpa dile kopabhare | 106 |
muhiṁ andha hoi paḍāli ẏe askanda bane
baśiṣṭhaṁku mārite se dhāiṁle kopa kari
āre āre pañchabasu jāta hua jaẏintā śabaruṇī ghare
pāṇḍabaṁka hetu dahana hua tumbhe re ja(?)ghare | 109 |

div.note: ẏemantara samaẏe ye ambhe mr̥ga goṭiẏe māri
“tāhākaiṁ śāpa dileka baśiṣṭha brahmachārī”
rāge śāpya dei baśidhaṁka yibā beḷe
aneka bhagatibhābe khaṭili pādataḷe |
bahuta binaẏa kari kahili tāhāṁku
śāpyaku kāraṇa muni kahibāka muku |
baśiṣṭhe boile satya tretaẏā yugare
andha hoi basithibu pabongta śikhare |
dvāpare pāṇḍabe janma banabāsa yibe
se pabongte yujheṣṭhira tote se bheṭibe |
yujheṣṭhiṁka draśane tu hoibu mukata
andhapaṭaḷa phiṭiṇa yibu svarga patha |

lg.l: umābasuku śāpa dile tu hoa paṇḍā purañchana
jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥te ghara karasi srijana | 110 |
pārthabasu janma hua tu gaṅgāra koḷare
bhīṣma hoi śaraśayyā kara tu mahābhāratha yuddhare | 112 |
jadura ghare chaẏe dahija hoile gale amara svarga | 114 |
muhiṁ hāde andha hoi ẏetekāḷa thili
bhīṣma deba achanti ye gaṅgāra ātmajā
bhāratha yuddhe se tohora nimante karibe śaraśeyyā | 116 |
baśiṣṭha śāpe āmbhe ye kaṣṭa pāilu | 118 |
bābu āmbhanta mukata kalu baśiṣṭhaṁka śāpuṁ
ẏehi dehagoṭi gheni svarga prāpata hou tuku | 120 |
tahuṁ mr̥ga māri pheranti gahana araṇye | 122 |

div.note: antarīccha mārge yāiṁ svargabhmabane paśuṁ |–ka, jha

lg.l: saurī bidhāne rānddha mr̥gamāṁsa bhakṣanti bane
kautuke mr̥gabhāra gheni bihaḍanti gahana bipunye | 124 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe āsai sindha deśara rājana banabhrame | 126 |
jadyarathaku dūraru dekhiṇa debī ye pāñchāḷī
basa ho jadyaratha boli boile māninī | 131 |
ẏehikṣaṇi āsibe daṇḍe ẏethe basa ho mahāchatrī | 132 |
mohora pitā ye sindhu deśa narapati
mote debāku tote dropada karithilā icchā

div.note: nityakarma karanti bīrabhadrāra aśrame |–kha, na, ṭha

lg.l: ājahuṁ aṭu tu lo mohora bhāriyā
stirī kuḷakaiṁ tu lo dūṣita dropatī | 137 |
dhuśāsana keśadhari na kalā kete kathā | 138 |
agniru jāta tu ye dr̥pada kumārī
ẏebe buluachu tu lo banaste digāmbarī | 139 |
ẏe ghora gahana latāgiri ye kandare
dharmeṇa tote ẏethe na kale prāṇa hāde nāśa | 141 |
āsa āsa pāñchāḷī go basa mora rathe
āmara rājye thāa banabāsa śepa pariyante | 142 |
dropatī boile tu anīti kathā kahu bābu
pare dūṣita hoile tu abaśya maribu | 143 |
duśīḷā ballabha tu aṭu āmbha bandhu
sahodra hoi tu āmbhanta kiṁpe nindu | 144 |
jaẏedratha boilā tu āmbha śaḷāṁka bhāriyā
dropatī boile tora ẏeḍeka darpa kāhuṁ
prārthanā stirī prāẏe laṁghita mote kahu | 146 |
dropatī boile jadyaratha tu aṭu baḍa laghu
pāpa āchāra kari re dharma kiṁḷe laṁghu | 148 |
mohora bhmabane tu go hoibu saubhāgī | 149 |
dropatīṁki koḷe gheni rathe yāiṁ basi | 150 |
daśa sahasra ratha tuli tāhāra achai saini
robanti dropatī ye ta ra baḷātkāra dekhi
uccare ḍāka diai ye dr̥pada duhita
dhāaṁ ho bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadeba tinibhrātha | 153 |
dhaumya boile rājā kemanta tora kathā
daita dānabe hariniantenā ẏehā parā nāẏikā | 159 |
āna harinele āmbhakaiṁ heba haḍā lajjā
dhaumya purohite boile tu nāśilu baḍapaṇa
deba dānabe se ye aṭai niśaṁkā | 162 |
amara bara tāhāra chapana gaṇḍā yuga pariyante
āho gautama patnī harile indra ye āditye
tārāku harilā se candra ye debatā
pāṇḍabaṁkara caritaki tu na jāṇu jadyaratha
tāhāṁkara chāmure ki tu hoibu sāmaratha | 167 |
gaja matta hoile ki chāḷai siṁghaku | 168 |
baka hoikari hāmpoḍe ki śyāmaḷa pacchī
ajāyutha kāhiṁ heba byāghra saṅge gacchi | 169 |
indūra hoiṇa ki kebe chāḷai mañjārī
keuṁ sāhāse ẏekathā kalu re bichāri | 170 |
kiñchita yuddhare bhimasena māilā ẏe asura chāri | 172 |

div.note: “kiñchita yuddhare bhīmasena māilā ẏe asura chāri”
nibongātakapaca boli yebaṇa asura
caurāśi beḷa dhāḍidilā svargapura |
śuṇināhuṁki tu pāṇḍabaṁkara mahimāṁ
kiñchita yuddhe bhāñjile baḷadebaṁka gārimā |
āho jadyaratha tora jībane nāhiṁ śaṁkā
pāṇḍabe jāṇile tote ke kariba rakṣā |
bhīmasena boliṇa yebaṇa aṭe bīra
kiñchite badhakalā se pāṇḍabā asura |

lg.l: āho jadyaratha jībane nāhiṁki to icchā
pāṇḍabe dekhileṭi tote ke kariba rakṣā | 173 |
mohora mukhe paḍi ke yibāka uburi | 174 |
pāṇḍabe samāna mote ki hoibe samare
āsi miḷantu kinā se mohora chāmure | 175 |
tu ho purohita laṁghita kathā mote kahu
brāhmaṇa hoiṇa tu ẏeḍe darpa bahu | 176 |
brāhmaṇa nohile ye kāṭanti tora muṇḍa | 177 |
purohita boile tohora āmbhaṁku ẏeḍe darpa
gāndhārī dohitā āja hoiba bidhabā sarūpa | 178 |
parṇṇakuṭī bhitare dekhile dropatīdebī tahiṁ nāhiṁ | 180 |
mr̥cchāgata hoiṇa yujheṣṭhi deba ye paḍile
saceti hoi boile sañchaẏe byāghra bhālu ki khāile | 181 |
jana manuṣya kāhāku na dekhanti chāribhrātha
prohite boile ye śuṇa āhe dharma
dhāāṁ ho brikodara ẏehi pūbong mūrati
muhiṁ tāhāku ogāḷi ye boili dr̥ḍhabāṇī
khaḍaga gheniṇa se mote loḍuthilāka hāṇi | 190 |
daśabheḍā ẏeka kari dhāmaiṁ pabanahuṁ kharatara | 191 |
se boile jadyaratha yāucchi ẏehu kati | 193 |
puṇa puṇa kṣepai se pabanara suta
dekhilā yāuacchi ye daśasahasra ratha madhye jadyaratha | 194 |
āre āre boliṇa ye brikodara hābi
raha raha jadyaratha re yāuchu kāhiṁki | 195 |
bhīmasena boilā re paḷāibu āra kāhiṁ | 197 |
yamamukhe paḍila re yiba āja kāhiṁ | 198 |

div.note: bahantā rathamāna kampanti tharahara |–kha, na, ca
tesaneka mūrati diśai brikodara |–ta, ñja

lg.l: rathe rathe dhari ye piṭai darāṇḍi
puṇa raṇa manthāna se kalāka ẏekā jaṇake | 208 |

div.note: tambācatra prāẏeka bulāi beni ākhi |–na, kha, ṭha
kadaḷībane yehne pabana pracaṇḍā |–ṭha, ḍha, ka, jha, gha
garjai brikodara mattanāga prāẏe |–ta, ñja

lg.l: ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷa jiṇimāku se samare śakatā | 214 |
śahasraku bhīmasena na galā yahuṁ kṣaẏe
bhāñjile saini ye bāsabhagna pachī prāẏe | 215 |
beni sahasra yoddhāẏe ye paḍile bhūmigata | 216 |
bikaḷe sanya se dante tiraṇa ghenikari
daśa naha mukhe bhari śaraṇa phukāri | 218 |
śaraṇa boile duguṇa se goḍāi mārai bhīmā | 219 |
āre raha raha boli ḍākai sindhu ādhipati | 220 |
saini bhagna dekhaṇa se nr̥pati jadyaratha
bolai apāra saini mora re māilu biartha | 223 |
bhīmasena boilā tuhi lodilu yāhā mane
jadyaratha upare piṭilā bīra gadā āṇi | 225 |
āre āre boli bhīmasena gadā tāra dhari
sehi gadā gheni kope rathe tāra piṭi
re re kāra kari bhīmasena pare gadā kalā ghāta | 230 |
urddhve āṇuacchi caraṇa na paḍai taḷa
ẏesanaka samaẏe nakuḷa sahadeba āsi hoile parabeśa

div.note: pahija = pratijñā |
bhāñjiṇa gadābara paḍilāka kṣiti |–na, ṭha, ṅa
āsiṇa miḷile śīghre bhīmasenara pāśa |–jha, ṭa, ca, ja, ṅa

lg.l: āre āre jaẏadratha bhāriyā āmbha haru
kāhāra baḷe ture ẏeḍeka gabong karu | 237 |
buḍāilu sampada re tu hoilu nirimākhi
ẏe mahāraṇe ke pārai āja tote rakhi | 238 |
sumara re jadyaratha āja ke tote rakṣā karai
aneka samara ye karibu boli boluthilu
jadyaratha doṣa kṣamā karibā deba svāmī | 242 |
babu raha raha sodara re kopa chāḍa bhīma
athabā doṣa re ẏe kalāka na jāṇi
ẏehikṣaṇi bidhabā hoiba ye āmbhara bhaẏeṇī | 247 |
dr̥śīḷāra kaṣṭa bābu kehu pāribāka nekhi
bhīmasena boilā svāmī niẏama muhiṁ kali

div.note: bahai śoṇita tāra nāsikā bimbare |–ca, jha, ḍa

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi boile bābu yāhā boilu tu rāge
tāhā sādhyakale saṁsāre bratibe keuṇa bāge | 250 |
ẏemantara samaẏe prabeśa hoile dhaumya purohita | 251 |
purohite dekhile bhīmasenara hāthe jadyarathara bāḷa
mukharu śroṇita ye bahai khaḷa khaḷa | 252 |
āmbhe ye ailu bābu tohora tahiṁki | 253 |
boilu ye pāṇḍabe śrikāḷa muhiṁ hāde siṁgha
dekha daśasahasa ratha mohora tule saṁga | 254 |
ẏadeka pratagyāṁ kari kareṇa khaḍaga jhuṇi
āmbhara śira tu ye loḍuthilu hāṇi | 255 |
tuhi ye boluthilu pāṇḍabe kisa mātra
ẏebe kimpā bābu re tuni ye hoilu | 257 |
muhiṁ tumbha dāsraa dāsa bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya | 259 |
janme janme muhiṁ pāṇḍabaṁkara bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya | 261 |

div.note: ẏebe kimpā jadyaratha nisata hoilu |–kha, gha, ṅa, na
sūcimunā śare cirile tāra aṅga

lg.l: duipāda dui pabongte dei bhīmasena uṭhi | 263 |
caraṇa bistāri bīra dilāka ye toḷi
boilā jadyaratha tu yāa ẏehibāṭe gaḷi | 264 |
daśa sahasra rathī thile tāhāra ye tule
bhīmasena kope naba sahasra rathī nāśagale | 266 |
lāje rājyaku na galā sindha naranātha | 267 |
ābara rājyare ye mohora kisa kāryya
janamukha chāhiṁbāku māḍai mote baḍa lāja | 268 |
prāṇanāsa kiṁke mote na kale pāṇḍabe | 269 |
mantrīki boilā re sambhāḷa mora rājya
muhiṁ abaśya khaṭi manāibi biśvanātha debarāja | 270 |
īśvaraṁku niāsi tape basilā sindhu deśa ādhipati | 272 |
śveta banastara madhye rudra nāme giri
se pabongte rahilā bīra tapa ye ācari | 273 |
gaṅgāẏe hāthabhari saṁkalpa kalā jadyaratha bīra
pāṇḍabanta jiṇimi boli bāñcchā kari sebai deba hara | 276 |
draupatī gheni pāṇḍabe keuṁ bane gale | 278 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu draupatīṁki gheni tahuṁ pāṇḍabe chāribīre
se gaṅgāre basi pāṇḍabe kaleka srāhāna
śukḷāmbara śarīra śuddha saṣṭikara prāẏe kāẏe
tu deba prasanna ye saẏaḷa jana cintā
mama janme janme taba caraṇe bhagatā
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa prasanne baradātā | 285 | | 2183 |

div.note: aṅga śīrṇṇa kari rājā basilā bibāniśi |–kha, na, ṇa, ṭha
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa kapilā nībadātā |–ṭa, ṇa

div.head: {@abhimanya janma o nahuṣa upākhāna@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho caitana nandīkeśvara bane nandīkeśvara sebi
rahile nicinte pāṇḍabe se nityakarma bhābi | 1 |
sohodrā dropatī khaṭile ye santāna nimante | 2 |
prasanne baradile kisa tāṁku ye debakāśī
sohodrā debī tahiṁ ye hoile garbhabāsī | 3 |
kumara rāśi hoilāka rohiṇī ye br̥ṣa | 6 |
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa byatipāta nāme yoga

lg.note: prasanne baradile kisa tāṁku ye bhoḷāliṅga kāśī |–ḍa, ḍha
lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba boile āmbhe adhārmika paṇe
aneka bāra paśā kheḷi rājyabhāra hārilu akāraṇe | 12 |
dropatī boile mote na hasibe kemante
nakuḷa boilā mote dekhiṇa se hasi
muhiṁ ye kicchi kari nuārai bane paśi | 14 |
adabhmate hāsya tu kalu ho kāhāku | 15 |
sahadeba boilā deba kāhiṁki karu bhrānti
muhiṁ yahiṁki hasili ho śuṇimā nr̥pati | 16 |
dvārakāẏe aneka ucchaba karāuchanti deba hari
arjunaku putra prāpata hou keuṇa bāge | 20 |
ante pañchu putra hoiba dropatīra tahiṁ | 21 |
lg.note: yujheṣṭhi debe boile āmbhe dhārmika paṇe |–ṭa, cha, ḍha, ḍha, ñja
ānaku hāsya nāhiṁ mo śuṇa nr̥pabara |
lg.l: sabhāẏe hiḍimbikī dropatīṁki śāpa dilā rāge
abaśya śiracchedana hoiba sehi śāpa yoge | 22 |
parama yogī hoi se khaṭilā biśvanātha | 23 |
bhīmasena bīryye jāta hoilā baḷī ye belāḷa
nāgāntaka puruṣa hoi se rahilā pātāḷa | 24 |
rākṣasa prakr̥ti hoi rahilā se asuraṁka meḷe | 25 |
ẏeḍe baḍa bongśa ye buḍucchi akāraṇa | 26 |
indra debatāẏe ye rāile sapata manu
kāla kāma aja sura kapiḷa abhaẏe manuśeti
ẏe sāteheṁ aṭanti śaśīdhara brahmāratahuṁ jāta | 28 |
tāhākaiṁ boile tu yāa madhyasvarga deśa | 29 |
pāṇḍaba bongśe ye dhanurjaẏe pātha utapatti
se arjunara bīryye sohodrāra garbhe tumbhe hua jāta
somabongśakaiṁ uddhāraṇa hou tumbha kalā kr̥tya | 31 |
ẏehi somabongśe se puruṣa aṭanti ādi
śrīnārāẏaṇa achanti nā tāhāṁku bara sampādi | 32 |
lg.note: pārthibara bongśe ye dhanurjaẏe pātha utapatti |–ja, ca, tha, ṭa, jha, ka, jha
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁkara bhaẏeṇī subhadrāra kānta |–cha, ṇa, na, ṭha
somabongśakaiṁ dhāraṇa tu huasi yathārtha |–ka, jha
lg.l: indra debatā bacane se puruṣa abhaẏe manu
se āsi janama hoilā arjunara tanu | 33 |
dakṣiṇa pāṇi ātroṣiṇa praḷamba bāma muṣṭa | 34 |
abhimanyu boli nāma dileka hr̥de guṇi | 36 |
ẏekapāda deiṇa yahuṁ jāta hoilā kumāra
tāḷe pariyante dvārakā nāśilā mahīki se hoilāka bhāra | 37 |
āsibāra beḷe abhaẏe manu boilā brahmāṁkara āge
mote āṇimuṁ tu svargaku dvādaśa baraṣa bhitara | 40 |
indra debatā boile āmbhe māguachuṁ tote
abhaẏe manu boilā muṁ yāucchi caudabaraṣaku adhikārī
tu mote na āṇile āsibiṭi hari arjuna saṁhāri | 42 |
adaẏe manu boile pandara baraṣaku ẏekādine paśile
pāṇḍabongka śira cchedibaiṁṭi tāhāṁkara pure thile | 43 |
lg.note: mahā brahmakettā boli jāṇile catrapāṇi |–cha, ṭha, jha
pādeṇa jāta ye hoilā kumāra |–ca, ga, ja; ṅa, jha, ḍha
tāḷeka pariyante lahasilā mahībhāra |–ja, ṅa, ḍha, jha

lg.l: indra boile na thibu pandara baraṣaku madhyasvarge
sehu nārāẏaṇa tote paṭhiāi sinā buddhiyoge | 45 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu pūbongra ẏeheneka kathā
pādeṇa janmilā se ye na paḍilā bhūmi
tu yāhā pucchākalu ho manu mārataṇḍa

lg.note: janma hoi na kāndilā mahābrahmi |–ñja, ta, cha, ca

lg.l: maṇikuṇḍaḷa pabongta acchi tahiṁra ye taḷa | 57 |
kaṇaẏakūṭa baṭa achai tahiṁ īśānakoṇe thiti
se maṇikūṭa pabongte thāi ye ẏekai bajrakīṭa
kalpaāṣya kīṭa se kāẏā tā atuṭa | 59 |
naẏana birājai ki timiri bidāraṇa maṇi | 60 |
śuddha saṣṭaka parāẏe diśai tāhāra piṭhi jhaḷi | 62 |
saẏaḷa tāraṇa se aśoka asaṁkhya abhoga alekha | 65 |
ajapā gāẏatrī se ye mahāmantra sādhi | 66 |
lg.note: śuddha saṣṭika parāẏe diśai catrapāṭi |–ṭa, ca, ñja, jha, ta
jibyā birājaiṁ ye poẏeḷā raṁga jhaḷi |–tha, ga, ka, jha, ḍha
praḷaẏa ubhāraṇa se aśeṣa abhoga |–ka, ḍha, jha, ga, ta, ṇa, cha, ñja

lg.l: sahasra baraṣe kāṭai śāḷagrāma śiḷā goṭiẏeka | 67 |
āhāra maithuna nidrā tiniki se bañchi
mahayoge basi se śiḷāṁkara mūrtti rañchi | 68 |
maha raudra mūrtti śiḷā nīḷāmbara mūrtti
praśurāma ananta subarṇṇa matsa kaṁ barehā kr̥tisādhya | 74 |
gaṇḍukī nadīre se pakāi bajrakīṭa kāṭi | 77 |
ẏesaneka samārjane se śiḷāṁkara rūpa jāṇi
ẏesaneka mahimāṁ se pokaṁkara mūrtti jāṇi
aneka mūrtti kehi kaḷaṇā na yāi puṇi | 80 |
se nadīre srāhāna karanti yete jana
sabuṁkari śarīra diśai śuddha ye subarṇṇa | 81 |
rahile yujheṣṭhi hiraṇya giri pabongtara taḷe | 82 |
sehi hiraṇya pabongta sapata yojana āẏatana | 83 |
dhabaḷa kamaḷa se ye lohita piṁgaḷa | 84 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābu śuṇa brikodara
saṁkalpa śrāddha karibā ye āja pitr̥deba kāryya
gaṇḍā goṭiẏe māriāṇa re mohora sānuja | 86 |
kirāta rūpa dhari se paṇḍaba baḷabantā | 88 |
kaṇṭā bāẏeṁśa guṇa phiriki nārāja kari | 89 |
lg.note: bihaḍai pāṇḍabe ẏe hiraṇya nāme bana |–cha, kha, ṇa, na
bihaḍai pāṇḍaba ye gahana araṇya |–ka, ñja
kaṇṭā bāẏeṁśa guṇa phiriki kaṭāri |–ṅa, cha, ṭa

lg.l: gaṇḍāreṇa kāryya tāra na mārai bīra tāhā | 92 |
gaṇḍāra namante se bhramai dibā ye raẏeṇī | 93 |
śiṁśapā br̥kṣa mūḷe biśrāmai māẏā ye kirata | 95 |
candana banikā se ye baḍāi biṭapa
śraddhāẏe māruti bhramai tahiṁ mane niśaṁkā | 98 |
bahuta kautuke bhīma dekhai tahiṁ bana
bichārai māruti ye rājapada aṭai ẏethaku sāmānya | 100 |
se nadīra tīre ye pacchima mūrati
mahābiṭapa araṇya dekhi se pāṇḍaba māruti | 101 |
lg.note: dvādaśa yojana pariyante diśai banasta banikā |–ca, ṭha, ja, ñja, ta

lg.l: dui pabongta madhyare sarpeka acchi paḍi
tini māsare lāṅguḍa se āṇai guḍiāi
yisa jība paḍai bhakṣapāna karai sehi | 104 |
bhīmasenakaiṁ se ye āṇi kalā garbhagate
goḍara katihuṁ āṇṭhu yāẏe acchi giḷi
ātreṣi gḷai se pabanahuṁ bega kari | 109 |
yujheṣṭhi pratikāra kara boli ḍākai nisate | 110 |
yahuṁ sumarilā bhīma yujheṣṭhi deba nr̥pa
yeṇu se yujheṣṭhi boliṇa karṇṇare śuṇilā
āho māhātamā keẏe tu kāhāku hāki
tohora mukhe ta paḍi ḍākai tahiṁpāiṁ | 116 |
bhīmasena boilā ẏehi nikaṭe chanti rahi | 117 |
sarpa boilā āṇṭa kari ḍāka āsantu mahātamā
tāhāre kāraṇa acchi se āsantu puruṣaṁka uttamā | 118 |
mahārsapa bolai muṁ na giḷai tote
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku bheṭāi pāribu ki mote | 119 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile na kaha tu kimpe muku | 123 |
ẏekalaẏe kari se chāhiṁlā dharmarāẏe mukha
muhiṁ tohora uparabongśara ṭhākura aṭai hāde
kahuṁ kahuṁ śarīra tāra hoilā pallabaṇa
mahāsarpa rūpa nāśagalā tāhāra ye kāẏa
satya tretaẏā dvāpara tniyugara kaṣṭa galā phiṭi
yujheṣṭhi deba pachārile śuṇa ho puruṣa
kebaṇa pātaka kala tora ẏete kaṣṭa doṣa | 131 |
mohora carita śuṇa ho thira hoi basa | 132 |
rebatī nakṣatra ye bhogya se dinara | 133 |
arka daita duhitā nāma aṭe satyabatī
kāmaseṇā rūpadhari se tīrthe dhyāi basi
mohe baśya kari se sabongjana nāśi | 136 |
nāstikale rākṣāsuṇī na puṇa āmbhanta bhakṣi | 139 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi brahmabīryya se rākṣāsuṇī raja
aneka janajantu go brāhmaṇa bhakṣapāna kalā | 145 |
amr̥tākṣa puruṣa boḷi candraku dilā dhāḍi

div.note: mukha darpaṇa kari candraku thāi chāhiṁ | 147 |
kāmaseṇā rūpe manuṣya nāhiṁ pāśe
sadyuṁ putra gotiẏe hoilā utapatti |–ta, ñja
tahuṁ utapatti hoilā brahma rākṣasa mahāteja |–ñja, ta, ja
guhāri kalā candra debata purandara sabhāẏe |–ca, jha

lg.l: tu mote śaraṇa ye rakha debarāẏe | 150 |
indra debatā boilā tāku hariāṇa ho haritāḷi
muhiṁ māribi brahmarākṣasaku tu nuhasi bikaḷi | 151 |
pratipadā dina puṇa ṭāki basicchi ākāśa | 154 |
pratipadā dina na diśilā śukḷāmbara śarī | 155 |
dutīẏā dina candra hoile kiñchita prakāśa | 156 |
aḷapa ude hoiṇa se hoile gopyaṁgata 157 |
tr̥tiẏā dina se kahile indra debatāṁku
indra debatā boile tu āja hoibu udaẏe
māribi durāntaka asura tu huasi nirbhaẏe | 159 |
se tr̥tīẏā dina puṇi candra udaẏa hoilā
dekhiṇa se durāntaka kope dhāḍi dilā | 160 |

div.note: tu deba trailokya digapāla ākhaṇḍaḷa

lg.l: siṁha māsa śukaḷa pakṣa ye cauṭhī rātrikāḷa
se brahmarākṣasa niśāpatiki āsi karilā kaṭāḷa | 162 |
indra debata thile ye candrara pachakati
brahma daitaku māile bajra ye śakati | 163 |
ākāśe dhuni śubhilā ho indra kaleka brahmahatyā | 165 |
śarīra mahājāḷā kalā mānasarobare yāiṁ paśi | 166 |
naḷinī sarobara madhyare indra yāiṁ paśi
tadyāpi śarīta tara śītaḷa na prakāśi | 169 |
śarira śītaḷa hoi aneka kāḷa rahilā tahiṁra | 170 |
brahmahatya doṣe indra helā ẏebe gopya | 171 |
digapāḷe na caḷile na pāḷile meghe | 172 |

div.note: sakaḷa aniryāpa hoilā medinī |–ṭa, ga, ñja, tha, ca, jha, ḷa

lg.l: sacarācara nāśa yāucchiṭi deba indrara abhābe | 174 |
sahasre barasa hoile svarge nāhiṁ maghabāna
meghe na pāḷanti pr̥thī hoilā nāśapāna | 175 |
pitā boile tāra nihāi pārahoai brahmahatyā doṣa
tini bhmabane rājā ẏebe hoithāu naghoṣa | 176 |
pitāmahaṁka caraṇe se kalāka aneka pūjā | 178 |
bidhātāẏe boile tu ẏebe śuṇasi naghoṣa
ẏebe hāde se indradebatā brahmahatyā doṣe
sahasra baraṣa hoilā nāhiṁ indra ye ākāśe | 180 |
bābu trailokyaku dhāraṇa ẏe aṭai tora bongśa
purandara pada se ye pāilā naghoṣa

div.note: sahasre baraṣa hoilā svarge nāhiṁ indra daibata
subidhāna kari ẏebe pāla ye ākāśa | tha, na, ka, ḍha, jha, ñja

lg.l: ābarttaka sambarttaka droṇa puṣkara ādi meghachāri | 186 |
rātre br̥ṣṭi kariba ye dibase nirmaḷa
tini tini bhāga kari baraṣiba merustaḷa | 188 |
anīti br̥ṣṭi na kariba ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe | 190 |
indakaiṁ gāḷī debeṭi janajantu dukha pāile | 192 |
mr̥tu maṇḍaḷa loke yemante karanti bāñcchā
samaẏe jāṇi na baraṣile indraku debe gāḷi
yemanta apachāti mote na hoiba mahīsthaḷī | 194 |
meghe boile yebaṇa bhūmire śasya upujai yemante
dhātu mātubāẏe kari āmbhe baraṣibu temante | 195 |
bandha na bānddhakari māribeṭi yebe dhāna
se doṣe āmbhanta kṣobha na karibu maghabāna | 196 |
naghoṣa boile mithunara pakṣe kakaḍāra māse

div.note: niti prati br̥ṣṭi kariba merusthaḷa |–ca, ṅa, ṭha

lg.l: hemanta rutu ẏetheṁ na kariba br̥ṣṭi
kumbhara pakṣe gheni ye ṣāṭhiẏe dibase | 203 |
śiśira rutu ẏehu kumbhara pakṣe gheni
baraṣā śarada hemanta śiśira basanta grīṣama
ẏesaneka phaḷadāẏe kariba jane hoibeka susti
śasya hāni tumbhe na kariba pr̥thī | 210 |

div.note: ẏe chaḍarutu ye yāhāra dine dine kariba udaẏa karma |–ja, ṭa
ẏemanta phaḷadāẏaka hoiba basumatī |–ṅa, ṭa, ta, ñja

lg.l: ye yāhāra rutu gheni yebe na pāḷiba
bolibe naghoṣa indra dilā nānā sukha | 212 |
śasya hāni hoiba durbhikṣa hoibaṭi yebe
bolibe naghoṣa indra kiṁpe hoileka svarge | 213 |
ye yāhāra bidhāna karāiba tumbhe thāiṁ | 215 |
naghoṣa cirāñchana kathā rahithāu sakaḷa digare | 216 |
pr̥thibīre anīti ye na karibe rājāmāne | 217 |
aṣṭa uttara śate bhāga karibe hāde kr̥ṣi
rājāku āṭhabhāga ye parajāṁku bhāga aśi | 218 |
madhya hoiṇa tahiṁ koḍiẏe bhāga thoithiba
sehu mañji hoiba tāhā kṣetare buṇāheba | 219 |
yeuṁ parajā ẏemanta kari kara na deba rājā
sunāku yāhāra iccha bāṭike cināẏe sañjā | 220 |

div.note: pajāṁku anīti ye na karibe rājāmāne |–ṅa, ṭa
śaẏe aṣṭabhāga ẏemante karibe parajā
ye abā ẏemanta sañjā na karibe rājā
ye abā sañjādeba ẏemanta kari prajā

lg.l: āho caitana ẏemanta boli kari naghoṣa āgyāṁ dilā
se svāmīra āgyāṁ kehu meṇṭita nuārilā | 221 |
āho yujheṣṭhi ẏesaneka samatā br̥ṣṭi karāi karai muhiṁ rājya
daiba dānabanta māri na thoili jībante
kicchi upadrapa na thāi tini ye ākāśa | 224 |
rājya subidhāne ghare ghare lakṣmī bije
bārasvti bhmabana prāẏe diśai samasta rājye | 226 |
ẏesanaka sampada se naghoṣa indra rājya
praśurāma sārikṣa se birājai jāṇa teja | 230 |

div.note: śrīrāma parā kari nahuṣa āgyāṁ dilā |–ṭa, ṅa
kāhāri upadrapa nāhiṁ tinideśa |–ta, ñja
parajāẏe pukhī ghare ghare lakṣmī bije |–ja, ṅa, ṭha

lg.l: amare ucchba makara śukaḷa tr̥tīẏāra dina
dekhiṇa ātmā mora heu kinā toṣi | 236 |
āmbhe bīṇā bādya karibuṁ kāhāra chāmure | 237 |
mohora chāmure nr̥tya kale muṁ hoibi triputi | 238 |
muhiṁ abā kisa tote nuārai dei
mohora chāmure kiṁpe tora nr̥tya na yogāi | 239 |
nārade boile tuhi kisa debu rājā
śacī thile sinā tote āmbhe karantunā pūjā | 240 |
debaidnra pada tote na śohai amara | 241 |
āho naghoṣa se śacī aparṇṇā ye svargaku mūḷastambha
āditye saṁgyā dharme medha ye sumedhā | 245 |
bhrathāẏe nāśa yāānti kaḷapī aṭanti sehi | 253 |

div.note: meghe bijaẏā ye sapatāṅge piṅgaḷā | ka, tha, ga, jha
suṣkara nandinī nirañjane kapiḷā |–ta, ñja
ẏemante sabuṁkara kaśyapagotrī meḷā |–kha, na
mr̥tyupiṇḍa gheni basithāānti aẏeṁḷā br̥kṣataḷe |–kha, na, ga, jha

lg.l: āho caitana nāradaṁka bacane naghoṣa nr̥pati
aneka upahāra gheni se bijaẏe śacīkati | 255 |
naghoṣa boile tu amaraku ādi aṭu
muhiṁ amarādhi nātha tu kiṁpe mote na khaṭu | 256 |
yibā āmbhe chāla go amara bārasvatī | 257 |
tu debī abiḷāṣī go hoibu mohori | 259 |
muhiṁ indraku kahai tu bāhuḍiṇa yāa yā | 260 |
ẏe tohora sandeśa bāre purandara āge kahuṁ | 261 |
se padmanāḍa bhitare debī gale paśi
dekhai indra debatā trodhe chanti basi | 264 |

div.note: naghoṣa boile tu amaraku pāṭarāṇī aṭu |–ṅa, ca, ṭa, ṭha
tu debī abiṣekī hoibunā mohori |–jha, ga, ḍa, ka, ḍa, tha
śacīra bacane ye naghoṣa bāhuḍiṇa galā

lg.l: naghoṣa indra mote pāṭe gheni basite loḍucchi amara | 265 |
indra boile go debī ye tohora icchā
muhiṁta mahādoṣī tu pārile hoa rakṣā | 266 |
anādi aparṇṇā tu jāṇu sabong buddhi
satya dhārmika tu jāṇu samasta buddhi siddhi | 267 |
tohora buddhibeḷe tu rakṣā hua satī
samaẏa jāṇi prāṇīmāne go sahanti bipatti | 268 |
ẏe mohora mukha go chāhāṁnteṇa baḍadoṣa
niścaḷa rājya mohora chāḍa tu manabhrānti | 271 |
śacī boile tu yebe mote nemuṁ
mohora bākya tu dr̥ḍhabrata kari śuṇimuṁ | 272 |
samasta debatāṁka bhmabane bulibu mote gheni | 273 |
naghoṣa bhāriyā śacī boli jāṇime samasta debagaṇa | 274 |
samasta brahmāṇḍe āmbhe yibā rāsa kheḷi | 275 |
muhiṁ debarājā tāhā karibi nāhiṁki sata | 276 |

div.note: bho indra naghoṣa mote pāṭe gheni basite loḍai
nahuṣa indra hoilā boli bolibe tribhmabana |–ḍa, ḍha

lg.l: mukuiṁ indrapada dile ye sakaḷa brahmāṇḍa | 277 |
śacī debīẏe āsibe ye tumbhara parasanne
tebe se cirarājya mora amara svargastāne | 278 |
digapāḷe boile ẏe āmbhara satya satya
tu yāhā boilu āmbhe karibu niẏata | 279 |
udaṇḍa goṭāẏe gheni mohora āge thiba dhātā | 280 |
īśvara debatā kare dharithibe dhabaḷa chatī
pabana debata chāmara dharithibe mora kati | 281 |
kobera debatā bāibe dundubhi bādya dhuni | 282 |

div.note: tu yāhā boilu āmbhe baribu nirutānta |–ḍha, jha, ga, ka, ḍha
kubera debatā thibe abhiṣeka yogāḍa gheni |–ca, ja
“sannidhyere khaṭithibe sakaḷa debatāẏe”
baruṇa debatāẏe thibe kanaka daṇḍa dhari
puṣkara debatāẏe thibe koṭiẏe ghenikari |
candra sūryya thibe ābara satāiśa nakṣatre
tithibāra karaṇa graha yoga sahite |
daśadigapāḷe meru hemabanta ādikari
digamegha yoge biśvadebaẏe svaẏaṁbari |
caturddaśa bidyāẏe siddhasādhaka aṣṭbasu loke
ẏe bidhi pramāṇe debatāṁka nāma kahibi keteẏeke |

lg.l: utsabara kāḷe samasta debe temanteheṁ khaṭile | 285 |
brahmarusi rājarusi samaste prabeśa hoileka yāiṁ
bolai naghoṣa ye binaẏa bhāba hoi | 288 |
śacī gheni bije karithibi muṁ hāndoḷā upara | 290 |
tohora caraṇe āmbhe sabhiẏeṁ karibu pūjā | 191 |
tohora bacana āmbhe kehne bhāṅgibu ẏetebeḷe | 292 |
āmbhe dine dukha pāile tu kāḷaka hoibu susta | 293 |
teteke yebe tuhi sabongdā hou sukhī | 294 |
śrīkare daṇḍa bīṇā dhari nārada maharuṣi
dibya abatāra hoiṇa se naghoṣa nr̥pati

lg.note: kubera yogāḍa ye īśvara udaṇḍa |–ja, ṭha, na
bhr̥gu marddaḷa bajānti śutra ye kaṁsāḷa |–ñja, jha, ḍha, ka, tha, kha, na, ga, ta, ḍa, ṇa, cha
sehi bahinele indra bhmabana priyante |–kha, ṇa, na, jha, ja, ṅa

lg.l: phuṭileni ḍare kāndha na dianti kehi | 305 |
aneka haraṣe se debabhmabane arghya pāi

lg.note: teṇukari tāhāṁkara śarīre baḷaprāṇa brākarma nāhiṁ
śuṇa baibasuta manu ruṣimāne pabana kandamūḷa bhmañji
teṇu kari tāhāṁka śarīre niprāṇe śrama upuji |
ke jaḷa ādhāra ke aḷapa āhāre bañchi
ke sātakalpa pariyante ādhāra na bhakṣi |
tapa se tāhāṁkara ādhāra nidrā maithuna
śūnya pabana bhakṣi tāhāṁkra dehi śīrṇṇa |

lg.l: śuṇa he yujheṣṭhi palyaṁke beje karile naghoṣa
aneka ratna aḷaṁkāra gheni hārābatī ye bandāi | 314 |
uṭha uṭha boli naghoṣa piṭile nei bāḍi | 316 |
svalpa ho svalpa ho boli pātile muni hāthe
puṇihiṁ ḍaṅgeka nei piṭile nirddaẏā bhābacitta | 317 |
sarpa ho sarpa ho boli bikaḷe bolai sehi | 318 |

lg.note: śuṇa he yujheṣṭhi rāja indrapada hāde ẏeḍeka dullabha
gyāna hārante puṇa paḍi naraka ghorai |
“aneka ratna alaṁkāra gheni hārābatī ye bandāi”
ẏemante naghoṣa indra samasta bhmabane rāsa kheḷi

lg.l: kemante mukati hoibi kaha he brahmadvijā | 320 |
aṣṭabatra boile ho śuṇa naghoṣa nr̥pabara
tahuṁ ākāśa teji muṁ paḍili banaste
naghoṣa boile bābu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
tu mohora bongśara hāde aṭu suputra goṭi | 324 |
nakṣatreka hoi se ude hoileka svarge
aneka sambhabonge se basile gagana mārge | 327 |
naghoṣa sarpa hoilā aṣṭabatra kahuṁ kahuṁ | 329 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu agasti ye kahi
brahma datya nāśi indra thile gopya hoi | 330 |
brahmahatyā kari nīḷendī sarobare lucithile bhale
indra boile brahmarākṣasa candraku dilā dhāḍi
pitāmaha boile tote dilāra achaiṁ daṇḍa
duṣṭa dīnabanta tuhi sinā karibu bikhaṇḍa | 335 |
dhātāẏe boile nāhiṁ tote brahmahatyā doṣa | 336 |
candrara bacane se nāśilu brahma ye daitā
māneṇa prabhāsara jaḷe yāiṁ gopyāna hoilāka śaśī | 339 |
teṇu se upujāta hoai pr̥thibīre sabongśasya | 340 |
candra ye naṣṭa hoai amābai dina
sedina śasyamāna upujile āhāra hoai abaśya kṣīnna | 341 |
śasya na upujai santānahiṁ na upujai | 342 |
śuṇa ho caitana candra debatā na thile
candra bihūne ye aneka śasya galā nāśa
candra na thile na śohai tini ye ākāśa | 344 |
samasta āstāna kari basile prabhāsara jaḷe | 345 |
lg.note: pāpīloka duṣṭajanaṁku hāde dilaiṁ mr̥tudaṇḍa |–ḍa, ḍha

lg.l: boile āho candra debatā tu kimpe nohu ude
candra boilā muṁ nāśa karāili brahma ye rākṣasa
mohore se māilā indrara kisa doṣa | 348 |
yugate brahmahatyā doṣa muhiṁ se hāde kali
teṇu kari ākāśe muṁ udaẏe nohili | 349 |
muhiṁ hāde udita nohili teṇu kari | 350 |
debatāẏe boile tu sabongdāhiṁ nohu doṣī
yebaṇa dine brahmarākṣasaku badha karāilu śaśī | 351 |
hāḍiāṇī dine tu indra debatāṁku bheṭi | 352 |
sehina brahmahatyā doṣī tu huasi niśāpati | 353 |
sehina yete loka chāhiṁbe tora mukha
se bahmatyā doṣa tāṁku lāgiba pratakṣa | 354 |
canda boile satya tretā dvāpara yugara
ẏe tiniyuga loke bañchibe se dinara | 355 |
tini yuga anteṇa hoiba yuga kaḷi

lg.note: sehina tu brahmahatyā doṣī ye huasi
lg.l: se kaḷiyuge saṁsāra nāśayiba ye ẏemante
brahmāẏe boile śāhāsra bebhāre ẏehā śuṇi
ẏe caturtha khaṇḍa mahābhārata śuṇimāka śrabaṇe
taba doṣa bādhā hāde na kariba teṇe | 361 |
teṇu se hāḍiāṇī chāndanāma bahilāka śaśī | 362 |
haritāḷi āṇi nāśa karāilā cauṭhīra dina
tada doṣe haritāḷikā nāma bahile candra jāṇa | 363 |
rājā abā dhanī mūrkha daridra paṇḍita
ẏehāṁka doṣa khaṇḍiba śuṇile śrī mahābhāratha | 365 |

lg.note: teṇu se hāḍiāṇī cauṭhī baḍaedoṣī |–ta, ñja
tata doṣe haritāḷikā nāma bahile candra jāṇa |–ca, ṭha
lg.head: {@dātā karṇṇa upākhyāna@}

lg.l: arjuna ye aneka sebā kalāka ubongśīki | 1 |
sehu puṇa kāraṇa pāilā ṭiki svarge
ẏethira carita mote kahibāka muni bege | 2 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti brahmabettā
tahiṁ debī draupatī ye hoile rajobatī
se tīrtha tejyākari debī antare rahanti | 4 |
ẏemantara samaẏe śrī bhāgabata pustaka ye gheni
gaṇḍukī tīrthe yujheṣṭhiṁki bheṭile śuka brahmamuni | 6 |
yujheṣṭhi debe dekhi kale tāṁka pādapūjā
nabatana basana puṣpa pāṇi ye akṣata
pustaka pheḍiṇa śuṇāile śrī biṣṇuye purāṇa
aneka dharma kathā śuṇāile yujheṣṭhi āgeṇa | 9 |
yujheṣṭhi debe ye śuka muniṁki bacana pachāri
amara svargapura yāẏe yiba ki he tapachārī | 10 |
lg.note: pūjāpāi kr̥ṣṇāñjina chāle basile tapobanta | ṭa, na, ga, cha, ṇa, kha

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debaṁka bacane caḷile śuka maharuṣi
amarābatī bhmabane mahātmā prabeśa hele āsi | 12 |
apacharīṁka meḷe arjuna stirī rūpe kācchi | 16 |
gaṇikā rūpe nr̥tya karai bīra phālaguni
ẏe nr̥tya karantā muni ho se pratakṣe bibatsa | 19 |
arjuna mukha chāhiṁ nr̥tye moha hoile apakṣarī
bābu āmbhe kalpe kalpe sādhilu ẏehu bidyā
guṇaku bhābile debatā prastābe ye acchi | 22 |
lg.note: premikā rūpe nr̥tya karai bīra phālaguni |–jha, ḍa, ta, ka, ñja

lg.l: arjuna boile āna bare kāryya nāhiṁ
ubongśī boile tote puruṣa lakṣaṇa hou parāpata
ubongśī boile muṁ ẏehāku kalāiṁ paramārtha
mohora bipāka karme ẏe mote nohilā parāpata | 28 |
rāgeṇa boili napuṁsaka lakṣaṇa re pātha hou tuku | 29 |
arjuna boilā tu mohora nija mātā
muhiṁ yebe tohora śāpya pāiṇa na thānti
abaśya dvanda huantā muṁ sañchaẏe nāśayānti | 33 |
tu mohora mātā go guṇe guṇa hitā
ẏe dusaha kaṣanuṁ mote tuhi se uddhārantā | 34 |
lg.note: kaleka apacharīmāne mote kaṭaḷa apāre |–ka, ca, ga, jha
amara biḷāsuṇi saburi saṅge prīti yehu hvanti |–ja, ca

lg.l: ẏebe tote puruṣa lakṣaṇa hou parāpata | 36 |
ubongśī boile śuka tumbhe sābadhāne śuṇa
ẏe nr̥tya śikhāilu ẏehāku hoi baḍa guṇa | 37 |
birāṭa rājye ajñātabāse bañchibe baraṣe teradina pariyante
śuṇiṇa prama sānanda ye hoilā ubongśī
ẏeghānti hou tāku pañchu putra parāpata | 43 |
arjjune nemāku dharme śuka muniṁki peṣile | 45 |
tahuṁ indra debatā biśvadeba pañcha puruṣanta rāi
dropatī udare tumbhe prabeśa hoa yāiṁ | 46 |
pārthibara bongśe tumbhe pāñcheheṁ hoa jāta

lg.note: yāasi phālaguni jagujane jaẏe hoasi |–ka, ḍha, gha

lg.l: bābu nr̥tyare mohilu mote baramāga phālaguni | 48 |
arjuna boilā āna bare kāryya nāhiṁ
bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa abhedakapaca karṇṇatahuṁ āṇi debaṭi gosāiṁ | 49 |
aneka puruṣārtha kaleka arjunaku amare surapati
dhanya arjuna boli mukhe cumbana dianti | 50 |
āho yujheṣṭhi deba bije kariachanti gaṇḍukī nadī sannidhyāne
tahiṁ yāiṁ prabeśa hoile puṣyeka bimāne | 53 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara yete dūruṁ diśilā āsana
dekhile arjuna śire acchi mukuṭa kiraṭī | 55 |
lg.note: āsa āsa bhāi re tu mamaprāṇa goṭi |
pāẏe āsi pāẏe paḍi puṇa kare niuchāḷi
koḷe basāiṇa cumbana ye dyanti mukhagoṭi
arjuna pāde namile sahadeba ye nakuḷa |
kāhuṁ pāilu bābu re ẏe mukuṭa kiraṭī |
lg.l: bābu arjuna re ẏe mukuṭa pāilu tu kāhiṁ
indra gobinda binuṁ āna bahantā kehi nāhiṁ | 56 |
arjuna boilā deba nibongātakapaca badha arthe
yujheṣṭhi boile na puṇa kopa karanti bāsudeba
bābu arjuna re sohodra koḷe hoilā putra jāta
sahadeba kahile āmbhe nihāi karuṁ satya | 59 |
śrīhari aile se jāṇimā bāratā tattu kari
tahiṁ yāiṁ prabeśa hoile deba janārddane | 62 |
hari boile ẏe brahmajāti śāḷagrāma śiḷā
bābu pādeṇa ṭhelāiṇa kiṁpā karuacha nāṭa kheḷā | 65 |
bhīmasena boilā ke tumbhara śiḷā cihni
duigiṭi piṭile ẏetha bāhāra hoẏe agni | 66 |
lg.note: hariṁki saṁketa re kara sahadeba |–ka, ḍha, kha, ḍa, na
yujheṣṭhiṁka bacane arjuna nārāẏaṇaṁku sumari |–ṭa, ṭha, ja
lg.l: pādare ghaṣile hāde chāḍai baḍa maḷi
hīrāhiṁ paḍile tāhā se jāṇima keuṇa mate | 68 |
nabalakṣa māṛha subarṇṇa gauḍaṁku śrīrāma bandhādile
śrīhari boile ẏe debatā ananta mūrati
bhīmasena boilā mu prakr̥ti śaṁkā karai nitye ẏethi | 70 |
ẏehā śuṇi hasile ye deba hr̥ṣīkeśa
agyānī mūḍhaṁkara debatāẏe na dharanti doṣa | 71 |
aneka binoẏī ye bahuta tusti boli
yujheṣṭhi debe ye bahuta kalyāṇa bāñccha
samasta kuśaḷa ye pachāranti deba dharme
gobinde boile deba arjunara hoilāka putra janme | 75 |
trailokya sundara ye aṭai sehu tanu
guṇabanta dekhi tāhāra nāma diluṁ abhimanyu | 76 |
lg.note: bhīmasena hātharu ghenile banamāḷī |–ṇa, kha, gha

lg.l: bābu tuhi ye, muhiṁ se aṭaiṁ ẏeka ātmā
ẏe kiraṭī mukuṭa bahi nuāratni bedabrahmā | 79 |
indra gobinda āmbhe hoithilu sinā beni
tote gheni ẏebe āmhe hoilu jaṇa tini | 80 |
āna kisa bābu tote dile purandara | 81 |
arjuna boile mote bahuta kale anurāga
boile triputi hoilu pātha bara mote māga | 82 |
lg.note: śrīhari boile to mo nohe bhinma bhinma
ẏe mukuṭa ghenimāku tuhi sinā se bhārjana |
sabuhiṁ śreṣṭha aṭanti yehu deba hara
sehu ẏe kiraṭī mukuṭa bānddha nuāranti śira |
lg.l: muhiṁ boili pitā anugaha yebe hoilā tumbhara
karṇṇaratahuṁ āṇidebuṁ amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa bajrachauṁrī abheda kapaca maṇisāra | 83 |
jagannāthe boile sabhāre yebe thileṭi āditya
tohora nimante karṇṇatahuṁ āṇime tora pitā
yujheṣṭhi boile se ye mahādānī karṇṇa
deba ki na deba karṇṇara tahiṁki gupata rūpe yibā | 92 |
gobinda boile deba kāli muhiṁ yibi
brāhmaṇa rūpa dhariṇa dāna ye māgibi | 93 |
lg.note: gobinde boile deba kemante tadanta bujhibā |–ca, ta, ṅa, ja
lg.l: ẏekagoṭi putra tāra biśi ye keśana
se putra māriṇa yebe bhojana diai muku
tebe se kapaca kuṇḍaḷa deba indra debatāṁku | 95 |
aṅgadeśe prabeśa hoile madhu ye sūdana | 96 |
dvādaśa citā kāṭi śrībatsalāñcchana diśe phuṭi | 98 |
rakata kumuda prāẏe beni ye locana
gaḍu tambāpātrī ye kare japāmāḷi śobhāpānti | 101 |
bhagabanta biprarūpa chadrame hāthare prokṣaṇī surā | 103 |
se janārddana paṇḍāṁkara śrīcaraṇe śaraṇa mora nitya
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa bhakti saṁsāra janahite | 105 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu puruṣa ẏe nārāẏaṇaṁka kautuka
śatebhāra subarṇṇa karṇṇa diai nitye dāna bāḍhi | 107 |
gāḍhe pāda paḍante basudhā pāi trāsa | 108 |
dhīra dhīra kari pāda baḍhāibā nimante
ḍare basudhā lāñcha diai subarṇṇa bhāra śate | 109 |
ẏeteka karṇṇa dāna diai nitye sabu
yugate makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa cauṭhī
rebatī nakṣatra beḷa sāta ghaḍi ghaṭi | 111 |

lg.note: śatebhāra subarṇṇa karṇṇa dāna diai niti
gaha gaha śabada ẏe aṭe sāmabeda
dvārīmāne chāhiṁṇa bacana ye pucchi | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: kṣudhārthī brāhmaṇa hoi ailāni bhojana nimantaku | 115 |
chāragaṇe kahile paṇḍāẏe ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ tumbhaku
niabakāśe ye rājā bije tumbhe āsa bhitaraku | 116 |
brāhmaṇa boilā muṁ na yāiṁ bhitaraku
ẏete boli svāmī gāḍhe sāmabeda dhuni kale
karṇṇa boilā brāhmaṇa aṭai baḍa kakṣābanta
beda ādhyāna karante kampilā mora gātra | 119 |
śrīkare ratnajharī gheniṇa karṇṇa ye āpaṇa
brāhmaṇa boilā āmbhe thāu kinā ẏehiṭhāẏe | 121 |
karṇṇa boilā mote āu kaṭāḷa na karibā
bhojana kari ājaka mohora pure thibā | 122 |
samasta dānadei sārili mora bhāṇḍāre nāhiṁ kicchi
āja kicchi paṇḍāẏe debākaiṁ nuhai kṣama
śatebhāra subarṇṇa muṁ tote debaiṁ ẏekābeḷe | 125 |
aneka kāḷa hoilā muṁ deuacchi dāna
mohora prāẏe dānī tohora prāẏe brāhmaṇaku dāna debi
sāta puruṣa pariyante tohora dāridra na thoibi | 127 |
subhāgya karma tora bheṭilu ye mote
ānabeḷe kāhāku dāna na māgiku taḷahāthe | 128 |
paṇḍāẏe bole tu dāne śūrabanta karṇṇa
rahili ājaka mote tu diasi bhojana | 129 |
temanta kari dei pāribuṭi ki bhojana | 130 |
karṇṇa boilā bipra tote yemanta aṇṭai
muhiṁ se tote bhoḷane triputi karibaiṁ | 131 |
satya saty aṭe mohora satya tinibāra
saṁkalpa kalaiṁ debi yeteka tote aṇṭi | 133 |
brāhmaṇa gheni karṇṇa gale nija purī

lg.note: rahibu āja ho triputi karāa rājana |–ta, ṭa
satyabhagna kale drohī hebi karatāra |–na, ṭha, kha
kapiḷāgāẏatrī badha droha karai karatāra |–ka, ṅa
lg.l: kaneka nimata hāṇḍi āṇi dile yogāḍare
ākhu amr̥ta pāṇi kadaḷī gaṅgabāṇa paiḍa
olua sāru āḷu jirā, heṅgu methi ādikari yogāḍa | 138 |
ṭabhā nāraga lembu br̥kṣaru āṇanti toḷi | 139 |
ẏemante aneka padārtha ke kahiba samārji
kadaḷīpatra āṇi dile yemante bipramana rañji | 140 |
śaucabanta hoi rāndhaṇā kara ho paṇḍāẏe
mote muṇohi nāhiṁ tumbhara bhojana na saribā yāẏe | 142 |
brāhmaṇa boilā tu sārthuka dānī karṇṇa
atithi basāi āpaṇe ki karibu bhojana | 143 |
ẏemāna dekhi tumbhe ki nohila triputi | 144 |
lg.note: yogāḍamāna tu ho kara ye sambhāre |
lg.l: āmiṣa yogāḍa tumbhe loḍa ki paṇḍāẏe
āmiṣa bhojane ẏe piṇḍa hoẏe saddhi | 146 |
karṇṇa boilā ẏe kathā śuṇilā mora nāhiṁ
brāhmaṇa hoi āmiṣa bhakṣa ke karai | 147 |
bābu āmiṣa bañchibāku brāhmaṇa acchi kāhiṁ
pāṇḍi ye bhakṣai pathame āmiṣa aṭai sehi | 148 |
nāma gotra kisa tumbhara kebana deśe ghara | 149 |
gobinda boile ho yamunā nadīra kūḷe
basukalpa paṇḍā boli aṭanti hāde tāta
sākṣāte mohora ye kahnāi paṇḍā nāma | 153 |
kuḷagotra bedamantra kisa kaṣaṇa karu mote
