āmiṣa bhojane se triputi heu āmbhe | 155 |
āre biśikeśana banu māriāṇa hariṇa chāgaḷeka | 156 |
rānddhale paṇḍāẏe tumbhaṁku yemane hoẏe bhojā | 158 |
āura kisa loḍa paṇḍāẏe bolai bīrakarṇṇa | 159 |
brāhmaṇa boile karṇṇa āmbhara citta ẏeṇe na bhaji
brāhmaṇe boile nr̥siṁgha ye bidārile hiraṇa
binā aparādhe mānuṣa kehne karibi chedana | 164 |
brāhmaṇa boile tu ho śuṇa rāẏe karṇṇa
āmbhe na māgilu tuhi se yācidilu bhojana | 165 |
lg.note: narasiṁgha mantre paśilu batrabhābe |–ka, ḍha, tha, ga
dekhiṇa karṇṇa ye kalā mane bhrānti |–ka, ta, ñja
lg.l: āśā dekhāi ye āmbhanta karuchu nirāśa
samasta dharmamāna tora galāṭi ẏebe nāśa | 166 |
muhiṁ ye āśakari rahili tohora bacane
krṇṇa boile putra biśikeśanara mukha chāhiṁ
māriāṇa jaṇe manusya bhojana karantu ẏehi | 171 |
biśikeśana boilā svāmī tote keteke aṇṭiba
māẏākale keśaba samasta jana nagre hoile adr̥śa | 173 |
āpaṇāku gheni pāñchajaṇa dekhai karṇṇa mahārājā | 174 |
lg.note: āpaṇāra baḷa tapa guṇabantapaṇa pare yebe kahiba
tebe se saṁsāradharma tāku prāpata hoiba |
mattagabonge murkhaloke ye ẏemāna āpane bakhāna karanti
dhana dharma rūpa bidyā tīrtha tapa hoi se gopana karithibā
tebe se tāhāku ho samasta samarpibā |
lg.l: brāhmaṇa boilā ho atriẏābanta yebaṇa jana
tāhāra māẏeṁsa āmbhe na karibuṭi bhojana | 175 |
ẏehāṁkara māẏeṁse āmbhe nohuṁ ye triputi | 176 |
nicaẏe āmbhanta yebe debu tu bhojana
ẏehi putragoṭiki tora māri debu ho rājana | 177 |
ẏehāra māẏeṁsa khāile triputi heba manabañcchā
tāhā śuṇi karṇṇa bajraghāta prāẏe paḍigalā mr̥cchā | 178 |
koḷakari pitāku kumāra dhailā ye toḷi
kamaṇḍaḷuṁ nīra nei suñchile deba banamāḷī | 179 |
bedabrāhmaṇa hoi tu hoilu manuṣya māṁsa āśī | 181 |
beda mantra nirjita tu āchāre ẏeḍe lobhi
tohora pāiṁ kemante mohora ẏekāputra goṭiki māribi | 182 |
uṭhante brāhmaṇa biśikeśana yāiṁ koḷāgrata kari
basibā gosāiṁ āmbhanta kiṁpā jhiṁghāsa kari | 184 |
ābara nisata kiṁpā heu pitā karṇṇa | 186 |
karma boli tāta āpaṇe yāhā kari
satyabhagna prāṇīki ye kāhiṁre na bari | 188 |
bho tāta mote māri bhojana diasi brāhmaṇe
ẏehānta triputi karipārile tote achaiṭi bahuta kāraṇe | 189 |
karṇṇa boilā muṁ jāṇiliṇi re bābu
asura dānaba rāṣasa pichāśa datya dānaba re māilu putra sabu | 190 |
biśikeśana boilā tāta brāhmaṇe kiṁpā nindu
yatane baraṇa kari ẏebe kiṁke kāndu | 192 |
basilā kumara ye kr̥ṣṇāñjina chāla māḍi
pūbongku mukha kari hr̥dare śrīhari sumari | 193 |
āho kahnāi paṇḍāẏe ẏehi putrakaiṁ muṁ karucchi cchedana | 194 |
āre āre mora jagujana sundara putragoṭi
debatā brāhmaṇe bhagata tu daẏāsāgara heṭi | 195 |
bābu dāne śūrabantā putra re paradukhe dukhī
duṣṭa asura dhvaṁsiṇa sajjana tapīnta rakhi | 196 |
mohora parāẏe pitā tote janme janme nohu
tohora parāẏe putra mote janme janme hoithāu | 197 |
putrara guṇa sumari karṇṇe gaḍaga dhari jhuṇi
āpaṇāra putra muṇḍaku se khaḍage pakāilā hāṇi | 198 |

lg.note: satyabhagna prāṇī kebeheṁ na tari |–jha, ka
kūṭe khāite ailā samare jiṇita nuāri |–ta, ñja

lg.l: putra nāśagalā mohora tumbhe triputi huasi paṇḍāẏe | 201 |
brāhmaṇa boilā śuṇi jībana tora sādhu sādhu
mātāra sanamata tu kiṁpe karṇṇa kāndu | 202 |
karṇṇa boilā paṇḍā he jātakalā putraku pratipāḷili
sāna sāna khaṇḍikari māẏeṁsa āpaṇe tu keḷā | 204 |
ānaku chuāiṁ na debuṭi ho bīra karṇṇa
sārthuka hoiba rājā tora brāhmaṇa bhojana | 205 |
āho karṇṇa āmbiḷa mahura pācala bhajāẏe chāri
rāṇī āpaṇe rāndhaṇā karu boli boile murāri | 207 |
tohora bhāriyā rānddhale āmbhe karibu bhojana | 208 |
lg.note: kāndai rāṇī rāndhai bāhāre manara birase
subarṇṇa pharuāre muṇḍa pūroi thoilā antapura bāse |
kr̥ṣṇa boile āmbhe duiloka āhānika sāri
chāri tiuṇa kari rāṇī susañcha kariṇa pāci
kṣadra muṇḍa goṭi rāṇī luchāi thoiacchi |
lg.l: āmbhe yibā ho karṇṇa āhānika sāri
chāri tiuṇa kariṇa rāṇī randhana kariacchi
pāda śauca kari deba basile karṇṇakaiṁ gheni | 211 |
biṣṇu biṣṇu boli jaḷa siñchile tatakṣaṇa
āṇa ho kisa rāndhaṇā tumbhara pācana | 212 |
chāmure pākanta ye thoile rāṇī āṇi
chāripatra kari bāḍha boli boile catrapāṇi | 213 |
tu ho bīra karṇṇa patrekeṇa basa | 215 |
karṇṇa boile brāhmana poḍu poḍu mora ātmā
kete jhiṁghāsa mote tu kara ho mahātmā | 216 |
ātmāru jātakalā putra āpane svahaste kali nāśa
muhiṁ chāṇḍāḷa kemante karibi tāhā grāsa | 217 |
na bola paṇḍaẏe tumbhe ẏesaneka bacana
tohora bākya śuṇi mora hr̥daẏa houcchi dahana | 218 |
āho kahnāi paṇḍā tohora caraṇe haẏinī śatebāra
tumbhe bhmañja mote kaṭāḷa na kara | 219 |
brāhmaṇa boile tu yebe na karibu grāsa
tohora bhāriyā abā mote rānddha deuacchi biṣa | 220 |

div.note: tebe se śvarīra mora triputi hoiba | 221 |
ātmāru jātakari kemante bhakṣibi ho mahātmā |–ṭa, ca, ṇa, ja

lg.l: ṭhābakeṇa karṇṇa ṭhābakeṇa basai tāra rāṇī
sādhu sādhu karṇṇa boli bolanti catrapāṇi | 222 |
rāṇī boilā tu mbhe śuṇimā he kahnāi paṇḍāẏe
tumbhara śāhāsre acchi ki ẏemanta kathāẏe | 224 |
pitā mātā māṁsa tāra bhakṣibe kemante | 225 |
yāhā pāi tāhā bhojana ye kari | 226 |
rāṇī boilā rājā trodha ye saṁhara
na jāṇi satyakalu kiṁpā āga tuhi
biṣṇura māẏā ẏehu kahaṇā na yāi | 232 |
tohora citta biḍibā nimante aile ki bhagabāna | 233 |
trodha na kara rājā śāntihua mane

div.note: tahiṁra kārane tohroa pitr̥loke sadagati |–ṭa, ṅa

lg.l: rāṇīra bacane ye karṇṇa helā toṣa
rāṇī tohora patreka māḍi bhmaṁjibasu tora pāśa
rāṇī boilā ye patreka hoilāka muku
karṇṇaku patreka tumbhaṁku patre ārapate rahilā debā ho kāhāku | 237 |
brāhmaṇa boile rāṇī hr̥de dhailu pāpakathā
tohore ta bhāba mote nohilā sarbathā | 238 |
śarīra madhye go sāra aṭe śiragoṭi
tahiṁra māẏeṁsana rānddhalu tohora abhāba cittagoṭi | 241 |
kiẏe brahmā indra rudra kibā bāsudeba | 242 |
karṇṇaku kaṣaṇa ho paḍiachai rakṣākara mahādharma | 243 |
āho kahnāi paṇḍā tohora āge muhiṁ
samasta māẏeṁsa āga delaiṁ prati prati

div.note: atriẏābanta brāhmana chadrama tapugāmī |–ca, ḍha, ka, tha

lg.l: brāhmaṇa boilā rājā tora doṣa nāhiṁ
brāhmaṇa boilā āmbhara āgare rāṇī muṇḍagoṭi checa
kṣudhā baḍa lāguacchi bahana kari pāga sañcha | 251 |
brāhmaṇa karṇṇa duhiṁkari chāmure nei bege kuṭi | 252 |
kāndiṇa rāndhai rāṇī ḍareṇa hoi tūṣṇi
na puṇa brāhmaṇa bhojana chāḍi yāi uṭhi | 253 |
āho āmbiḷa pācala kari beni tiuṇa kalā
lociẏe lociẏe kariṇa se chāriṭhābare bāḍhilā | 254 |
tini ṭhābare basile tini ye parāṇī | 256 |
karṇṇa boilā āreka patre ke bhmañja basiba
brāhmaṇa boiā patreka basiba biśi ye keśana
karṇṇa boilā brāhmaṇa he hoila ki matibhrama | 258 |

div.note: kāndai rāhai rāṇī puṇi ḍare hoẏe tūni

lg.l: brāhmaṇa boile rāṇī pāṇi jharīẏeka gheni
bārikatiki yāiṁ biśikeśana boli ḍākadia beḷa tini | 259 |
ratnajharīẏeka kare gheni bāhāra hoilāka rāṇī
āre āre biśikeśana boli se ucce dilā bāṇī | 260 |
anāstara bāndhaba re jagujana sundara baḷā
āre bābu dukhīra saṁghāta tu mora andhara lauḍi
gaḷā ratnahāra mora ke nelā uchuḍi | 262 |
mukhe basra dei puṇa kāndai mahādeī
aśveka caḍhiṇa kumara chāmure miḷilāka yāiṁ | 263 |
aśvaru uturi kumara mātāṁka carane se loṭi
kāhiṁ thilu bābu mora andhara lauḍi goṭi | 265 |
māgo yamunā tīraku muṁ ye yāithili kheḷi
mohora karṇṇe sambhāilā go tumbhara bobāḷi | 266 |

div.note: “bārikatiki yāiṁ biśikeśana boli ḍākadia beḷa tini”
brāhmaṇara bacana śuṇiṇa mohādeī
śoke gada gada hoiṇa bacana kahai |
khaḍagare putrakaiṁ hāṇile rāẏe bīrakarṇṇa
muṇḍacheci māṁsa kāṭi muṁ kalāiṁ randdhana |
kaṭāḷa na kari tumbhe śuṇa dvijabara
santoṣa hoiṇa muṇohire bijekara |
brāhmana boile rāṇī śuṇa mora bāṇī
putraku tohora māgo ḍāka ẏehikṣaṇi |
brāhmaṇa bacana śuṇi rāṇī ye ḍākilā
āsa biśikeśana re boli ucceṇa boilā |–

lg.l: koḷe dhari rāṇī kākhe basāile baḷā
uṭhiṇa karṇṇa ye brāhmaṇa caraṇe paraṇāmi
mukuhiṁ gocara nohilā tu keuṇa deba svāmī | 268 |
śata sahasra daṇḍabata karṇṇa karai niuchāḷi | 269 |
dekhilā śaṅga catra gadā śāraṅga caturbhmaja
svāmī paramabrahma puruṣa jaẏa tu biśvabāsa
saẏaḷa sodara nātha samasta jana cintā | 274 |
yābata candra dibākara tuhi se uddhārantā | 275 |
māẏādhara puruṣa nātha tu deba catrapāṇi | 276 |

div.note: paramabrahma puruṣa jagata adhikārī
paramabrahma puruṣa nātha yogeṇa yogacintā

lg.l: draśane prasanna nātha, prasanne kāryya siddhi
muhiṁ chāra mānaba nātha tāhā nuārili jāṇi | 281 |
svāmī mohora lalāṭe basu tohora padmapāda goṭi
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śaa sahasra daṇḍa paraṇāmi | 283 |
karṇṇa boilā bho deba svāmī acuta
āna keuṇa janme tote hoithilāiṁ bhagata | 284 |
ẏe janame tote mora kicchi nāhiṁ sebā
mote kebaṇa arthe ẏeḍeka kaṣaṇa dilu bāsudebā | 285 |
bho deba yāhāra kaṣaṇuṁ uturi nuārilā baḷī
bābu pāpī adātabya lokara na yāi āmbhe kati
yahiṁ dharma tahiṁ kaṣaṇa diai yugati | 287 |
bhale kūṭabuddhi tote na kale daite | 288 |
ājahuṁ ẏe putra goṭi thāu āmbhara tule | 289 |
yābata candra dibākara ẏe medinī thiba
ẏehu biśikeśana caṇḍahoi āmbha tuleṇa rahiba | 290 |

div.note: yābata candra dibākara pr̥thibī ye thiba

lg.l: śuklāmbara śiḷā śrīrāma mudrā kr̥ṣṇabarṇṇa saṁjāti | 294 |
tāhā gaṇḍuṣa karāile dhaumya purohite āṇi | 295 |
pañchu bīryye rahilā se hoile garbhabatī | 296 |
āho biśvadeba pañchapuruṣe pūbongra śāpa arthe
se āsi pāñchāḷī garbhe rahile mukati nimante | 297 | | 2847 |

div.head: {@hariścandra mahārājāṅka upākhyāna@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
baḍāi pratāpī se bedapura nagra rājā
catrauñcha dīpe se aṭai ẏeka sāmarathā | 5 |
dharma antara na karai rāja kehuṇisi kāḷe | 6 |
jībaghāta nāhiṁ rājā ẏesaneka āgyāṁ diye | 7 |
rājyabhāra dāna tāra ghena boile purandara | 10 |
beda ādhyāna kale rājāra siṁhadvāre basi
śabade haricandana rājā mane baḍa trāsi | 12 |
brāhmaṇa pāda pakhāḷiṇa rāẏe kalā pādapūjā
māga māga ho brāhmaṇa ye tohora hāde icchā
brāhmaṇa bolai tumbhe digapāḷamāne hua sākṣī
haricandana rājā upara hāthakari dāna deuacchi | 17 |
haricandana rājā mote dāna deucchi satye hāde | 18 |
māga ho dijabara bege bolai mahārāẏe
ẏe tohora bedadhuni śuṇi na rahai mora kāẏe | 19 |
aneka dāna muṁ deiacchi ho dijabara
tote triputi kale se aneka kāraṇa hoiba mohora | 20 |
ẏete boli brāhmaṇara hāthe pāṇi chāḍai daṇḍadhārī
ruṣi boile rājyabhāra daṇḍasiṁhāsana bhaṇḍāra ādi kari | 21 |

div.note: chāridige chārimeghe ābara chārisvarge |–ḍha
chāridige chārimeghe bāẏabya baruṇa candra sūryye |–ca, ja
haricandana rājā mote dāna deucchi satyayuge |–tha, cha, jha
ẏemanta bedadhuni śuṇilā nāhiṁta mohora |–ca, ja

lg.l: ratha gaja aśva saini tora yeteka pādānti
jana prajā ādikari go mahiṣī dhana basra ye sahiti | 22 |
rājā rāṇī kumāra to ẏe tinihiṁki chāḍi
rājyaru bāhāra hoa tumbhe br̥kṣa bakaḷa pahuḍi | 23 |
jaḷaphaḷa āhāra na kariba na bhakṣiba ẏeka kache | 28 |
āre chālu kinā boli biśvāmitre bāḍiẏe gheni piṭi | 30 |
hā hā putra boli toḷi dhailāka rāṇī śabyā
mohora bāḷuta putra go tote kisa doṣa kalā abā | 32 |

div.note: jana prajā ādikari go mahiṣī śahasra basra sabunti |–ṅa, ta, ñja
bāḍiẏeka gheni muni goḍāichanti pachakati

lg.l: ati sukumāra komaḷa śarīra tohora bhūmireṇa loṭi | 33 |
muhiṁ tohora re nandana yāiṁ kinā niuchuṇā
ẏeḍe nirddaẏā kiṁpāiṁ re hoilu prāhmaṇā | 34 |
biśvāmitra kopakale ye śabyāra bacana śuṇi
brahmakarma dharma siddha sādhana ẏe pañchu biśvedebā
se boile haricandana rājāku ẏeḍeka kaṣṭa kiṁpe deu bābā | 36 |
ẏeḍe nirddaẏā manda tu aṭu biśvāmitra
āre biśvedebā tumbhara kisa durbuddhi hoilā mote kaha
dhātubādya rūpa chāḍi tumbhe mānabe jātahoa | 39 |
ẏehāṁkara kathā na jāṇi mote doṣa bācchi
kumbhīpāka narke janma hoa mānuṣīra kukṣi | 40 |
paraduḥkha dekhi nuāri tote anīti ācarilu | 42 |
kisa doṣa se kalā abā rājā haricandana
āstāne basite mote na dile brahmadebatā | 44 |

div.note: paradukhe kātara huante āmbhe abhiśāpaku pāilu |–kha, ṇa, na

lg.l: brahmāra samāne hoibi boli nirañjanaṁku bara māgili | 45 |
se puruṣa āgyāṁẏe aili muhiṁ svarge
se yebe sādhi hoante tebe hoantā sacarācara sr̥ṣṭa | 47 |
cauda bidyāẏe yebe hoante se siddhi
tebe se sacarācara pr̥thī hoantā sādhi | 48 |
paḷaile bidyādhara puruṣe mohoreṇa bhaẏe kari | 49 |
kapaceka dhari khedili ye apāra dūre
yāiṇa lucile se haricandana rājā pure | 50 |
mohora bhaẏe kehi tāhā sambhāḷantā nohilā
keuṇa darpe haricandana mohore bibādī hoilā | 51 |
kebeheṁ pāmara se nadilā tāṁku muku | 52 |
trailokya bhmabane se mohora caraṇare bandi
ẏe pāmara rājā hoi mohora tule dvandī | 53 |
brāhmaṇeka hoiṇa beda ādhyāna kali puṇi | 54 |
boilā yāhā māgibu tāhā debaiṁ bipradāna ẏehikṣaṇa | 55 |

div.note: tinimanu pariyante haricandana tapakalā

lg.l: satyakari ye pāṇi chāḍilā śaṅkhe jaḷatḷa gheni | 56 |
bega bega kari muṁ ẏehāṁku deucchi ḍaāiṁ
teṇe bidyādhara puruṣamāne na puṇa yāānti paḷāi | 57 |
ẏe mohora śarīra ye bahuta hoẏe dukha
tumbhara bākyaku muhiṁ bujhai bahuta bimukha | 58 |
biśvedebāẏe boile tapī hoi ẏeḍebaḍa rāgī
kemanta karibu āmbhe kaha tapī yogī | 61 |
āmbhakaiṁ śāpa kope dilu ye apāra | 62 |
aḷapa doṣaku ye bahuta kalu koha
śāpyaku aḷapa kari kāraṇa āmbhaṁku tu kaha | 63 |
ẏe mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe janmahoa yāiṁ bābā | 64 |
tāhāṁkara pañcha putra yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba pañchubīra | 65 |

div.note: āho biśvedebāẏe mr̥ta maṇḍaḷe mānaba rupeṇa jāta hoa sañchi

lg.l: tumbhe pañchu biśvedebaẏe janmahoa dropatīṁka garbhe | 67 |
pañchāḷa kumara nāma hou ye tumbhara
ẏe nāma bahiba tumbhe pāṇḍabaṁka ghara | 68 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba añcha bhrātha
se pañchu indra tumbhara hoantu ye tāta | 69 |
kaurobe pāṇḍabe ye ẏe beni saini
bahuta sanya māri se paḍibe pañchu dibasa rāti | 72 |
tāhāra prathama dinare driyodhanara satāṇoī bhāi
samare bhīmasena tāhāra upāḍiba beni bhmaja | 76 |
āreka dine karṇṇa śalya śakuni paḍibe ye yuddhe
śeṣe gadā yuddha hoiba aṣṭādaśa dibasara madhye | 77 |
duiśa bāstori kṣauṇī saina driyodhanara paḍiba
rakata nadī bhitare driyodhana luci rahithiba | 78 |

div.note: bahuta sanya māribe pañchadina pāhānti |–ca, tha, gha, jha, ṭa

lg.l: dui kṣauṇī sanya gheni uburibe pāṇḍabe | 79 |
raṇa jaẏa kari bāhuḍibe pāṇḍaba pāñchabīre
se mohora putra muṁ arghya debi tāku | 81 |
ẏekara mukhaku āreka hoibe cuhāṁ cahiṁ
driyodhanaku māilā kathā na jāṇu go kehi | 82 |
raṇakṣetra bhūmiki pāṇḍabe leuṭi yibe loḍi | 83 |
sātatāla rodhiranadīru pāri hoiyiba gāndhārīra baḷā | 85 |
bhīṣma buddhi kahibe byāsa sarobare paśiba kurupati | 86 |
kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe pāṇḍabe cihnibe maḍānta leuṭāi
dekhi na pāibe mānagobinda tahiṁ kāhiṁ | 87 |
bhīṣmaṁku pachāribe se na kahibe tadanta
sahadeba kahiba byāsa sarobare paśile kurunātha | 88 |

div.note: sannidhaku āsa muhiṁ arghya debi tāku |–ja, ṭha
kurukṣetra bhūmiki yibe pāṇḍabe lagāi dihuḍi |–ḍa, ḍha
rudhira nadīre paśi samasta maḍā leuṭāi |–ḍa, ḍha, ka, tha, ga

lg.l: byāsa sarobaruṁ bāhāra hoiba se re re kāra boli | 90 |
gadāghāte bhīmasena ye bhāṅgiba tāhāra jānu | 92 |
dui kṣauṇī sanya gheni dhr̥ṣṭadyumane śoithibe ye niśaṁke | 94 |
bolibe ẏebe senāpati kara ho mahātamā | 95 |
dui kṣauṇī sanya se chediba karabāḷe | 97 |
bije karṇṇakaṭārī gheni tāhānta badha kari | 98 |
tumbhe pañchāḷakumāra hoi palaṁke thiba śoi
sāta sāta baraṣara tumbhe hoithiba pañchubhāi | 99 |
se dine śiracchedana hoiba boile maharṣi | 100 |
aśastamā hāthe tumbhe ho hoa śiraccheda
bāhuḍi āsa tumbhe pāa tumbhara nija pada | 101 |

div.note: dvārakāku yibe sanya jagāi niśaṁke |–kha, na

lg.l: śuṇa ho manu puruṣa pāṇḍabaṁkara sātabaraṣa hoilāni basabāsa
pañchāḷa kumare pañchāḷī garabhe hoileni parabeśa | 103 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
tadante yebaṇa kr̥tya kalā haricandana nr̥pati | 104 |
bana phaḷa khāiṇa bañchile sehi rāti | 107 |
rājasukha boli kicchi manare na dharanti | 108 |
putrakaiṁ gheni banaste rahile duḥkha sebi | 109 |
bho rājana nagre yāiṁ āmbhe āśre karibā
grāme grāme bhikṣā māgi ẏe putra goṭiki poṣabā | 111 |
chāla ẏebe ẏehibana tejiṇa go yibā
pūbonge muni gāgrabe achanti mote kahi | 115 |
īśvaratahuṁ brahmā kapāḷa ẏe tīrthe chāḍilā
pratyekṣe aśvamedhi ye ẏe puṇyatīrtha hoilā | 116 |
se maṇikarṇṇikā tīrthe yebe deha teji
debadeha pāi se svarga bhmabanakaiṁ bhaji | 117 |
taduttāre rājā hoi huai se jāta
deha antare puṇa hoi se deba daibata | 118 |
ẏe pure maraṇa sakhī ati puṇye pāi
he śabyā ẏe putrakaiṁ gheni rahibā tahiṁ yāiṁ | 119 |
rājāra bacane ye prabodha galā rāṇī
caḷanti tini prāṇī ye banamārga jiṇi | 120 |
kāhiṁ na rahanti kāhiṁ na karanti biśrāma
ati kṣīṇa dubongḷa se dekhiṇa maharuṣi
kiẏe tu mahātamā ho āmbhe nuārilu cihni
rājā boile ẏehā kahante kisa hoibāka muni | 123 |
sūryyabongśa rājā tuhi aṭu ki haricandra
tāhara kūṭakathā tote maṇita na galā
māẏā dāneṇa se tora sampada harilā | 127 |

div.note: tripurāri hātharu bahmāra muṇḍa tuṭa

lg.l: akāraṇe ailu tu kiṁpā rājyaku upekhi | 128 |
āmbhara bole bābu tu bāhuḍiṇa yāāsi
śuṇi haricandana rājā ye mane mane hasi | 129 |
dānadilā dharma mohora nohiba ye āna
ẏe bāṇī anīti mote na kaha tapodhana | 130 |
ẏehā kahi muniṁka āśrama tejiṇa tahuṁ gale
saraḷe śabada karanti caḷanti beni bhmaje
paẏare nūpura ye ghana ghana bāje | 135 |
se dibyapura dekhiṇa rājā manare haraṣa
ẏe pura hoiba parā bārāṇasī deśa | 136 |
he sakhī kebaṇa prakāre āmbhe bratibāka ẏetha
bhikṣā āchāra karibā ki boile naranāṭha | 138 |
maṇḍopara koṇe rahanti rātra ye dibasa
se nagre buliṇa pāānti abā yisa | 140 |
adheka khāānti mane na karanti bhrānti | 141 |
puṇihiṁ tapa yahuṁ dekhile deba dharmagaṇa
yemante hiai se rājāra dharma nāśa | 144 |
boile kiho rājā chadrame paśi tapakaruṁ ẏetha
dakṣiṇā na deu ẏe tohora kebaṇa puruṣārtha | 146 |
dāna deiṇa dakṣiṇā kiṁke tu na deu
mote ye bhaṇḍilu tuhi māẏādāna dei
dakṣiṇā na dilu tu kebaṇa guṇa pāiṁ | 148 |
manda dakṣiṇāre ye dharmamāna hoai hata | 149 |
śuṇi haricandana śiba sumari bhūmichuiṁ karṇṇachuiṁ
dhana dhānya nāhiṁ muni dakṣiṇā kāhuṁ debi
tumbha dharma kaṣaṇaku deha muṁ bikibi | 152 |
bitraẏa hoile śujhi pāribu dakṣiṇāra ruṇa | 154 |
tote bikiṇa brāhmaṇakaiṁ dakṣiṇā debaiṁ muhim | 155 |
rājāra bacane rāṇī chāhiṁ prabhmara mukha
bho nātha mote biki tohora satya dharma rakha | 156 |
haricandana boile muni he rahibā ẏekadina
ẏe mohore biki diai tote dhana | 158 |
se bipra ẏehā dekhiṇa ucceṇa bāṇī prakāśi
sundaranārī hoita tiraṇa nāḍe achu khosi | 162 |
teṇu se tiraṇa khoṣili ẏehāra mātha | 163 |

div.note: “ẏe mohore biki diai tote dhana” pare “ṭā” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
kauśika prabodhi caḷile narasāiṁ
maṇḍoparu rāṇīki gheni hāṭare milile se yāiṁ |
kumara kara dhari ubhā narasāiṁ
śabyārāṇī muṇḍe rājā tiraṇa lāḍe dei |
sakaḷa ṭhāba bulai rājā yubatī saṅgate
matradhvaja nāme bipra mililā agrate |
kubera samāne se aṭai bittapāḷa

lg.l: se bipra boilā ẏe aṭai nabayubā
tuhi se sundara puruṣa dutī manumatha prāẏe śobhā | 164 |
ẏe bāmākaiṁ biki kemante deha tu dharibu | 165 |
pachārai bipra tu śuṇa go bhābānī
tu kimpe bitrehou go ẏehāra bola gheni | 166 |
puruṣara bhābe tu deha kimpe biku
bhrathā nohoi ẏe aṭāi tora pūbong ripu | 167 |
ye abā tote re kiṇiba śubhrakeśī
dibā raẏeṇī khaṭibu tu hoiṇa tāra dāsī | 168 |
śabyāẏe boile mohora svāmī ye bikile
bhrathā se aṭanti nā ẏe dehaku kāraṇa
se yisa karai tāku nāhiṁ anya puṇa | 170 |
thambhībhūta hoilā se bipra tāhā śuṇi | 171 |
mo svāmīki pucchi bipra nia mote kiṇi | 172 |
rāṇīra bacane bipra rājākaiṁ rāi pāśa
bacane prabodhi tāku biki loḍu tuhi | 174 |
rājā boile ẏe mohora prāṇara kāreṇī

div.note: yubānārī hoiṇa tu hoibu go dāsī |–ta, ṭa, ñja
āho juāre jiṇichu ki parara bhāriyā ẏehu

lg.l: kustirī kubr̥tti kubuddhi kudhanare nāsti mohora managyāna | 176 |
muhiṁ dhana dei kiṇibi tohora bikibā ki sata | 177 |
bipra boilā ho mūla keteka hoilā | 178 |
nr̥pati boile paṇḍāẏe pachāru kimpe muku
kete dhana deu ho manuṣya prāṇara tulaku | 179 |
tumbhe ki na jāṇa bipra kisa muṁ kahibi
yathā pramāṇe dhana dileka muhiṁ nebi | 180 |
pañchabiṁśa māḍha deba ki dagadha kāñchana
yācilā kathāku bipra yebe deba ho pratakṣa
śuddha subarṇṇa tumbhe deba ho māḍha ẏekalakṣa | 182 |
śuṇare sundarī ẏe br̥ddha abastā mohora
sambhāḷi bhmaja dhariṇa mote gheniyāa ghara | 185 |
dekhiṇa rājā bhmaja tāḍai nei māthe | 186 |
mātā mātā boliṇa ye goḍāẏe tāra pacha | 178 |
mote chāḍiṇa jananī go kahiṁki tu yibu
anāsta kariṇa mote saṅge ki na nebu | 188 |
āuki abā āmbhe te te dekhibu beni netre | 189 |

div.note: kiñchita durbuddhi yāhā na paśai channa |–ta, ñja

lg.l: kāhiṁki yibu mātā go mote tu na neiṁ
mātā bole āsa bābure mora pūbongkarma acchi yahiṁ | 190 |
bābu bipra dhanadei mote neuacchi kiṇi
ākuḷa hoilā putra mātāra bola śuṇi | 191 |
prabodha na kari bipra kare kopamana | 192 |
putra bhrathā loḍu yebe yāa ānaṭhāre
garbheṇa dhari muhiṁ bahuta duḥkha ye sahili
ẏe putra upekṣante bahuta prāsa pāili | 195 |
ẏe putragoṭi ye mohora saṅge thāu
brāhmaṇa boilā tora saṅge putra thāānteṇa
ẏe kathā na yogāi ẏe mohora citta
rāṇī boilā paṇḍāẏe yahiṁ mātā tahiṁ putra | 198 |
ẏe mohora ātmāsari kiṇa bipra tuhi | 199 |

div.note: “dhana mora bāhuḍāi debāka satvare”
kopa kariṇa brāhmaṇa bolai mahārāge
chāla chāla sundarī go gr̥haku yibā bege |
śokabhara hoiṇa ye bolai rājānārī
hr̥daẏa bikaḷa dekha houcchi mohori |
daśamāsa garbhe dhari kemanta mūrucchibi
tumbha daẏā nāhiṁ āura abā kisa muṁ karibi |

lg.l: puṇa boilā biśvāmitra tohora deha bika
ke mote kiṇima muṁ lokanta na dekhili
kṣaṇake raha munibara muhiṁ nagra āse buli | 204 |
hāsya gatire chālai ḍhālilā ḍhaḷilā bhābi | 206 |
rājākaiṁ chāhiṁ bolai tu apūbong puruṣa
ki nimante mahātmā tu buluchu deśa deśa | 207 |
haricandana boilā ho ẏe rājya ẏesana
mohora ātmā kiṇimāku ke nohilā bhājana | 208 |

div.note: “mohora ātmā kiṇimāku ke nohilā bhājana” pada pare ‘ṅa’ pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
chāṇḍāḷa boilā dhana tu kisa karibu
dhanaru nimante kiṁpe śarīra bikibu |
bahuta ākuḷa hoi bolai rājana
mote ẏebe paḍiacchi baḍāi kaṣaṇa |
chāṇḍāḷa boilā yebe bitrī hebu tuhi
yete dhana nebu tete dhana debi muhiṁ |
prabaḷa kahai muhiṁ kahuacchi tote

lg.l: chāṇḍāḷa boilā ho debaiṁ muhiṁ bitta
janmeṇa chāṇḍāḷa muṁ ye nohoi mahata | 209 |
tuhi se mahata ho aṭu bittapāla | 210 |
yābata daẏāru sinā aṭe dharma mūḷa | 211 |
tahuṁ chāṇḍāḷa boilā muṁ kete dhana debi
yathārtha ucita yebe debu tu pratakṣa
śuddha subarṇṇa debu tu jāṇa ẏekalakṣa | 214 |
niasi dhana ho yeteka icchā ye tohora | 215 |
pañchabiṁśa paḷa dagadha kāñchana tahuṁ gheni
supaṁku anna bhmañjiṇa rānddhathāa ẏehi ṭhāba | 218 |
hāṇḍi taṇḍuḷa ye gheniyibu sarobara taṭe niti
nije pāka kariṇa rakha tora jāti | 219 |
mr̥tupiṇḍa dahana dhana sādhidebu āṇi mote | 221 |
bāki chāri rāutā dhana ye mote āṇidebu lekhi | 223 |
chāṇḍāḷara kṣema khāi triputi hoi rahi | 226 |
svaẏeṁ beḷe bhmañjai se rājāra urddha gati
dukheṇa hoai ye prāṇī ātmā na gañji
dukha sukha ẏe dui ẏekatva kari bhmañji | 229 |
jaẏa tu karatāra ho chāẏāra prāṇapati
kautuke ẏekacatra rathe ye saptaaśva yoci
mohora karme muṁ ye rakhili śūkara
tumbhara prasanne muṁ ye hoibi mukati | 238 |
ādityaṁka bacane barehāẏe āśreme na kare mūtramaḷa | 239 |
brāhmaṇa ghare rahile rājāra putra nārī
putrakaiṁ koḷe dhari satnāpa karai satī
svāmīra tahiṁ tāhāra ye pañchabhūta mati | 242 |
bolai lohitākṣa dine jananī mukha chāhiṁ
mora piara mātā achanti go kāhiṁ | 243 |
śabyā boile bābu re āmbhakaiṁ biki
lajjā pāiṇa se kāhiṁ chanti luci | 244 |
lohitākṣa bole mātā ẏethu kebaṇa dina yibā
mohora pitākaiṁ māgo kāhiṁ se dekhibā | 245 |
jananī boile bābu re pitā diai yebe dhana
tebe re āmbhe ẏethuṁ karibā gabana | 246 |
tebe se dhanaarji pārai mora nāhā | 247 |
mātā putra duheṁ nitiprati hoanti ẏehikathā
gata sumari sumari chaḍābanti manuṁ byathā | 248 |
dukha anubhabi se achanti dharma rakhi
dāsībr̥tti ācari rahilā se śaradacandra mukhī | 249 |
keteheṁka kāḷe phiṭibāka ẏe mora kaṣṭa
tinisvarga madhyare ke pheḍiba mohora saṁkaṭa | 250 |
bho rājana karmaku ādari se rahile tinijaṇa
nija jāti rakhi se bhr̥tyapaṇe khaṭile | 252 |
yama baiśvānaraku gheni indra karai bichāra
ẏete dukheṇata rājā na chāḍanti dharmara āchāra | 253 |
āho kemante se dharma tāhāra ye karibāka nāśa
tu yāiṁ bināśa ye karibu baiśvānara
śabyārāṇī koḷe lohitākṣa achai ye śoi
ati aceṣṭa nidrā āḷasa tāra dehī | 257 |
dutīẏa bahani jāṇi śabyārāṇīra deha teja
biṣa pūroi kari ḍaṁśi kalā dahija | 260 |
uṭha uṭha mātā go mote karasi pratikāra | 261 |
hā putra lohitākṣa boli uccasvare śire kara tāḍi | 265 |
ẏehikṣaṇi malā ẏe putra kebana āśrija | 266 |
ki abā preta pichāśa gandhabong rākṣasa ẏehāku kale nāśa
maraṇa labhilā ẏe kebaṇa kāḷa baśya | 267 |
śabyāẏe boile bāma kāṇiaṅgu ṣṭhira koṇe
jaḷilā jaḷilā boli putra boilā āpane | 268 |
brāhmaṇa dūre thāi dīpa gheniṇa tāhā dekhi
yāa kinā ẏehāku lo dharakinā yāi | 271 |
rāṇī boile tumbhe mote na chuaṁ ho kehi
muhiṁ se gheniṇa yibi mr̥tupiṇḍa dehī | 272 |
rāṇī bāṇī śuṇi bipra bole ati roṣe
mr̥tuputra gheni caḷa yā śamaśāna bāse | 273 |
kehi na yibe hāde puṇa tora saṅge | 274 |
tumbhe mote kopa na kara he biprabare | 275 |
ẏete boli putra gheni niśāre bāhāra śabyādebī | 276 |
mahā niśāẏe satī gomilā paḍi ye uṭhiṇa | 279 |
śokabhare sundarī ye kale ucce dhvanī | 280 |
kodāḷa gheni bāḷī bhūmi ye khoḷai | 281 |
āre āre bābu mohora dukhīra tanaẏe
ẏe dukhakāḷe mote nirāśa kari gaẏe | 282 |
anāsta bandhu mora re dukhījana baḷa
āre dukhīra saṁghāta mora andhara lauḍi
ẏekā hoi ẏebe kisa karibaiṁ muhiṁ
śamaśāna bāseṇa mora saṅgate kehi nāhiṁ | 285 |
mr̥tapiṇḍa koḷedhari śabyā śoke chanti basi | 286 |
rājā boilā tohora saṅgate kehi nāhiṁ
putra bhāriyā biki gale rājā haricandra
tu aṭu mohora ki mo śabyā sulakṣaṇī | 291 |
bho rājā tumbhara ẏe dekha putagoṭi

lg.note: hariścanda boilā mo svarge kāryya nāhiṁ
aputrika hoi kāhāmukha chāhiṁbaiṁ | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: putraku gheniṇa maribā anaḷe hebā jhāsi | 293 |

lg.note: indra āge kahuṁ, indra nije bije kalā |
āsa āsa hariścandra bimāne bege basa
nohile lohitākṣa saṅge beni hoibuṁ dahana
parama gati labhiba yāra nahiṁ rāga
lg.l: ẏete boli rājā kale agni āropaṇe
āsare sakhī tiniprāṇī āmbhe paśibā agni bhitareṇa | 295 |
indradebatā ratha gheniyāi miḷile mātaḷi sahite | 296 |
āsa āsa haricandana bimāne bege āsi basa
muhiṁ se tote nebākaiṁ aili tora pāśa | 297 |
rājyasaha putra bhāriyā gheni svargaku galā haricandana | 302 |
śuṇa sujane haricandana prāpata hoilā svarga
paramagati labhiba jane teji hiṁsā sabong | 303 |
indra bākye śuṇa ho rājana baibasuta manu
haricandana kathā śuṇi ye basibā svargabhmabanu | 304 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsara ye pheḍibā durgati | 307 |–3154
lg.head: {@yudhiṣṭhira haraṇa@}
lg.l: baibasuta manu ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
pāṇḍabe thile ye gaṇḍa kī nadīkūḷa gheni | 3 |
pāṇḍabe bulile bane sāta ye baraṣa
caḷile pāṇḍabe ye gaṇḍukī nadī tīre
tahiṁra upare bijaẏe yāiṁ pañcha bhrātha | 9 |
mūḷā nāme nakṣatra bhogya se dinara | 10 |
śakuni nāme karaṇa baidhr̥ti nāme yoga
candra saptame br̥haspati caturtha ghare bhoga | 11 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ẏethe rahibā baraṣā māsa chāri | 13 |
amara bhmabanakaiṁ arjunaku tu gheniāsa ho bahana | 15 |
se mora amara bhūbanaku ratha bāhiba hāde kāli | 16 |
indra boile arjuna na thileta amara nāśayiba
bāratā pāile putra mora bahana āsiba | 17 |
bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba samaste paraṇāmi | 20 |
amara svarga bhmabanaku pāṭha yibāka bahana | 21 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile yebe loḍai jambhabhedī
svāmīṁkara bacana se pāiṇa bīrabara pātha
arjuna tatakṣaṇe bāsebi ārohilā puṣyeka ye ratha | 23 |
amara svarge yāiṁ miḷilā bāsaba nandana | 24 |
indra boile sabhāre jitā putra ripu dahantā
ẏeteka dekhi āstāna tejiba boli boile ākhaṇḍaḷe | 28 |
kuḷa uddhāraṇa putra mora guṇabanta hitakārī
se mohora amara svargakaiṁ bāhiba jāṇa kāli | 31 |
arjuna boile svāmī āsu hiraṇyara daṇḍa
kṣaṇakara madhye ye chedibi samastaṁka muṇḍa | 32 |
sāja ho ratha sārathi kaṇaẏa ratha susañcha | 33 |
sāja ho śutramantrī sanya gaja ratha

lg.note: indra boile sahodara bhāi dakṣaputra ābara jitā
indra boile satī bhariyā yati śuṇa putra jaẏabantā
“indra boile sabhāre jitā putra ripu dahantā”

lg.l: kahiṁki daṇḍa sājibu amare pātha bijekalā | 36 |
pitā tora nibongātakapaca badhagalā tāta hāthe
jāṇuṁ jāṇuṁ tāhāra tahiṁki tote nemaiṁ kemante | 37 |
hiraṇyakapaca boilā se puṇa thilā kāhiṁ
kemante ailā se kiẏe tāṁku bāratā | 38 |
mantra sumari sura indraku ye laẏe kari | 40 |
se suraindra bīryye kointāṁka garbhmaṁ jāta
trailokye bidita tāhāra nāma ye dhanurjaẏe
pitā tohora nibongāta ākāśaku dilā dhāḍi
mohora bola na kari prāṇe sehu mari | 44 |

lg.note: hiraṇyakapaca boilā se puṇa kebaṇa arjuna

lg.l: tu mohora mantrī aṭu pūbong bongśābaḷī | 47 |
to pitāku badhakalā se indrara kumara | 49 |
tāhākaiṁ jiṇimāku ki tu hoibu bhājana | 50 |
pāṇḍaba arjuna ye svargabhmabane acchi rahi
tohora yibā śuṇi bāsaba ye banuṁ nelā rāi | 51 |
bhala hoiacchi arjuna tāhāṁka saṅge nāhiṁ | 53 |
se chāri pāṇḍabanta yebe āṇipāru tu dhari
tebe se arjunaku āmbhe nicaẏe jiṇipāri | 54 |
chadrama rūpeka dhari se hoilā mahātapī | 56 |
bhasma bilepana aṅge kaṇṭhe rudrākṣa tuḷasīra māḷa
saṣṭika markata māḷa ye lambita bakṣasthaḷa | 58 |
srāhāna nimante dropatī gaṅgaẏe chanti yāi | 63 |
śiba śiba sumari basilā se yujheṣṭhi debaṁka chāmura | 64 |
saṣṭikara mudrā ye ḍhaḷai beni karṇṇe
āsana tejyā kariṇa se dhātikāre uṭhi | 66 |
āsana dei sambhāṣaṇa ye karanti debadharme
āja se subidhāna hoilā āmbhara āśrame | 67 |
aneka kāḷa hoilā dekhilā nāhiṁ guru
īśvaracihna bahi āmbhanta daẏā kimpe na karu | 68 |
nirmaḷa puruṣa prāẏeka se mauna hoi basi
chadrama kūṭeśvara se na dia sambhāṣa | 69 |

lg.note: āsana samārjanā karanti debadharma |–ka, cha, ṇa, gha, tha, jha, ta
aneka kāḷa hoilā dekhilā nāhiṁ ẏemanta puruṣa

lg.l: bābu bhīmasena re aneka puṇya se bhagati dei yogī
yujheṣṭhi debe boile samasyā nāhiṁ kiṁpe guru
bhojanakaiṁ icchā bhikṣā tu kisa hāde karu | 75 |
tathāpi bākya se na diai māẏā tapobanta
beḷa uchura guru kaha he kebaṇa bhagata yugata | 76 |
janme janme abhyāsi nāhiṁ anna ye bhojana | 77 |
bābu br̥ndāhoḷa boli jāṇu ki latāgoṭi
tāhā chedana kale jharai rasa phuṭi | 78 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba yāa re banastaku
br̥ndāhoḷa latā boli pachārani śabara kirātaku | 80 |
baḍāi mauṣadhi se guru ye kahile

lg.note: śatetapī bhmañjile ẏeka mahāmuni |–jha, tha, ka
lg.l: loḍanti bane buli se burndāhoḷa latā
sehi na cihnanti tahiṁ kehita nohilā jāṇantā | 83 |
tini pāṇḍabe ye gale bana heri
ātrośi basilā ye hr̥dagate hoiṇa niśaṁkā | 85 |
aṁdhārīru kāḍhilā se māẏā ye bibhūti
ghena re potā boli yācai mandamati | 86 |
aneka sānande dharma ye pātile karasthaḷa
guḍāẏe dehe dei guḍāẏe lepile kapoḷa | 87 |
āsana gheni se yogī hoilāka śūnya
tāhāra tule yujheṣṭhiṁkara ye uṭhilā āsana | 88 |
mane mane sānanda ye houchanti yujheṣṭha
āsa āsa putā boli durānteka hāki

lg.note: dropatī yāichanti sandhyākarma sāri |–kha, ṇa, cha, ka, tha, ga
suphaḷa samaẏe ẏemanta puruṣakaiṁ bheṭi |–ca, ja, ṭa
adhāsvarge hoileni haraṣa aneki |–jha, ṇa, cha, ga, ṭha, ṭa, na, kha, ka, ḍa, jha

lg.l: daita dānaba baḷata achanti ẏetheṁ koṭi koṭi | 93 |
rākṣasa bhmabana dekhiṇa deba dharmara tanaẏe
bhmaja dhari pachārai tu parā arjunara jyeṣṭhabhrātha
tuhi se aṭu mohora nitānta pitāra bairi
arjunaku tohora muṁ na pāili loḍi | 98 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe kari kāṭibi ẏe tohora māẏeṁsa
indra debatāra bacane tohora pitā nāśagalā
ẏe dharmarājā ẏehāra doṣa kisa helā | 102 |
pareṇa paramāda ẏehāra cintā acchi kāhuṁ | 103 |
bichāre doṣa ta kicchi nāhiṁnā ẏehāṁkara | 105 |
tu mahābaḷī aṭu ye kṣatriẏa baḷabantā
sāṁgrāme śakatā nohoi tote bāsaba debatā | 106 |
bairiki jiṇile se āpaṇe pāi yaśa
ajātaśatr̥ ẏe ye ẏehānta na māri
ẏebe ẏehānta āmbhe thoithibā bandī kari | 108 |
arjuna ghuñchile svarge indra debatā ye hāri | 109 |
ẏehāṁku mārante arjuna hoibaṭi baḍa rāga
arjuna na sahile āmbhara jībana parityāgī | 110 |
daibe bāḷuta bhāba se mantrīra bacane
andhāra bandīghare nei se thoilā nirodhi | 113 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
yujheṣṭhi deba paḍile ye bandī asura bhmabanuṁ | 115 |
anantabhāgī nadīkūḷe bheṭile yāiṁ muni byāse | 116 |
lg.note: sāṁgrāme śakatā tote ye bāsaba debatā |–ca, ja, ga, jha
anantabhadrā nadīkūḷe bheṭile muni byāse |–jha, ṅa, gha

lg.l: byāse boile re tule nāhiṁta tumbhara yujheṣṭhi debasvāmī | 117 |
svāmī yujheṣṭhi debaṁku se br̥ndāhoḷa māgi | 118 |
āmbhe br̥ndāhoḷa khoji ailu bhāi tini
yujheṣṭhi debe basichanti se puruṣakaiṁ gheni | 119 |
ẏebe se somabongśa nāśa galāka sabu | 120 |
nicaẏe bhīmasena re se asura kalāka kapaṭa
ābara kāhiṁ tumbhe re bheṭiba dharmachāṭa | 121 |
bahana hoi dhāani re chāḍi aila kāhiṁ
byāsaṁkara bacane se tiniheṁ gale dhāiṁ | 122 |
dūre thāiṁ dropatīṁkara se dekhile birasa | 124 |
dropatīṁki pachārile keṇe gale yujheṣṭhi ṭhākure | 125 |
muhiṁta na dekhili se keuṇa kati gale | 126 |
uccasvare ḍaka diai bho deba keṇe gala yujheṣṭhi | 127 |
lg.note: uccasvare ḍāka diai dhari banabāsa nāmagoṭi |–ga, tha, jha, cha, ka, ḍha
lg.l: na dekhi bhīmasena sahadebe kalā pucchā
kaha kaha sahadeba ẏe kebaṇa br̥tānta | 129 |
naghoṣa asura suta rājā ye nibongāta
kamarūpī asura se yogīrūpa dhari āẏe | 134 |
hā hā bhātha boli kāndi pāḍanti bobāḷi | 137 |
lakṣeka nr̥pati yāhāra caraṇa taḷe bande
taba draśana mātrake cakṣu ye pāilā | 140 |
yāhāra caraṇa taḷe daṇḍa praḷamba kari | 141 |
svāmī hāthara sukheṇa ye kheḷilu deba paśā
svāmī ajātaśatra deba tumbha nāma goṭi
bahuta trodha karai ye pabana tanaẏe
he daiba puruṣa āmbhanta karāilu banabāsa
ẏete kaṣṭara upare puṇi ẏeteka jhiṁghāsa | 146 |
rājakuḷe jāta kari kete abastā āmbhanta deu
ẏehikṣaṇi mr̥dhunā phāṭi tiniṁkara prāṇa pāu | 147 |
pāreśvara nandana dekhai ye putraṁkara kaṣṭa
āre sahadeba tu na jāṇilu kiṁpā ẏesaneka kūṭa | 149 |
byāse pachārile sahadeba re ke nelā yujheṣṭhiṁki
sahadeba boilā svāmī se nāśa karuthilā
andhāra gambhirī ghare pāḍicchi argaḷi kabāṭi
byāse boilā bādu trodha na karasi bhīma
dharma udita hoilā yujheṣṭhi gale rakṣā
śutrara bacana se ye na kalā upekṣā | 155 |
āpaṇe byāse ye hr̥dagate kale dhyāna
nārāẏaṇaṁku sumaraṇā kale se satyabatīra nāna | 156 |
beni ghaḍi madhyare gamilā binatā nandana | 159 |
ananta nāga pabongte gobinde kale bije
dekhiṇa byāse ye binaẏa bhābe majje | 160 |
bho svāmī somabongśa śirī buḍāile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati | 161 |
gobinde boile ẏebe kemante karibā ho byāse
daṇḍasāji gale bāratā pāla yujheṣṭhiṁki karai prāṇe ghāta
sahadeba boile hiraṇyagarbha pure achai debī hiraṇākṣī
pujehṣṭhi debaṁku se debīṁki baḷi debāku mā(?)acchi | 167 |
muhiṁ yibi hiraṇyagarbha pure āgyāṁ mote debā | 168 |
hiraṇyagarbha puraku yibāku tihi se sāmaratha | 170 |
pure paśi yujheṣṭhiṁki thāa tu ābori | 171 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki gheni muṁ ye hoibi bāhāra | 174 |
hiraṇyagarbha pura dvāre yāiṇa kalāka bijaẏe | 176 |
āre yataneṇa brāhmaṇa jaṇe āmbhe yāu loḍi
rājāra muṇohiki ẏehāra māẏeṁsa debu piḍi | 178 |
brāhmaṇa pāiṇa se uṣata hoi bhakṣi | 183 |
nitiniti brāhmaṇe jaṇe dhari āṇanti asure
sehimati kari kapāṭā pāḍanti deuḷa bhitare | 184 |
brāhmaṇa goṭāyāka dhariṇa diai se giḷi | 185 |
nijarūpa dharilā se pakṣī mahā bhīṣmarūpī | 187 |
bhaẏeṇa hiraṇākṣī kahi na pārai kathā
uttānaśāẏī kari debīṁki se taḷe pāḍi
asure ḍāka dianti māgo bhmañja śākāmbherī | 190 |
satyeṇa baḷī hua nisata noha he paṇḍāẏe
bikaḷa hoile ki rakṣā hoiba tumbhara kāẏe | 191 |
de de hākai se garuḍa mahāyati | 193 |
hiraṇyakapaca boilā debī brāhmaṇa māṁsa khāi
rājāra bacane āṇile sakaḷa śīkaḷa drabya
bhitare thāiṁ garūḍa de de boli māgi
āṇiṇa dānaba drabya parābanti begi begi | 197 |
āmba paṇasa kadaḷī naṭīkāḷa kendu paiḍa khajurī
phuṭipaṇā adhāma nabāta gutikā chenā śākara ādikari | 198 |
puṇa puṇa garuḍa ye hākai mahāroṣe
de de boli māgai cittara asantoṣe | 203 |
hiraṇyakapaca boilā muṁ pāṇḍabongku acchi māni
ẏe mohora guruku tāku āsa bege gheni | 205 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku āṇi bheṭāile rājāra samīpe | 206 |
hiraṇyakapaca boilā re mājaṇā ẏehākaiṁ kara
cegaḷari bhara nei debī deuḷa bhitara | 207 |
deuḷa bhitare nei bharile asura mahāraṇā | 208 |
brāhmaṇahuṁ adhika go ẏehāku bhakṣa gosāmaṇī
niṭhāi kapāṭa kiḷile se bāhare yantra ye kiḷaṇī | 209 |
taba āśrake āmbhe bratuṁ ye pāṇḍaba | 211 |
ābara bratiṇa ki chāhiṁbi taba mukha
garuḍa boilā tumbhe bikaḷa nihibā yujheṣṭhi
garuḍa boilā tumbhe na kara mane kicchi bhrānti
buku bidārili muhiṁ ye asura debatīki | 218 |
dekhāilā khaṇḍa khaṇḍa hoi paḍiacchi debī

lg.note: ẏe saṁkaṭu rakṣā mote karasi upāẏe |
lg.l: ẏetha anantare byāsa bāsudebe dekhi ānanda maghabāna
gobinda boile tumbhe śuṇa ho arajuna
tu ta nicinte rahilu amara bhmabana | 222 |
bhīma nakuḷa sahadebaṁku paṭhiāile bane begi | 224 |
ẏeṇe ẏekā dekhi yujheṣṭhiki dilā māẏā ye bibhūti
nāgapāśe bandhana kari thoiacchi yujheṣṭhi ṭhākuraṁku | 227 |
trodha na kara ho arjuna ẏe śokara nohoi beḷa
amaru bāhāra ye hoile deba surasāiṁ | 233 |
pabanu gati ye ati bege caḷi | 234 |
gāḍheṇa cumbai pātha śrīkare tāhā gheni | 236 |
hiraṇyakapaca boilā muṁ yatane yāhā loḍi
muhiṁ se amara bhmabana ku deuthili dhāḍi | 240 |
yāhā muṁ loḍuthili tāhā pāili yatane
kare gadā mudugara gheniṇa dhāmanti daitā | 242 |
kaḍhā ghumurā ye ābara bājai dāuṇḍi
dhara dhara māra māra boli pāḍanti kuruḷi ye bobi
asura baḷabanta ye dekhiṇa badaẏanti acyuta
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye kamaḷā debīra nāhā
arjuna boilā svāmī bibāna mora bāhā | 249 |
arjuna boilā svāmī pratagyāṁ mora dekha | 250 |
kare chāpa dhariṇa se bicitrabīryyara nāti
samasta asure yahuṁ bāhāra hoile samaraku
āho dharmara nandana tu ho basa mora piṭhi
indra gobinda tahiṁki yibā ho yujheṣṭhi | 253 |
bārasvatī bhmabana prāẏeka diśai nagrara bistāra | 255 |
jagatī aṭṭā(?)ḷī sahite sabu paḍilāka bhāji | 256 |
kṣīra samudra bhitare paḍile samaste uḍi
yujheṣṭha debaṁku gheni ẏeṇe garuda pachakati
asura asurī yete thile tora pure
pakṣī bātaghāte uḍi paḍile aneka dūre | 266 |
na jāṇi na cinti rājā manda ye pāñchilu
āho caitana hāthīẏeka ārohi achanti br̥haspati
puṣpaka ratha ārohi hari ye arjuna
kopamukha hoiṇa poṣai bajra ye śakati | 278 |
śahasra jvāḷāẏe asura baḷa paḍile mr̥cchāgata
thoke māra māra śabade dhāmanti daita | 279 |
puṇa puṇa prahāra ye kalāka phālaguni
kauśika śara ye binddhalā kare gheni | 281 |
ẏeka asura upare āreka paḍai ye loṭi | 282 |
puṇi puṇi uṭhikari se bindhanti nārāja
mahā mahā baḷiṣṭha se aṭanti danuja | 283 |
nirbhaẏe dānabe se raṇe nāhiṁ bhaẏe
ẏekai bāṇake ye phuṭai daśabiṁśa tiriśa
yojane yojane māḍi ye paḍanti rākṣasa | 286 |
praṇapatya kale yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi debaṁka caraṇe | 289 |
arjuna bijaẏe kale bāsaba puṣyeka rathe
lakṣeka yoddhā nārāja bindhanti arjuna upare | 294 |
niśaṁkā yoddhā se ye aṭai dhanurjaẏe
nirāpakṣa baḷa dekhi nāhiṁ tāra bhaẏe | 295 |
mahā garjana nāde paḍile asure mahīsthaḷe | 298 |
asambhāḷe saini ye paḷābanti sabonge bhāñji
kodāḷa āẏudha ye dhariacchi bīra hāthe
āẏudha bulāi asura piṭilā arjuna upare
mutheka arjuna rathe prahāra kalā dhāti | 303 |
nabaniśi konta gheni pātha ye māilā | 304 |
se bajrakonta āsi paḍilā asura bakṣasthaḷe
sādhu sādhu dhanurjaẏe boli boile bedapati | 307 |
amara svargapure nei kaleka bahmata pūjā | 311 |
īśvara cihna dekhiṇa hoilu bahuta binaẏe | 313 |
bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba gale tāhā āṇi | 314 |
bibhūti guḍāẏe dei boilā boḷa tohora kapāḷe
āsana gheni lāgilu āmbhe gagana maṇḍaḷe | 315 |
mārite pāñchakalā āmbhanta rakṣākale śutramantrī bare | 316 |
samasta garita ye kahile dharmarāja yujheṣṭhi
arjunaku saṅge gheni debe ye yujheṣṭhi
bhāgyabara bane bijaẏe sānande hoi tuṣṭi | 320 |
bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadeba dekhi hoile paraṇāma
rahile tahiṁ pāṇḍabe ye baraṣā chārimāsa
bijaẏe pāṇḍabe yāiṁ manohara nāma bane | 323 |
tahiṁ yāiṁ pāṇḍabe ye bijekale āsi
sehi baṭa taḷe bheṭile lomaśa maharuṣi | 325 |
lomaśa boile bābu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
paśilu gahana bane āmbhanta āsi bheṭi | 327 |
samasta bāñcchā ye prāpata hoai adyāpi | 328 |
yāhā bāñcchā kari samasta hoai siddhi
manabacane ārādhanā kale prāpata hoai ruddhisiddhi | 329 |
mana bacana karttabye nāhiṁ mora āna
ẏebe mote prasana hoiba paramāda paḍile | 332 |
āho aneka tusti ye kaleka yujheṣṭhi
suphaḷe ẏehu bane yemante karai muṁ sebā
taba prasanne samasta kaṣṭa yāu pāri | 335 |
prasanne parama baṭa tu kalpa kalpa jībī
ẏete kahi bāñcchābaṭaku aneka tusti kaleka debadharma
śate sahasra bāra tahiṁ karanti daṇḍa ye praṇāma | 337 |
śrī bāñcchābaṭa taḷe mora janme janme sebā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāse kalpa āẏuṣa debā | 338 | 3789 |
lg.head: yudhiṣṭhiraṅku dhamabakaṅka praśna
lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasta
bāñcchābaṭaku aneka tusti kaleka yujheṣṭhideba nr̥apti | 1 |
rājyateji bane kimpe bula pañcha bhrātha | 2 |
bābu sukhabhoga icchā ye aṭai rājapada
puṇi se āmbha bichāraku aṭai baḍa manda | 3 |
dharmara nandana ye muniṁki bahuta kale pūjā
svāmī bipada sampada ye aṭai br̥kṣachāi
sūryya thibāyāẏe chāi saṅge saṅge tā goḍāi | 5 |
āditya asta hoile dehare hoi gopya
pāẏeka nidhi ye pāẏeka acchi br̥ddha
tu brahmabettā tote muṁ kisa ye sampādi | 7 |
sampada thile bipada āsai ki pākha | 8 |
sabongdā dina sampade kāhārahiṁ na yāi
ajā bāpa dehāntare dhana binā dukhī
ẏebe putra bole mohora catubarge sukhī | 11 |
se nuhai tāhāra dhana dhanīkara jāṇa
sampada thile bipada na āsaiṭi pāśa
bipadara beḷe sampada kāhiṁ kare bāsa | 13 |
svāmī janmara suphaḷe muṁ bheṭilai āja tote
lomaśa kahile rājā dhanya tohora jībite | 15 |
banaste bheṭile yāiṁ muni bhāra ye dvādaśe | 16 |
dharmara nandana ye muniṁki kale pūjā
bana gahana sebila tumbhe sakaḷa pāpa upekhi | 18 |
dhārmika bibeka tu ye puruṣa bhāgyabanta
śatekoṭi tīrtha ẏe mañcha bhmabaneṇa acchi
abaśya phaḷaśr̥ti hoiba ye yāhā mane bāñcchi | 20 |
bābu āmbhara ye daita dānabanta baḍa bhaẏe
ẏe tohora tule āmbhe bhramibuṁ banasta
tīrthamāna kariṇa ye pāparu boibuṁ mukata | 22 |
maghānāme nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 25 |
lg.note: bana gahanare sebila tumbhe ye paulosti |–kha, na, ṭha

lg.l: mīna saṅtranti ye ẏegāra dina bhoga | 26 |
bāmadeba nāmeṇa ye aṭai ẏeka bana
ki buddhi karibā ho kaha bhīmasena
kojiṇa bege bābu jaḷa āṇa tuhi
jaḷa khojite se saja hoilā bahana | 31 |
nikaṭe thile sandhyā sāriba ẏetheṁ thāi | 32 |
giri kandara banasta aneka dūra bhrami
jaḷaghāṭa na pāi bhīmasena aneka pathaśramī | 34 |
yugate aṭai se kośa ye pandara | 35 |
se andheka sarobara yāiṁ bheṭilā māruti

lg.note: se sarobare jaḷa ye achai paripūrṇṇa |–ca, ja
madhyeṇa śimuḷiburkṣa achai bidyamāna |–ṇa, cha, kha, ṭha, na
lg.l: se surabhī br̥kṣe basicchi baka ye goṭāẏe
dhabaḷa komaḷa se ati susañcha tāra kāẏe | 38 |
bhūta bhabiṣya bāratā se gata āgata kathā jāṇai
beda mantra ādhyāna dharmaśāsra purāṇa bakhāṇai | 39 |
śrame brikodara se jaḷare paśai yāiṁ
dharmabaka boilā mahātmā kṣaṇake raha tuhi | 40 |
kṣaṇeka biśrāma kara mohora bacana śuṇi
āho mahātamā jantuṁkara śreṣṭha mānaba śreṣṭha ye brāmaṇa
sehu brahmahatyā doṣahuṁ yebe acchi mahāpāpī
ẏethuṁ mahātmā tu pāṇi na pia adyāpi | 43 |
gaṅgā kisa doṣī ẏe anubrate bahanti | 44 |
pāṇi piante andha hoilā beni ye locana | 45 |
pāṇi pii āsante bhīma paḍilā mahīloṭi
boile tu bābu bahana hoi yāa re kirīṭī | 47 |
bābu apāra beḷa hoilā bhīmasena galā
pāṇi na pāilā ki abā pramāda paḍilā | 48 |
lg.note: raha raha pathuki re na bhakṣa ẏehu jaḷa
se brahmahatyā doṣaduṁ tīrtha ho hoiacchi pāṇi

lg.l: bhramiṇa banaste se galā yojana ye tini | 49 |
prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ se sehi banastare
ātreṣiṇa kari bīra jaḷaku dilā dr̥ṣṭi
dakṣiṇa digabhāge jaḷaku ḍeiṁ paḍalā kirīṭī | 51 |
pāṇi na khāa ẏethi bhitare na paśa | 52 |
go brāhmaṇa sahite janajantu ẏe aṭai nāśakara | 54 |
ẏe jaḷa pianteṇa bābu benicakṣu yāi phuṭi
ẏehā kahili māhātmā pāṇi an pia adyāpī | 56 |
śrame boilā pātha āge muṁ pāṇi mandiẏe piai
bhīma arjuna duhiṁkara na pāi bārata
biḷamba dekhi yujheṣṭhi deba baḍāi cakita | 60 |
lg.note: pūbongkūḷe māruti pacchimakūḷe kirīṭī |–ta, ñja, ṭa, ṭha, kha, na, tha
lg.l: bābu thokāẏe dūra yāakinā re nakuḷa
bhīma arjunata naile helāni āhānika beḷa | 61 |
saṁketa goḍāi yāiṁ prabeśa sehi stāne | 62 |
nakuḷa prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ uttara praśaste
se dharmabaka boilā tu raha raha bābu
baḍāi doṣī ẏe jaḷa piile maribu | 64 |
go brāhmaṇa atithi ẏetheṁ yete jaḷa bhakṣi
samaste nāśa yāāntiṭi ẏethi saṁśaẏa nāhiṁ kicchi | 65 |
ẏethira tadanta tote sabong kahilaiṁ bābu
nakuḷa boilā he tr̥ṣāẏe dahana mora kāẏe
āge ta piai muhiṁ ẏethu pāṇi phiṭiẏe | 67 |
dharmabakara bacana tāra manare na paśi
piilā pāṇi ye beni locanaku na diśi | 68 |
śarīra bisarjilā tāra jība galā chāḍi | 69 |
āpaṇe yujheṣṭhi deba ye pabongtuṁ uturi | 70 |
ẏehikṣaṇi ṭhābakari āsibi tumbhe ẏehi pabongte basithiba | 73 |
sahadeba prabeśa hoilā yāiṁ sehi jaḷa sannidhyāne | 75 |
śrameṇa ḍeiṁ se yāiṁ paḍilā mahājaḷe
dharmabaka ḍākadilā tāra pāṇi piibāra beḷe | 76 |
boilā na pia pāṇi bābu ẏe jaḷa baḍa manda
prāṇa bisarjana hoai ẏeṭhāre cakṣa hoai andha | 77 |
chāla yibā kāhiṁ ye gale chāribhāiṭi | 81 |
ẏethu anantare yujheṣṭhi dropatī ye hoile parabeśa
tr̥ṣāẏe tahiṁki talaẏe na kale dharmabāḷa | 83 |
se dharmabaka boilā tu śuṇa ho puruṣa
aneka hatyāẏeṇa ẏe jaḷa prāṇīṁka prāṇahāri | 85 |
na jāṇikari yeuṁ jana ẏe jaḷa piai
kūḷaku uṭhanteṇa ye kṣaṇeheṁ na jībai | 86 |
goru brāhmaṇa hatyāru achai ki doṣa
ẏehā jāṇi mahātamā jaḷare yāiṁ paśa | 87 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ye hoi biśvāsaghātakī
bhojana dei ye nāśa karai prāṇīṁki | 88 |
āpaṇe na dei ye databya lokanta bāri
kalāra kr̥takarma sehu yebaṇa loka hari | 89 |
āpaṇe na dei ye dātabya lokanta bāri
dharmabaka boile raha raha āre bābu
ẏe pāṇi piile tu sampoḍe nāśayibu | 92 |
bhantāra bidhvaṁsai ke saṁsāra karai nāśa | 93 |
yujheṣṭhidebe boile rājā dharmare hoẏe baśya
yujheṣṭhidebe boile se kathā nohoi nohoi | 95 |
āho dharmabaka tu aṭu baḍāi sugyāṁna
tāhā dekhante āna jaḷa ye na bandi | 98 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho nohoi ẏe bāṇī

lg.note: yujheṣṭhi debe boile sekathā na yogāi |–tha, ka, jha, cha
bidyāhiṁ se aṭaiṭi na sarai sādhana |–ga, ca, ḍha, tah, ṇa
lg.l: dharmabaka boile banastahuṁ ke baḍa acchi ṭiki
yāuṁ yāuṁ abaśya śeṣa hoi bana | 101 |
bidyā maitra prabāsaku śuṇa ho dhārmika | 104 |
dharmabaka boilā ho tu aṭu paṇḍita
gr̥haku maitra kehu kahibāka bākya satya | 105 |
āho mahātamā ke sakhā hoiba byādhiki | 107 |
āho mahātamā śarīrakaiṁ hoai apāra byādhi
śrānteṇa yujheṣṭhi deba ye pii loḍanti pāṇi
dharmabaka boilā raha raha piukinā ẏehikṣaṇi | 109 |
ke maitra huai prāṇa sandeha kāḷaku | 110 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho āna maitra nāhiṁ
dharma karithile prāṇa sandehaku maitraṭi sehi | 111 |
dharmabaka boilā āpada paḍile ke pāra karai
yujheṣṭhi boile ho durgā sumarile rakṣāpāi | 112 |
dharmabaka boile pramāda paḍile ke karai mukati
yujheṣṭhi boile dharmabaḷa thile phiṭai durgati | 113 |
śrānte yujheṣṭhi deba pii loḍanteṇa pāṇi
dharmabaka boilā kṣaṇe raha pāṇi khāusinā ẏehikṣaṇi | 114 |
śuṇa ho mahatamā catura aṅguḷa ākāśa | 116 |
keteka pāda aṭai hāde ẏehu pr̥thī | 117 |
chaḍarutu madhye kete kete dhārā ye baraṣi | 119 |
ẏete boli yujheṣṭhi āpyāna kari loḍanti pāṇi
dharmabaka boile mahātamā pāṇi piusinā ẏehikṣaṇi | 123 |
boile svarga mañcha pātāḷa ẏe tinibhmabane
ẏemanta boli kahile yujheṣṭhi deba nr̥pa | 126 |
kebaṇa bhmabane thāi satva raja tama | 127 |
satuṁ jāta biṣṇu sebanti pātāḷa svargabāse | 128 |
āho dharmabaka prātakāle brahmā madhyakāḷe bāsudeba
ke ke aṭanti pr̥thvī āpa teja bāẏabya ākāśa | 131 |
yujheṣṭhi boile pr̥thī bhūmi, āpa pāṇi, teja candra sūryya bāẏabya pabana, tārakā ākāśa
ādya anta madhya karibāku aṭanti ẏe pañcha puruṣa | 132 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ẏe pañcha pañchāśa bolāi
dharmabaka boilā bābu kāḷa boli kebaṇa puruṣa
ke tāra pitāmātā kāhuṁ kāhiṁ tāra bāsa | 134 |
stambhana mohana ye baśa uccāṭana dhātubādabidyā
dhārmika bibeka se kahi pārai saṁsiddhā | 136 |
lg.note: yujheṣṭhi debe boile satyuṁ jāta brahmā basai ākāśe
tamuṁjāta rudra ẏe basai madhyasvarga bāse |
rajaguṇuṁ jāta biṣṇu se basai pātāḷe

lg.l: yujheṣṭha debe boile ẏe janme tuhi abā hoilu āsi baka
kāḷa boliṇa hāde yeuṁṇa puruṣa bichāra
nāsikā cakṣu madhyare kara ho sandhāna | 139 |
na yāi na thāi nāśa nāhiṁ ude asta
prathame se abyakta helā lohitara barṇṇa
sabyakata kāḷe helā śuddha saṣṭikara cihna | 143 |
padmāsana hoiṇa se sthuḷa śūnya runddha | 144 |
pāda pātāḷare tumbhe thila yā pachāri | 146 |
abiśrāma puruṣa sarba kare se lekhana | 147 |
śuṇa dharmabaka brahmā na jāṇanta mūrtti
cihna barṇṇa nāhiṁ se śabadaku jāṇanti | 148 |

div.note: ṣaṭapada ādinātha na basai dhyāna |–ca, ṭa, ja, ṭha

lg.l: kāhāku keuṁ puruṣa na kare gaṇanā | 149 |
bīja patana hoile kṣaẏe nohe karme
kāḷa kāma bichāri kariba loka dharme | 150 |
baka bole mahātmā achai yebe dharma
pāṇi phuṭiẏe pia tu śānti hou śrama | 151 |
kiñchita pātaka thile na bhakṣibu pāṇi
dharma thile taribu pāpa thile maribu sehikṣaṇi | 152 |
dharma dharma sumari se deba dharmarāẏe
ātreṣiṇa āhāra kale pāṇi ye phuṭiẏe | 153 |
śānti upujibā yāẏe piile deba pāṇi
kaṇakalpa kari jāṇili tu aṭu ye yujehṣṭhi | 155 |
muhiṁ se yujheṣṭhi tu śuṇasi dhārmika | 156 |
moho bacana na kari śrānte pāṇi bhakṣi
maribaṭi boile śrānti na pārile mr̥cchi | 160 |

div.note: yogabaḷe jāṇili to nāma ye yujheṣṭhi |–ḍha, ta, ñja
badaẏanti dharmasuta śuṇa ho bibeka | (keteka pothi)
maribaṭi boli muṁ samastaṁku ḍākuacchi |–kha, cha, ṇa, na

lg.l: nakuḷaku yujheṣṭhi dhaile, arjunaku dhaile dropatī | 161 |
bho dharmabaka tu mahata sugyānī yugate
duigoṭiki pāribā ho mithyā kahibā akāraṇa | 164 |
duijaṇa koḷakari toḷa ho se pāāntu jībana | 165 |
dharmabaka boilā ho gataprāṇa na brati
tote sakhā hoibā nimante jīāṁibā duhinti | 167 |
āmbhara tahuṁ mahātamā ho āṣya kāḍhidebuṁ
ẏete bāge tohora beni sodara jīāiṁbu | 168 |
bhīma arjune deba toḷa ẏe duhinti | 169 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ẏe nohoi mahataṁka bāṇī
ẏeteka bichāra kariṇa se deba dharmasuta
madanā debīra go prāṇa pradoṣa kāḷe
nakuḷa sahadebanta āṇi dile mohora koḷe | 172 |

div.note: pradoṣa kāḷe–antima kāḷa, śeṣakāḷa–prāṇatyāga

lg.l: ẏehānta tote samarpi muhiṁ yāuacchi yujheṣṭhi | 173 |
ẏe putra duigoṭi samarpi gale mote
muhiṁ ẏebe dharma laṁghi tāhānta chāḍibi kemante | 174 |
marantu pache se bhīma arjuna beni bhrātha
ẏe duheṁ tohora bābu sodara aṭanti ṭiki | 176 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tumbhe śuṇa ho dhārmika
ẏe duheṁ aṭanti mohora ye ātmāra sārikṣa | 177 |
nakuḷa sahadeba uṭhi basile nija prāṇa gheni | 178 |
sujāṇa puruṣa tu pratakṣe aṭa debadharma | 180 |

div.note: “ẏehānta tote samarpi muhiṁ yāuacchi yujheṣṭhi”
ẏehāṁkara pāpapuṇya lāgai ṭikire bābu tote
doṣakale upekṣā karibu dharmasute |
tu mohora suputra kisa bolibaiṁ tote |
guruṁka dakṣiṇā tu debu mora hāde |
ẏeseneka se boliṇa achanti kaniṣṭha mātā
tāhāṁkara bacana muṁ kesaneke laṁghantā |
sukṣaṇe janma tu pratakṣe aṭu dharma |–ḍa, ḍha

lg.l: ẏeḍe dhārmika tu aṭu sādhu tohora jībanagoṭi
manuṣya janma prāẏe tote bujhuthili yujheṣṭhi | 181 |
bābu tohora mane ṭikiẏe hiṁsā bhāba na dhari | 182 |
sābata hiṁsā tumbhe na dhaila mana
nicaẏe aṭu tu dharma puruṣa uttama | 183 |
se duhinti mahātamā ho dhara koḷakari | 184 |
dharmabaka boile re parama āṣya hou tuku | 185 |
bhīma arjuna duheṁ uṭhi basileka ceti
dharmabaka boilā bābu tu aṭu somabongśī
mohora pāśaku bābu pāribu ki āsi | 187 |
apāra dr̥gama ẏe kemante yibi jiṇi | 188 |
dharmabaka boile tohora sata yebe dharma
pāpa thile nāśayānti jaḷare ye karanti utakarma | 189 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhira pūbongra ẏeheneka kathā
satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭheiśa sahasra baraṣa
sahasra mukha brahmā basai yaśobantī bhmabana svarge | 192 |

div.note: manaṣya janma prāẏe tote na bujhai yujheṣṭhi |–ja, ga, gha, ṭha, ṭa, jha
jaḷapāṇi–jaḷapūrṇṇa |
anumate nabalakṣa nausahasra baraṣa |–gha, tha, ḍa

lg.l: śateka mukha īśvara haṭakeśvara pure catrabratī | 193 |
se indrakāḷe nabalakṣa nausahasra yojana pr̥thī
baḷībeṇu mānadhātā jānughaṇṭa pururabā haricandana nr̥pati | 195 |
sūryyasenara putra se dakṣa prajāpatira nāti | 196 |
baśiṣṭhaṁku gheni rājā ākāśa gaṅgākūḷe saṁkalpa kaẏe | 198 |
abicchanne dāna diai ye yetebeḷe yāhā māgi
yehne saṁkalpa karai tehne diẏe dāna
dvādaśa catrabratī rāẏe kehi nohile samāna | 200 |

div.note: bāsabāri–daitāri sadr̥śa pāṭha, ari śa(?)dda śreṣṭhārthaka |
“baḷībeṇu mānadhātā jānughaṇṭa pururabā haricandana nr̥pati”
prajāmāne sukhare ye rahiṇa thāānti
beṇubaḷī ādi haricandana nr̥apti |
se bongśare rājā ye ikṣvākura nr̥pati
īkṣvākurara mahimāṁ śuṇasi dharmarāẏe |
baśiṣṭhaṁku saṅge gheni kururājā poẏe
ākāśa gaṅgāra kūḷe prabeśa hoile
āpaṇā icchāre sehu saṁkalpa ye kale |
teja samārji rājā samasta bināśile |–na, ṇa

lg.l: se īkṣāku rājye yete rākṣasa pichāśa
sapata dīpa madhye se ẏekāṅga catrabratī
nabadīpa sapata sāgara bhramai dinakare bhale | 204 |
sapata dīpa pr̥thīre se āgyādilā rājā
yeteka arjai ohorāśi bhoga kariba parajā | 205 |
kandamūḷa āhāre bane rājā thāi rahi | 206 |
kāhākaiṁ kicchi nāhiṁ sukhe nianti duirāśi | 207 |
se rājāra bhāriyā nīrabatī boli rāṇī
satī satyabatī se lakṣmī sarikṣe jāṇi | 210 |
se icchvākurara bhāriyā samodre yāi chāli
nabalakṣa yojana agāda jaḷe na tintai pādatali | 211 |

div.note: duṣṭapaṇa chāḍi samaste hoileka toṣa |–kha, ṇa, na, ṭha
duṣṭapaṇa chāḍi samapte kale chāṣa |–ca, ja, ḍa, ṅa
ye yāhā arajai ohorāśi khāibe janaprajā |–cha, ṇa, na; kha
ye yete arajibe duirāśi nebe prajā |–ḍha, ñja
kāhākaiṁ sañjā nāhiṁ sukhe nianti duirāśi |–ḍa, ḍha, ṅa
kāhākuhiṁ na diai bhmañjai duirāśi |–ca, ja, jha

lg.l: ẏemante khāra samodr̥ṁ chāliyāiṁ kṣīrasindhu pariyante
kṣīra samodr̥ṁ pāṇi āṇai sehu nitye | 212 |
śuṇa bābu yujheṣṭhi se rājā icchvākuru
satyayuge nabalakṣa baraṣa pariyante rājyabhoga karu | 213 |
prajāẏe boile āmbhara āṣya hoilāka tāku bratithāuṁ icchvākura rājā | 214 |
satyayuge rājā rājya karai nabalakṣa baraṣa
pati patnī duheṁ ye nabayubā baẏasa | 215 |
āho yujheṣṭha ẏe saṁsāre tāhāku bolanti dhani dhani
nakṣatra hoi basile putra bhāriyānta gheni | 216 |
chāri samudra jiṇi se rājāra rāṇī galā chāli
kṣāra nīra śveta jiṇiyāi kṣīra samudraku boli | 218 |
tu mahā dhārmika aṭu ho mahārāẏe
āho yujheṣṭhi samasta dharma tora jāṇimā ẏehiṭhāru
jaḷara bhitare tu yebe chāli āsipāru | 220 |
śiuḷī patre patre deba caraṇa dei dei
yujheṣṭhi debe boile śuṇa ho dharmabaka
pakṣījantu hoi tu ye ẏeḍeka dhārmika | 222 |
ẏemanta rūpa dharu tu kebaṇa mahātamā
tu ki harihara indra kobera bedabrahmā | 223 |

div.note: sapata samodre agādha jaḷe aṅga na tintai–ṅa, ṭha, na, kha ñja, jha, cha, ṇa

lg.l: satyabara dhārmika ye bāchā tora siddhi
dharmabaka boilā ho śuṇa mora bākya
śukḷāmbara puruṣa muhiṁ dharma ye debatā
aile ẏetebeḷe bheṭa muṁ pāili debasvāmī | 231 |
muhiṁ ye taba nandana kointāṁka jyeṣṭhaputra
bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba se āmbhara aṭanti sānabhrātha | 232 |
sañchaẏe bheṭiba tumbhe andheka sarobara pāśa | 234 |
teṇukari jagi muṁ ẏe tīrthe acchi basi
ẏe tīrtha mahimāṁ tu śuṇa ho somabongśī | 235 |

div.note: se dharmabaka boilā bābu śuṇimā yujheṣṭhira

lg.l: bābu agyāne ẏe tīrthe acchi basi
ẏe tīrtha mahimāṁ tu śuṇa ho somabongśī | 236 |
bābu agyāne ẏe tīrthe ye jaḷa āpyāna kari
ẏe jaḷa piante mr̥tu pāibaṭi dharmaśiṣa | 238 |
bābu tumbhara nimante muhiṁ patha acchi nirekhi
taba kāryya arthe muhiṁ basiacchi ṭāki | 239 |
muhiṁ se dharmadebatā śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
na puṇa jaḷa ẏethi piiba kumara
mohora ḍākante ḍāka kehi na śuṇanti
tohora bhāimāne bola na kale mohora
bābu ẏe jaḷaku hāde grāsa tuhi karuthilu
tu gyānī puruṣa mora ḍākante rahilu | 245 |
tote dekhibi boli br̥kṣe thāi nitye | 246 |
muhiṁ se dharmabaka tu jāṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
dharma āchāre bābu re bañchāi ariṣṭi | 247 |

div.note: bābu tumbhara pāiṁ āmbhe patha niropi nibeśi

lg.l: bābu tote bheṭili mo jībana suphaḷa
tu se bongśa uddharibu mohora kumara | 249 |
pāde paḍiṇa yujheṣṭhi bolanti namo namo
nistarili nistarli muhiṁ bheṭilaiṁ ye paraṁbrahma | 251 |
puṇa puṇa praṇapatya dharmabaka pāde hoi
ẏe sarobara kathā mote kahibāka gosāiṁ | 252 |
ẏetheṁ pāṇi pianteṇa kiṁpā cakṣu yāi phuṭi
badaẏanti deba dharme bābu śuṇimā sābadhāne
tohori prāẏe hoi tretaẏāe śrīrāma aileka bane | 255 |

div.note: “tohori prāẏe hoi tretaẏāre śrīrāma aileka
sūryyabongśe rājā daśarathaṁka nandane
pitāra bacane rāma bulile gore bane |
tu rājya harāi buluchu banastare yehne |
sehi kauśalyā nandana ye pitāra bola pāḷi

lg.l: rājyabhāra teji rāma bane gale caḷi |
saṅge bhāi laikṣaṇa janaka rāja putrī

div.note: tinijaṇa tule gheni banaste kale thiti |
khāiṇa kandamūḷa ye pāṇi taruphaḷa
dina haruthānti sehu baḍāi kutūhoḷa |
pañcha baṭī bane āsi rājā daśaśira
sītāṁku harinelā basāi rathara |
bane bane heri rāma loḍanti baidehī
sugrīki bheṭile ruṣyamūka pabongtare yāiṁ | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: setu bānddha rāma rābaṇare hoilā samara

div.note: (pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
bāḷiki badhi rāma setubandha bānddha
laṁkāre prabeśi rāma subaḷaẏāre gaḍabānddha |
yuddhagoḷa lagālā rājā daśamātha
prathame nāśile rāma putra indra jita |
bhāi kumbhakarṇṇa tāhāra kṣatriẏa bīramaṇi
sāṁgrāme paśilā sehu rāhuteja jāṇi |
aneka sāṁgrāma se kalā rāmacandre
śrīrāma śare kumbhakarṇṇara nohilāka śiracchede |
mr̥tubheda kahilā se biśrabāra suta
tāhāra bāṇī śuṇi śrīrāma hoile hetugate |
khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kari kāṭanteṇa muṇḍa
adabhmate datyabīrara chālai mr̥tupiṇḍa |
kopeṇa rāmacandra dhaile kodaṇḍa
tīkṣaśara gheniṇa kāṭile tāra muṇḍa |
tuṇḍa bistāriṇa bānaranta yāi giḷi
muṇḍaku tāhāra kaleka beniphāḷi |
āraphāḷa āsi paḍilā banastara
teṇu ẏehāra nāma andheka sarobara |

lg.l: laṁkā dīpuṁ āsi paḍilāka ẏethi ghoṭi | 264 |
kumbhakarṇṇa kapāḷa ye aṭai ẏehu sarobara
dharmabaka boilā bābu śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhira | 265 |
asura bhogya hoilā ẏe gaṅgājaḷa pāṇi
kāḷānaḷa jvāḷājaḷa ẏethe ye paśanti na jāṇi | 266 |
bābu kāḷakūṭa biṣa aṭai ẏehu jaḷa
na jāṇi khāile jaḷa abaśya pūrai ye kāḷa | 267 |
nīḷa utapaḷa parāẏe dekha ẏe pāṇiru diśai jyoti
asura byatrake āna na pārai jaḷa bhakṣi | 268 |
deba mānabaṁku ẏe jaḷa na yāiṭi pāra
ẏe jaḷa piikari mr̥tu pāile apāra | 269 |
hāthī ghoḍā byāghra maiṁṣī oṭa gadha jība
ẏe pāṇi piante mr̥tu pāileṭi sabong | 270 |
bābu pāñchakośa dīrghe ẏethe niẏaḍe nāhiṁ jaḷa
bābu, go brāhmaṇa ādikari chārikhāni caurāśī koṭi jībajantu
ẏethe pāṇi piile abaśya pāi mr̥tu | 273 |
ẏe saṁsāra janaṁkara abasthā dukha dekhi
jaḷa ādhāra na kara boli muṁ kahai abaśya
bāchā na śuṇi ye piai abaśya yānti nāśa | 275 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile ẏehi jaḷa aṭe biṣa
ẏethi jaḷa bhakṣile abaśya huai prāṇe nāśa | 276 |
hatyā bibādī ye aṭai ẏehu jāṇa
ẏe jaḷa pabitra kehne hoibāka kāraṇa | 277 |
ẏe jaḷaku kāraṇa kara tuhi putra mora | 278 |
tu dharma puruṣa tohora kara ẏe jaḷe yahuṁ lāgi
ājhuṁ ẏe mokṣa hoilā andheka tīrtha puṇyabhāgī | 279 |
bhāi bhāriyānta gheni ẏetheṁ srāhāna kara ho yujheṣṭha
pabitra hou ẏe tāra śatadoṣa yāu meṇṭi | 281 |
sehi srāhāna kale ye akāda jaḷaṭhāba | 282 |
āpaṇe srāhāna ye kale deba dharme
rūpaguṇa sundara ye ki debā upāma | 285 |

div.note: ājhuṁ se tīrtha mokṣa hoiba aneka puṇyabhāgī |–ṇa, na
upāma–upamā |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi sānanda hoile tāhāṁka rūpa dekhi | 286 |
se kapāḷeśvara tīrthe rahile marttibanta hoi | 287 |
pūjanti yujheṣṭhi debe nityeheṁ karanti sebā | 288 |
śuddha saṣṭika paṭaḷa tu deba haranātha
namo namo deba nirākāra nirālamba śuddhadehā
jāta madhya ante tuhi se sabuṁkara prāṇa | 293 |
namo namo pābaka he pāda ūrddhe pūjā

div.note: namo namo dharma aṭa sabongsāhā |–ca, ja, ṅa
cirakāḷa bhmajaṅga saẏaḷa bhābarehā |–ta, ñja
kṣīra kākusta bhmajaṅga saẏaḷa bhāroā |–ṇa, kha, cha
namo namo pabana pābana adha urddhve pūjā |–ca, ja
namo namo pāpahantaka pāda udake pūjā |–ca, ñja

lg.l: śudramuni sāroḷa dāsa dharmaliṅga caraṇe ye sebe | 297 | | 4086 |

div.note: tatapataṅga nātha yaśa śauryya arthe |–ga, jha
śrīdharmadebatā pañchabatra bhābe

div.head: belābaḷī upākhyāna

lg.l: iti śrī biṣṇa purāṇa āraṇyaka pabng kathā | 1 |
maghā nakṣatraku bhogya aṭai se dinara | 3 |

div.note: bhābānī mādhabī lakṣmī gomatī hāḷīka |–kha, na, ṭha
ākāśa bāhinī kāka barāhī hatamudrā |–ca, ṭa, ṭha
hema kedāra nepāḷe paśupati |–ca, ja
hemāñchi haripābaka kedāra nepāḷa paśupati |–ta, ñja

lg.l: śvetagaṅgā suragaṅgā gupatagaṅgā satya medhā mekhaḷā | 11 |
prāgabaṭa bārāṇasī ẏehāṁkara mūḷe sāgara saṅgama | 12 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni ye kṣetrādhi puṣkara
se puṣkara koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni āsuacchi bhrami
gautamī tīrthe koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni puṣkara bijekale āsi | 16 |
yahiṁ puṣkara bije karai sehu huai mahātīrtha
tahiṁ bije karanti ye sakaḷa daibata | 17 |
br̥haspati kahile ye amara pura sabhā
beḷa jāṇi srāna kaleka deba surapati | 19 |

div.note: kāberī kaudāminī ye uttama |–ṭa, ṭha, ṅa, ca
rohiṇī maudadhi gaṅgā candra kānti gaṇḍa |–kha, ṭa
yahiṁ yoga ghaṭai tahiṁ se biśrāmi |–ta, ñja

lg.l: samasta rājāmāne daṇḍa palāṇile gautamī tīrthaku | 25 |
dvādaśa baraṣa paryyante dehare pātaka nuārai ābori | 26 |
ẏe tīrtha gautamī kūḷe ye diai piṇḍadāna
ānaśrāddha na kariba dvādaśa baraṣa pariyante | 28 |
mātr̥loka pitr̥loka maitrī kuṭumba saṁghāta ādi jana
tete lokaṁkaiṁ acchi gati mukati kāraṇa

div.note: janmara duṣkr̥ta ye harai sāhāne
tete lokamāne pāānti agatigata mokṣa

lg.l: dakṣiṇa digaru tinisahasra rājā ye bijaẏe | 34 |
aṣṭakuḷā nāganta gheni aile gautamī tīrtha dekhi | 35 |
bhīṣma droṇa kr̥pa bidura bhūriśrabā śalya karṇṇa | 38 |
āre nāge āḍoho āḍoho boli se lagāilā kaḷi | 41 |

div.note: daṇḍagheni bāhi āsanti sakaḷa saunidhi |–ca, ṭa, jha

lg.l: ẏe nāga kumāre ye dhuśāsanakaiṁ bheṭi
boile mānabā re kimpe nāganta āsuachu piṭi | 45 |
dhāiṁle kumāre ye ārdrābaḷī śara gheni
bhāñjiṇa paḍilā ye kamaḷāura nāgara phera | 47 |
nāgabaḷa sainiki se na kale gaṇitā | 49 |
nāga manaṣye ye hoile sabonge goḷa
ẏe mahāyoddhāẏe ye aṭanti baḍa duṣṭa
bābu buḍilāka nāgabaḷa ke pāra āsi rakha | 59 |
belābaḷī nāgeṇī se lohitākṣa nāgara dohitā
śaradhā kari sabonge kaurabe ye bhīmaku nele
bhojane saṁgrāme śr̥ṅgāre se aṭai atriputi | 62 |
ẏebidhi tiniṣāṭhi pauṭi bhīmasenara huai dinaku | 63 |
bhīmasena malā lobhe apāra anna khāi
kehi na jāṇu boli yamunāre bānddha melileka nei | 66 |
sundara dekhiṇa se lohitākṣa nāgara dulāḷī

div.note: garāsi–grāsa karibā khāibā |

lg.l: amr̥ta laḍu nei se tāhāku khaāilā
se jaḷa andhāra pure nāgeṇī khaṭai paricaryya
bhīmasena tāra ballabha nāgeṇī tāhāra hoilā bhāriyā | 71 |
amr̥ta laḍu bhākṣi bhīmara sahasre guṇa baḷahoi
aneka nāgabaḷa māri se jaḷa andhāra puru bāhāra huai | 72 |
se belābaḷī nāguṇī saṅge bhīma kalāka pīrati
putra dekhi nāgeṇī ye haraṣa hoilā
baḷībelāḷa boliṇa se putrara nāma dilā | 75 |
tiriśi baraṣa ye aṭai se belāḷa kumara
takṣaka ḍāka dilā re bābu ke pāra nāgabaḷa rakha | 77 |
dakṣiṇakare muthe uñchāi dhuśāsana mukhe māri

div.note: bhīmasena manohārī se ye hoilā bhāriyā |–ca, ja
beḷābaḷī bhīmasenara se hoilā bhāriyā |–ta, ñja, ḍa, ṭa
amr̥ta nabakuṇḍa piāile se bhīmasena bīra

lg.l: rāhura teja prāẏe baḷībelāḷa ye uṭha | 82 |
binddhalā roṣeṇa nārāja ye rādheba nandana | 84 |
nārāje paḍi cūra houchanti ye baḷībelāḷa upare | 85 |
re re kāra kariṇa karṇṇaku māilā bīra muthe
karṇṇahiṁ loṭi paḍilā se kumāra muthaghāte | 87 |
ati kopeṇa dhāmaiṁ sehi nāguṇīra baḷa

div.note: duiratha bhāñjiṇa hoilā masīguṇḍā
mahājenā–bīraṅkara upādhi |

lg.l: re re kāra kari kumara prahārilā pāde
paḍileka śalye ye mukhu gaḷai śroṇi
goḍāi piṭilā se bāḷuta bhāba kheḍe | 101 |
daṇḍabhagna dekhiṇa bhīṣma droṇa bege uṭhi

div.note: jaẏa śaṅkhanāda karai bhīmara santati |–ka, ḍha, ta, ca, ḍa

lg.l: kr̥tāntaka bijaẏe kalāki saṁjībanī pura upekṣi | 106 |
ẏeḍebaḍa thāṭa dekhiṇa tāra kiñchite bhaẏanāhiṁ | 107 |
droṇa boile bhīṣme ẏe kāhāra santati
bhīṣme boile ẏe ki aṭai ghaṭautkaṭa
se kāhuṁ miḷibaṭi ye nāgaṁkara saṅgata | 112 |
asuta bongśare se jāta hoiacchi jāṇa
āna kehu abā ẏehu puruṣa sihāṇa
kāhāra nandana ẏe bujhibā tathya jāṇa
ẏesaneka bichāra ye karanti bhīṣma droṇa | 116 |

div.note: pracaṇḍa megha bhitare yesaneke diśai bijuḷi

lg.l: bhīṣma droṇa duheṁ ẏeheneka bichāruṁ bichāruṁ
dekhi bhīṣma droṇe kope uṭhile gaḷagāji
āre raha raha boli kaurobanta hāki
gajayūtha rahai ki siṁghara darpa dekhi | 119 |
mahāmatta nāga dui dhariacchi beni hātha | 120 |
droṇe boile gāṅgeba dekha ho sākṣāta
bichāruṁ bichāruṁ āsai yojaneka pantha kṣepi
ẏekā kṣaṇakara madhye se droṇaṁkara ratha byāpi | 122 |
bichāri bujha tumbhe pachāriṇa guru droṇa | 123 |
ẏesaneka bichāra karante bhīṣma droṇa benirathī
sannidhye ratha gaja kicchihiṁ na pāi
droṇaṁkara rathare uṭhile bhīṣma bege yāiṁ | 126 |
nāgeṇī prasannuṁ ye bajra tāra kāẏe
bajre nibongṇa aṭai ye tāhāra śarīra
śarīre paḍi bajra śakati hoilāka cūri | 130 |
se mahāanaḷa śara saṁharilā tāhāra garbhe | 131 |
dekhiṇa kicchi na phurai beni mahārathī
dhāiṁṇa kumāra prāhāra kalā amoha śakati | 132 |
droṇaṁkara ratha bhāñji hoilā śate cūnā
abheda kapaca gheni māilā baḷī ye belāḷa
śoṇita tāhāṁka śarīru bahai khaḷa khaḷa | 134 |
puṇihiṁ gadā dhari piṭai se adhara kari pr̥ṣṭhe
bhīṣma droṇa duheṁ asaṣṭama hoi paḍile niceṣṭe | 135 |
bhīṣma droṇa paḍibā dekhiṇa rājā driyodhana
satāṇoi bhāi gheni yuddhaku dhāmaiṁ bahana | 136 |
hāthīẏe hāthīẏe ābori samasta bhāi caḍhi
mahā mahā śahasra gheni karanti samara
deba śahasra na bhedai kumara śarīra | 138 |
kopeṇa piṭilā nei driyodhana hāthīra upara | 139 |
pabongta samāna hoi hāthī paḍilā gaḷagāji | 140 |

div.note: śoṇita udugāri paḍile beni mahābaḷa |–ṭa, ṭha, ṅa
puṇi roṣe dhāiṁṇa se gadāgheni piṭe |–cha, kha, ṇa, ta, ja, na

lg.l: sādhu sādhu kumara mahimāṁ tora dhani dhani
sādhu sādhu re tohora piara jananī | 141 |
pādagati hoiṇa paḷāilā māna ye gobinda
bhūriśrabā bāhlika somadatta tiniheṁ āborile dvandva | 142 |
ẏekamukha hoi kumaraku bāṇa se bindhanti | 143 |
nārājaku nirbhaẏā se ye kumara pañchāṇa
garjiṇa uṭhilā se somadatta bhūriśrabākaiṁ dekhi | 146 |
se gadā piṭilā nei bhūriśrabāṁkara rathe | 147 |
mahā mahā rathīẏe yahuṁ samare paḍile
mānagobinda dūre thāiṇa tāhā se dekhile | 153 |
śate sahasra bāṇa kumāra ātreṣiṇa sanddha | 155 |
giribara samāne se achai sabong sahi
rathara pare neiṇa āreka ratha piṭi
paḍile yoddhāẏe ye hāthī aśva piṭhi loṭi | 158 |
bhāñjileka śara yahuṁ na bhedilā śarīra
kunta lāṁkiā asipatra paḍi sabong houchanti cūra | 159 |
kauraba saini ye pāile baḍa dukha

div.note: paḍile yoddhāẏe ye mahīpare loṭi |–ṅa, kha
paḍiṇa yoddhāẏe ye bhūmiru nuāranti uṭhi |–ka, ḍha, jha, ṭa

lg.l: sehi gadābara gheni kopeṇa bīra piṭi
paḷāi lucilā yāiṁ rājya banasta bhitara | 169 |
aṣṭādaśa kṣauṇī baḷa manthilā bīra ẏekā | 170 |
sehi sārikṣe baḷībelāḷa teja diśe jhaḷi | 171 |
asra śasramāna tāhāra śarīre na bhedai
dekhiṇa ḍare kehi na rahanti chāmure tāhāra
mahā mahā yoddhāmāne paḷāile tejiṇa dhanuśara | 175 |
ratha gaja aśva teji daśanaha bharanti mukhara | 176 |
aneka bikaḷe se nisate śaraṇa māgi
praśu prahāreṇa śira cchiḍi paḍai bhūmitaḷa | 178 |
paḷāi saini paśile gahana ye bana

div.note: tretaẏā yuge yesane praśurāma mahābaḷī |–ṅa, ṭa, tha

lg.l: nisata hoiṇa tu yibu āja kāhiṁ | 180 |
bichārai kumara ẏeta bidyādhara prāẏeka diśai
ẏehākaiṁ prāṇe ho na nāśibi muhiṁ | 184 |
ātreṣi ḍeiṁ paḍilā baḷī ye belāḷa
bhāṁjiṇa asipatra tāra śarīre na kāṭi | 186 |
dui bhmajare dui duijaṇaṁkara bāḷa acchi dhari | 188 |
caḷai nija bhmabane se amāpata mahāyodhī | 189 |
yujheṣṭhi debe āhārṇṇika karuchanti bhānumatī nadī tīre
baḍa baḷabantā se ye ẏekai bāḷuta tanaẏe | 195 |
ẏe chārinta bandhana kari yāuacchi gheni | 196 |
ratha gaja aśva saini kicchi nāhiṁ saṅge
dhāaṁ re bhīma arjuna bhāinta sambhāḷa | 200 |
bhīmasena boilā deba aniryāpa ẏehu kathā
śatra ku ẏeheneka kimpā pāuacha byathā | 201 |
svāmī kete kete kaṣṭa se na dilā āmbhaṁku
yujheṣṭhi deba boile bābure na hoi ẏemanta
se āmbhara sodara ye aṭai niritānta | 203 |
karṇṇa ye paḍiacchi sehi āmbhara jyeṣṭha
āmbhara dekhante se kinā hoibe prāṇebhraṣṭa | 204 |
sodara nohi yebe āmbhara hoibe bairi
ānara tahuṁ ghenimā, pache tāhānta āmbhe saṁhāri | 205 |
driyodhana dhuśāsana karṇṇa śakuni yebe baḷire paḍile
bhīṣma droṇa ādi prāṇe chanti ṭiki bhale | 206 |

div.note: pabanuṁ āghāte se caḷai gagana mārge |–ṅa, ṭa

lg.l: driyodhana dhuśāsana male anāsta hoiba dhr̥tarāṣṭa | 207 |
bābu anubrate prāṇīki rāga nohai bhala
sabongdā nadī bābure na bahai samatula | 208 |
sehu se parama paṇḍitaṭi bolanti mahātamā | 209 |
bābu ẏeḍeka saṁkaṭu yebe pāribāka uddhari
bābu mohora śapathaṭi re bhīma arajuna
nakuḷa sahadeba ādikari dhāaṁ re bahana | 211 |
āre āre boliṇa bhīma ḍāge kareṇa gadā gheni
bulāi kari piṭilā āṇi bhīmasena upare pratakṣa | 215 |

div.note: “nakuḷa sahadeba ādikari dhāaṁ re bahana”
āre yadyapi mukuḷa tumbhe na kariba driyodhanaku
ẏehi nadīre jhāsibi na pāiba āmbhaṁku |
āho yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara niṣṭhāpara bacane
nadīra bhitare yāiṁ paśile paṇḍara nandane
dhātikāre pāri hoile nadīgoṭi
bāhānāda kari dhāmanti yujheṣṭhiṁka kaneṣṭhi |

lg.l: se bāunabhāra gadā gheni baḷībelāḷa bulāilā | 218 |
dekhiṇa thambhībhuta bhīmasenara na phurai kicchi
ẏekā gadāẏeka gheniṇa bhīmasena ubhā hoiacchi | 219 |
sehi gadā bulāiṇa baḷī ye belāḷa
puṇa puṇa piṭāpiṭi huanti br̥kṣanta upāḍi | 222 |
bandhanu phiṭile karṇṇa śakuni dhuśāsana driyodhana
na rahanti katire se paḷābanti dūrahoi

div.note: thambhībhūta–stambhībhūta |
śūnyahātha hoiṇa bhīmasena ubhā hoiacchi |–na, ṇa, cha, kha

lg.l: thokāẏe dūre ye karṇṇa chāhiṁlā pachaku | 227 |
āmbhanta goḍāi sehu nāhiṁ ye pachara | 228 |
pāṇḍabaṁka tule se samara kalā rahi
bho mitra pāṇḍabaṁka tule dekha bāḷutara yuddha
br̥kṣara uhāḍe thāiṁ dekhibā chāla sadha | 230 |
pāṇḍabaṁka thāānte āmbhaṁku kicchi bhaẏe nāhiṁ
śakuni boilā ho mohora bola śuṇa | 232 |
śakuni boilā ho bipatha amārga bandhana thibā bhūiṁ
phiṭile tahiṁ bābu daṇḍeheṁ na rahi | 233 |
śakuni boilā ho bābu jaẏekalā gaḍaiṁ
kṣaṇeheṁ na rahi tahiṁ āsibā nijapure | 235 |

div.note: sadha–śaradhā |
rahiṇa saṁhariṇa chāla yibā puṇa |–ṇa, cha, kha, na
śakuni boilā ho bandhana thilā bhūiṁ
kṣaṇeheṁ na rahi tahiṁ uṭhiāsiba dhātikāe |–ṭa, ṅa
kṣaṇeheṁ na rahi tahiṁ uṭhiyiba khare |–ta, ñja

lg.l: kāryya yahiṁ labhi, tahiṁ na rahiba kṣaṇe
ẏete parimāṇi na pāranti yeuṁṇa jana
piṇḍadāna kari tahiṁ kṣaṇeka na biśrāmi | 239 |
paḷābanti chāriheṁ ye śakuni mantrīra bacane
bāhuḍanti nr̥patiẏe ye tīrthasrāna na kari
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ hastinā nagra purī | 242 |
ẏemantara samaẏe bhīṣma droṇa yāiṁ kahile śuṇa dhr̥tarāṣṭa
śuṇa deba kurupati tote paḍilā bahuta kaṣṭa | 244 |
tīrthayātrā ārambhe āmbhe yāithiluṁ saini gheni
goḍāi māilā sehu aneka nāgabaḷa sanya | 246 |
binddhale na phāṭai hāṇile na kāṭai | 248 |
bahuta saini se māriṇa kalā cūra | 249 |
dra yodhana dhuśāsana karṇṇa ye śakuni
ẏe chārinti bandīkari se galā bege gheni | 251 |
ki abā se nāśakara ki abā se dharma
tāra mukhaṁ uburiba kari ke sāṁgrāma | 254 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe āsi prabeśa jaṇa chāri | 257 |

div.note: “asambhāḷa hoi āmbhe paḷāi ailu”
bāhuḍai driyodhana tīrtha ye na kari
paśile gahane kumaraku bhaẏe kari
goḍachechā muṇḍaphaṭā kehu sanya
paḷāi paśile yāiṁ hastinā bhmabana |
pañchagrāma loke rodanti sumari |–ta, ñja
pañchagrāme ye robanti naranārī |–gha, ja
deśāure–bārttābaha (chāra) |

lg.l: na kara rodana thira hua nr̥parāṇa | 259 |
ẏeheneka apāduṁ tari ailu keuṇa bāge | 261 |
chārinti āmbhanta ho yāuthilā se gheni | 262 |
bhīma arajuna ye āsi paśile samare
baḍa baḷabantā se dhanya jībana tāhāri | 265 |
yahuṁ bhīma arjuna kaleka yāiṁ raṇa
āmbhe ẏeṇe paḷāi ailuṁ keśabāsa asambhāḷeṇa | 268 |
dhr̥tarāṣṭa boile se pāṇḍabe dhani dhani
bidure boile bābu kimpāiṁ ẏehā kalu
jaẏe aprāṁjaẏe pariyante kimpāiṁ na rahilu | 270 |
svarga marttye pātāḷe tāṁku nāhiṁ kehi jiṇantā | 271 |
pāṇḍabaṁkara thāānte te te nāhiṁnā paramāda
kimpāiṁ na bichāri nāśakalu ẏeḍeka sampada | 272 |
śakuni kahe na jāṇa kehi taitha
pāṇḍabongka jiṇante ye āmbhanta nāhiṁ yaśa
pāṇḍabnta jiṇile se āmbhanta karantā nāśa | 274 |
samare goḷakari na puṇa māranti āmbhaṁku | 275 |
āmbhara deha ye na patāilā pāṇḍabaṁku
kadāścite pāṇḍabaṁkara āmbhaṁku nāhiṁ nā biśvāsa
kebaṇa bhāgya se pheḍile āmbhara phāsa | 277 |
dhanya dhanya śakuni jībana tora dhani dhani
ẏebe tāra male bhala pāṇḍabe male kāryya
rājā yebe aile sethira helā rājya | 281 |

div.note: bacana sampade bheṭāilā śakuni |–ca, ṇa, cha, kha, na
sabuntihiṁ rucilā amr̥ta pāna jāṇi |–ta, ñja
“sarūpa br̥ttānta kahilu mantrī cūḍāmaṇi” pare “ṅa” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
maraṇaku ghaṭāiṇa kahai śakuni
mūrkhaku rucilā mantrī buddhi dhani dhani |
bhīṣme droṇe bolanti śakuni mukha chāhiṁ
nice somabongśa nāśa karāibu tuhi |
śuṇa ho rājana dhuśāsana bīra karṇṇa
tumbhanta yeuṁ kumara kalāka bandhana | (abaśisṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: driyodhana boilā ho tu mahāpaṇḍita mantrī guṇanidhi
pāṇḍabe kemanta kathā hoilā baḷībelāḷa tanu | 283 |
āre āre boliṇa bhīmaku pādeka prahāri
sehi gadā gheni bīra āteṣiṇa piṭi
bhīmasena śarīre paḍi rudhira hoilāka br̥ṣṭi | 288 |
moheṇa paḍi uṭhilā se pabanara baḷā
baḷībelāḷa hr̥de bāji pabongta hoileka dhūḷi | 290 |

div.note: (pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
tā bandhanuṁ ke tumbhanta rakhi nuārile
pāṇḍabe tumbhanta sinā jībadāna dile |
śuṇa ho śakuni tu yeteka kahu kathā
mūrkhaku ruce āmbhanta na ruce sarbathā |
maraṇaru tumbhanta se kaleka tāraṇa
guṇa nohilā tāṁkara bāchu abiguṇa
driyodhanaku yujheṣṭhi mane nāhiṁ āna
tāṁka bacane chaḍāi dilā bhīmasena |

lg.l: dhāmaiṁ kumara hāṇite kare bijekarṇṇakaṭārī dhari
āre raha raha boli yāiṁ arjuna ābori | 293 |
dhanure guṇa ṭaṁkāra kariṇa bīra phālaguni
puṇa pāñcha nārāja binddhalā subhadrāra nāhā
nirghāta nārāja ye hr̥de tāra paḍi
pāñcha pāñchakhaṇḍa hoi paḍilā nārāja cchiḍi | 296 |
śarīra na kampai se sohoḍa pañchāṇa | 297 |
puṇa sahasre nārāja pātha kope peṣi
baḷībelāḷa dehe paḍi sabonge hoile dhvaṁsi | 298 |
dui bāhāku binddhalā dui sahasra śara
hr̥daẏaku binddhalā nārāja śate ye pandara | 299 |
dui sahasra bāṇa binddhalā dui ye pādaku | 300 |
ẏekā ghāntike ẏeteka śahasra bīra kalāka paẏāṇa | 301 |
yeuṁṇa nārāja yahiṁ paḍanti se tahiṁ heuchanti dhūḷi | 302 |

div.note: paẏāṇa–praẏāṇa, prasthāna |

lg.l: pabongtuṁ atuṭa aṭai ẏehāra ye kāẏe | 304 |
yeuṁṇa nārāje tretaẏā yuge indra nāśagalā | 305 |
se śara arjuna binddhalā ātreṣiṇa kari
agni bāhāra hoilā baḷībelāḷa hr̥de paḍikari | 306 |
se nārāja yahuṁ hr̥de paḍi hoilāka masiguṇḍā
keheneka kṣaṇe jātakalā tote keuṇa mahātmāṇī
ye tote bīryyadilā sādhu sehi prāṇī | 308 |
puṇi binddalā se ye pabongtā śahasrānta | 309 |
baḷībelāḷa upare paḍi sabonge hoileka cūri | 310 |
baḷibelāḷa boilā bindha tora yeteka śahasra achai | 311 |
puṇa puṇa pratagyāṁ karai dutī nārāẏaṇa
svarga mañcha pātāḷa ghoṭilā agnibāna teja
kebeheṁ nāśa nohilā tāhāra ye piṇḍa | 315 |
kāḷacatra chedilā arjuna abiśrāma catra gheni | 318 |
agna gadā gheniṇa baḷībelāḷa ye bhedi
dhātikāre dhāiṁ baḷībelāḷa dhailā arjunara bāḷa | 321 |
bāmakare kumara pāthara keśa acchi dhari
pātāḷa bāsinī boli debī acchi tahiṁ
sumara re mānabā tohora mātā pitā iṣṭa ye debatā | 327 |
lakṣaṇa guṇa dekhi bichārai nāgeṇīra tanaẏe
ẏe duheṁ diśuchanti ta bidyādhara prāẏe | 328 |
māribi ki na māribi bichāriṇa bhāḷi

div.note: agnibāṇa gheniṇa baḷībelāḷa ye bhedi |–na, ṇa, ca, ga, cha
katurī nārāja gheniṇa baḷībelāḷa ye bhedi |–ṭa, ṭha, ṅa, ja
arjuna boilā mohora pūrilāka kāḷa |–ta, ñja

lg.l: beni pururṣa dekhi se bichārai nāgabāḷī
kimpāiṁ nandana re kāhāra tule kaḷi | 333 |
raha raha bābu re kāhākaiṁ loḍu hāṇi | 335 |
ẏete boli bhīmasena caraṇe nāgeṇī pariṇāmi
muhiṁ tohora apāda ghenaiṁ kāhiṁ thila debasvāmī | 336 |
svāmīkaiṁ deu mora ẏeḍeka śiracchedana abastā | 337 |
mūrkhabuddhi kumara re kalu ye na jāṇi
debaṇa kāraṇe pāmara re pitāku loḍu hāṇi | 338 |
āre āre mūrkhanandana ye tu kuḷa nāśana
svāmīṁki nāśa karibāku muhiṁ kariacchi janama | 339 |
āre āre pāmara putra hātharu keśa chāḍa tuhi
pitāra caraṇe praṇāma kara tuhi yāi | 340 |
ẏe moḍhāmāne mātā go baḍāi chāṇḍāḷa | 341 |
belābāḷī boilā bābu re ẏe tohora nija pitā
pitāra caraṇe putra re hua praṇamitā | 342 |
śahasra bighāte moha ye hoithilā bhīma
bhrathā debara putra gheniṇa caḷai belābāḷī
svāmī agyāṇe putra mora kalāka bahuta doṣa
bāḷuta kumaraku mora na karibāka roṣa | 346 |
svāmī tohora tule ramaṇa kāḷa bīryye
tumbhe ye boila mote yibāra beḷeṇa
baḷībelāḷa nāmagoṭi dili tumbhara āgyāṁ pratipāḷi | 349 |
ẏe tohora nandana tu aṭu ẏehā pitā
bāḷuta nandanaku na dhara mane byathā | 350 |
mama doṣa aprādha kṣamā karibā debasvāmī | 351 |
muhiṁ ta cihni nuārili pitā mohora boli
bāḷuta buddhire muhiṁ aneka doṣa kali | 352 |
svāmī tu aṭu pitā mora na cihnilu mote

div.note: ātmaje–putra |
“mama doṣa aprādha kṣamā karibā debasvāmī”
mātātahuṁ putra nirādhāra bākya śuṇi
bhīmasena caraṇe paḍilā puṇa puṇi |
saceta hoiṇa pachārai bhīmasena
pāde praṇapatya huẏe ẏe kāhāra nandana |
nāgeṇī boilā tumbhe śuṇa prāṇapati
putra doṣa kale pitā sahibā yugati |

lg.l: na jāṇiṇa pitā kali kete doṣa muhiṁ
pitā se putrara doṣa kṣamā ye karai | 354 |
mukhe cumbhana deiṇa karai bhāba puṇi | 355 |
tu se mohora putra mote jiṇilu dulāḷa
ānara yuddhe āmbhe nohilu nā dūṣi
aneka yaśa āmbhe re arajilu śiṣi | 357 |
āmbhara putra hoi yebe āmbhanta jiṇi
pitā thāuṁ thāuṁ yebe putra hoẏe daccha
svāmī prathama yuddhe yehu mohora tule dvandi
sehu chārijaṇa ye tumbhara kisa hoi
bhīmasena kahai ye putrara mukha chāhiṁ | 362 |

div.note: haccha–dakṣa |
“bhīmasena kahai ye putrara mukha chāhiṁ”
puṇi yāra śire thilā anargha mukuṭa
sehu driyodhana jāṇa hastināra rāṭa |
tāra pache thilā yehu atyanta sundara
driyodhana mitra sehunāma karṇṇa bīra | (abaśiṣṭāṁ śaparapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: bābu āge yāhāṁku tu karithilu re bandhana
se āmbhara sodara re mānagobinda rājana | 363 |
tāhānta yehu pheḍilā se tumbhara kisa hoi | 364 |
ẏekā mātā garbhmaṁ jāta āmbhe aṭu ẏekātmaja | 365 |
bābu ẏe āmbhara kaniṣṭha ye aṭai arajuna
ẏehākaṁra bīryye tahuṁ nāgā arjuna upujilā
āmbhanta jiṇilu re dhanya tu suputra | 370 |

div.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
sabong paścātare bānddha rakhilu yāhāku
śakuni mantrī boliṇa bolanti tāhāku |
yāhā pucchā kalu tuhi śuṇa re kumara
semāne aṭanti sabu āmbhara sodara |

lg.l: ẏehāṭhāru kisa yaśa āu acchi bhalā | 374 |
āmbhaṁku melāṇi dia go bahana yibu caḷi | 376 |
belābāḷī boilā nātha muṁ nuārai ruhāi
bho svāmī sodoramāne tumbhara thibe bāṭa chāhiṁ | 377 |
bāḷuta kumara hoi ye patagyā mahāyodhī | 378 |
āmbhara ciraāṣya gheni bratasi re baḷā

div.note: “svāmīra mastake arghya bandaḥilā āṇi”
āṭhadina bhīmasena se stānare rahi
ananta nāgaku bidyā māgai ye yāiṁ |
bole āmbhe ẏe stānare nuāribā rahi
bhāi āmbhara āmbhaṁku thibe bāṭa chāhiṁ |
mañchapurakaiṁ yibu āgyāṁ debā go diẏāḷī

lg.l: tumbhara bacana pāḷi āmbhe galuṁ ye yuddheṇa | 383 |
ẏe chārinti bānddathilā nāga ye phāśeṇa | 386 |
dhāiṁ ailāka tahuṁ se siṁghamr̥tti hoi
muhiṁ ẏe chārinti yāi pheḍili bandhanara | 390 |

div.note: “bhīmasena ṭhākure samara kale tahiṁ”
śakuni dhuśāsana karṇṇa ye sahite
ẏe chāriṁki dhari neucchi urddhvagate |
ẏemanta samaẏare miḷilu āmbhe yāiṁ
bhīmasena ṭhākure samara kale tahiṁ |
ẏe chārinti bānddhathilā śāla ye br̥kṣara
tāhānta pheḍi dili muṁ se paḷāile dūra

lg.l: sahi nuāri arjuna śara ye sanddhalā
sabu śahasra yāka se saṁharaṇa kalā | 393 |
dhanya se bāḷuta jiṇite hoiba kāhiṁ | 394 |
svāmī bhīma arjuna duhinti se samare jiṇilā
antarīkṣe dharinelā deba jaḷaandhāra ye pathe | 396 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile hoẏe kebaṇa carita
rājāẏe kehi nohanti tāku sari madhyapura
ẏemantara samaẏe prabeśa hoile āsibhīma arajune | 400 |

div.note: dhanya se bāḷuta jiṇantā hoiba kāhiṁ |–ca, cha
ẏemantara samaẏe prabeśa hoile āsi bhīma arajune”
bikaḷe yujheṣṭhi ye bhāḷanti pañchu mane
bidhātā ki kaṣaṇa dilā āmbhanta āṇi bane |
parayoge dukhī mo sodara labhili
nāhiṁ karuthila muhiṁ rāṇa dei paṭhāili |
ẏehikathā mane smarante ghana ghana
dhātikāre prabeśa hele bhīma arajuna |
namaskāra kale yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi caraṇe
kalyāṇa karanti āpe dharma nirañjane |

lg.l: nadīkūḷe yujheṣṭhi ye se duhinti dekhi
dhātikāre ubhā hoile deba āsana upekṣi | 401 |
tumbhari apāda bābu ghenaiṁ re muhiṁ
dukhīra jībana mora aṭa beni bhāi | 403 |
kāhāra bābu se hoilā ẏeḍeka śakatā
baḷībelāḷa boli se bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁkara nāne | 405 |
svāmī bāḷuta putra hoi se mahābaḷabantā
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bhīma ẏe kebaṇa kathā
bhīmasena boile sahadeba jāṇaiṁ ẏethiba bāratā | 407 |
sahadeba boilā deba pachārile muṁ kahaiṁ
padile asāṣṭame dehe nāhiṁ ye cetana | 413 |
nāga tote khāu boli bhasāile jaḷe
guṇabanta puruṣa boli tāku na kale ye nāśa
mohe baśa hoilā ye belābaḷī sakaḷa upekhi | 419 |
se nāgeṇīra tule bhīmasenara baḍhilā pīrati
ẏehāṁkara bīryyuṁ jāta tā tahuṁ putreka utapatti | 421 |
belābaḷī nāme se ye nāgara duhitā | 422 |
svāmī mahādhārmika bibeka sehu aṭai nageṇī
teṇukari kumarara nāma baḷī ye belāḷa
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye hoile dharmara dulāḷa | 424 |
bhāriyā haraṇa doṣe rābaṇe kalu naṣṭa | 428 |
pāṣāṇa hoithilā taba pāda lāgi tari | 430 |
jaẏa tu śrīrāma datyabaḷa ye bināśi | 432 |
prāṇa apāna byāna udāna samāna pañcha ātmā

div.note: kāḷandīra ballabha nātha deba padmanābha
kāḷandī kamaḷabhañjā padmanābha nāma

lg.l: na jāṇai śāhasra na jaṇai dharmabāṭa
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śate sahasra daṇḍa praṇāma | 443 | | 4529 |

div.note: mohora karṇṇabākye bhajuṁ śrīrāma śrīrāma |–cha, ja, ṭa

div.head: gautamī tīrthare ahalyā draupadī kathopakathana o

lg.l: tu ye boilu biśvadebāẏe biśvāmitraṁkara śāpe
se biśvadebāẏe dropatīṁkara garbhe achantiṭiki rahi
nibhrānti karibā mote ẏethira carita kahi | 3 |
śuṇa ho manupuruṣa tu yāhā pachārilu matibhoḷā | 4 |
pāṇḍabe ye prabeśa hoile yāiṁ tīrtha gautamī
bhagati dekhiṇa debī tāṁku aneka bāñcchākari | 9 |
ahalyāẏe kahile māgo ẏe mohora dohita
anubrate bikr̥ta ẏe mote dharithāi citta | 12 |
saṁjāta dohitā hoi kimpā ẏeḍeka abhābi | 13 |
ahalyāẏe boile māgo muṁ kahai ādikathā
mohora rūpa dekhi sahi nuārile indra saryya debatā | 14 |
jībana kāḍhi gaṇṭha pāḍi neithānti gautama añchaḷe āpaṇe | 15 |
mr̥tu piṇḍagoṭi ruṣi añjanāre yāānti jagāi
indra āditya duheṁ āsanti kṣidra na pāi | 16 |
taitilya nāme karaṇa prīti nāme yoga
sedine gautame gale tīrtha ye praẏāga | 18 |
śūnya mandira dekhi aile indra ye āditye
indra prāṇa hoi paśile mama hr̥de | 19 |
ẏemanta carita se kale beni deba
puṇihiṁ indra āditya ye aile āradina
