kāmākṣī debīṁki se sebā karai niti |–ṅa, ka, da, ṭa

lg.l: nidrāre acebana se naẏana na toḷi | 40 |
sadhīra kari bibāne śuāilā haraṣa mane | 42 |
ẏekai nagra tāra kāḷañchi bhmabana bhitare
āpaṇā bhmabana palyaṁke nei śuāilā rāti | 45 |
aḷakā bhmabnaa tāku nuhai ye sari | 47 |
āho caitana ḍhaḷanti maṇi māṇikya luḷanti caukati

lg.note: kebaṇa sukrama dina āja ate mote |–ḍa, ḍha, gha, ja, ṅa
kebaṇa sukr̥ta hoilāka āja mote |–tha, ñja, ta, jha, ḍha
śarīra āśvāsanā karai pīrati |–ḍa, ḍha, ka, tha, cha
lg.l: bhāḷai bāsabi ẏeta svarga bhmabana prāẏe
muhiṁ ye banakaiṁ aili mr̥ga māri
kemante prabeśa āsi hoili ẏehu purī | 50 |
māgo tu kāhāra nandinī tu kāhāra yubatī
mukuiṁ hari tu kebaṇa bhmabanara debatī | 53 |
asambhaba pura ẏethuṁ yāite nāhiṁ bāṭa
tu ẏethaku mote go āṇilu kemante | 55 |
pheḍasi ẏe kabāṭa go bajrara kiḷiṇī
mohora bhmabanaku muṁ go yibi mahātmāṇī | 56 |
tote dekhi mohora mana hoilā haraṣa
tote dekhi muṁ ye madane acebana | 59 |
keuṁṇa deśuṁ āgata ke tohora pitāmātā
muhiṁ tohora rūpa dekhi hoili birahītā | 60 |
amara svarguṁ mote āṇilā nikumbha daita
kāḷañchi bhmabane mote se karicchi gupata | 61 |
muhiṁ sebā karigali kāmākṣī debīra tahiṁki
madane arata hoili muṁ tohora rūpa dekhi | 63 |
muhiṁ tote gheni aili bibāne basāi | 64 |
aneka binoẏī hoi muṁ khaṭai kāmākṣī
sehu debī mote bara dilāka manabāñcchi | 65 |
se prasanne sādhabī prabaśa kalā tote | 66 |
svāmī tohora mohora ye samayoga acchi
kara mote sudaẏā na bhāḷa nātha mane kicchi | 67 |
arjuna boilā tu śuṇa go sataśriẏā
mohore sundarī tu na baḷāa āśā
kemante śr̥ṅgāra tu māgilu ye muku | 71 |
kuḷamūḷa mora na jāṇu ta tuhi | 72 |
lg.note: se parama māheśvarī āṇi muku prahāna kalā tote |–kaḍa, ḍha, tha
rājāra ballabhī tu mahata janatriẏā |–ta, ña
lg.l: muhiṁ apābana go aṭai manda jāti
parastirī śr̥ṅgāre mora na baḷai mati | 73 |
ye tohora svamī se ye aṭai pr̥thibīre maharāẏe
moho chāraku kimpe icchā kalusi go māẏe | 74 |
ẏeḍe baḍa dharma muṁ laṁghibi kemante | 75 |
parastirī mora mātā parapuruṣa moa pitā
paradhanaku icchā muṁ na karai sarbathā | 76 |
parakāryye śatr̥ku muṁ na nāśai sabongkāḷe
parasīmā bhūmi muṁ ye na harai baḷe | 77 |
āho caitana dhātikāre sundarī dhailā ātreṣi
prema parihāsa lagāi arjuna koḷare basi | 80 |
bhmaje bhmaja bhiḍiṇa sundarī cumbana diai mukha
arjuna boilā tu bātuḷa hoilu ki
sabong sulakṣaṇī tu anamitte muhāṁsa lagai hou baḍa dukhī | 82 |
se br̥kṣaku koḷakale bidāri hoai aṅga | 84 |
lg.note: arjuna boile bāi hoilu kire sakhī
lg.l: bolai sundarī śārmaḷī br̥kṣa hoa mote
ẏe mohora śarīra bikoti tora laha dantaghāte | 85 |
arjuna boilā tu pāmerī manda aṭu
muhiṁ mahañchetrī tu mo manaku ghaṭu (khaṭu) | 86 |
dekhu dekhu tote ye hariāṇilā asura
tohora deha chuaṁnte apāra mote doṣa | 88 |
puruṣaṁka madhye tu aṭu manda jāti | 89 |
hīna jībana tora tu aṭu re nirlaja | 91 |
dhika dhika hou tora piara nija māta | 92 |
dhika dhika houkinā re tohora bidyāguru
dhika dhika houkinā ye tohore bhāba karu | 93 |
arjuna chāmure bāḷī puṇa puṇa karayoḍi
karapatra yoḍi se kahai manarahi āḷi | 95 |

lg.note: pāṣāṇa jaḍuacchi mohora rūpa dekhi |–ka, ta, ña, ḍha

lg.l: dekhiṇa nāgarī se arjunaku chāḍilā matibhaba | 97 |
arjuna boilā nātha tu nāśagalu praṇe
muhiṁ rāgakari ẏehikṣaṇi ucce debi bobi
bolibi adabhmate āsi puruṣe mote parābhabi | 99 |
antarīccha puruṁ āsi mote dharuacchi baḷe
yatane luchāibi na dekhuṁ datya ẏethi | 101 |
ẏeherṇṇeka bidyāẏe hāde achai mora tahiṁ
ullūka bidyā karibi tote na dekhibe kehi | 102 |
samara kari pārile tote debai aneka śasra
pīrati hoile kahibi aneka bhabiṣynta mantra | 103 |
mohona bidyāẏe ye bānddhaṇa tote acchi
mote chāḍiṇa tu na yibu mana mr̥cchi | 104 |
dekhu dekhu caṇḍāḷa re kehne ẏeḍuachu amr̥ta | 105 |
subhojana prāpata hoilu kehu yāẏe ruṣi

lg.note: pādeṇa nidhiki kimpe deuachu unmeṣi | (utkṣepa kari) |–ka
rāga śika kope nei pakailā kūpe |–ṅa, tha, ka, ja, da

lg.l: meḍhara dvāre yāi nr̥pati bije kari | 110 |
mantrī ḍāka diai kabāṭa pheḍa mudusuli
puṇa puṇa hāka se diai danuje
meḍhara kabāṭa phuṭu ṭhākura kale bije | 113 |
nikumbha ḍākadilā muṁ andhāri bije kali
hārābatīki dekhibu kabāṭa pheḍa re mudusuli | 115 |
mudusuli boilā muṁ kabāṭa pheḍai ẏetebeḷe
ṭhākurāṇī mote kopa karibe kabāṭa pheḍidile | 116 |
sehi dvāre pahuḍantu raẏaṇī prabhāta yāẏe | 117 |
niśāẏe kabāṭa pheḍibāku nāhiṁ mote āgyāṁ
ẏehehneka āgyāṁ mote kehne karibi abagyāṁ | 118 |
nikumbha boila yebe kabāṭa na pheḍiba

lg.note: ṭhākurāṇī mote kopa karibe raẏāṇī pāile |–ḍa, ḍha, ka

lg.l: bolai nikumbha kabāṭa kiṁpe na pheḍila
svāmī rātrakāḷe muda na bhāṅgiba boli āpaṇe āgyāṁ deithila | 122 |
dekhilā mātrake se rakhantā nā dhuruti | 123 |
ālo muda bhāñji kadāṭa yebe pheḍanta rātrakāḷe
bahuta beśa beśana tahiṁ aneka sambhabong | 128 |
aneka mate bhāba ye baḍai pīrati
aneka ratna basra aḷaṁkāra tāku rāẏe dilā
bāhuḍiṇa mahārājā nagaraku bije kari galā | 130 |
thokāẏe dura hārābatī āsai tāra pāśa
sakhīre tohora deha gandhāita manuṣyara bāsa | 131 |
lg.note: dekhibā mātrake se hoiba nā atriputi |–tha, ka
dekhibā mātrake se huai abirati |–ta, ñja

lg.l: kebaṇa kati manuṣya ẏethi āsiacchi abā | 132 |
hāthare dīpābaḷī ẏeka gheni loḍai nirantare | 133 |
samasta leuṭāi rāẏe na pāilā loḍi | 134 |
hārābatī boilā tora yebe ẏeḍeka aprate
muhiṁ tohora bhakṣa nuhai ki āhāra kara mote | 135 |
bāhāra hoilā rāẏe bhāñjilā tāra dambha | 136 |
aneka beśa beśana ye hoiṇa sundarī
hārābatī boilā mahātamā tu paḍilu jīrṇṇakūpe
ẏeḍe baḍa kṣatrīpaṇa buḍāilu stirīmātra darpe | 140 |
ẏebe mote śr̥ṅgāra dia āsi svāmī
tu yebe boilu muṁ śaraṇa rakhantā
anugraha nātha mote ẏethu gheni paḷā | 143 |
lg.note: cchidrakari na chāḍai kapaḍā peḍā ādikari |–tha, ka
muhiṁ tohora bhakṣa nohai ki bhakṣapāna kara mote |–ka

lg.l: tu na puṇa upekṣā kariyāu muku | 144 |
ānaku prāpata hoibu ki thāa ẏethe paḍi | 147 |
nityakarma sāri galā kāmākṣī debī tahiṁ | 148 |
mote ye ākāśuṁ asura ailāka gheni | 149 |

lg.note: arjuna boilā ẏethuṁ bāhāra kara āī
ẏene bāhāra karibi debu ki mote rati |
ẏethu pache bāhāra tu na kara yubatī

lg.l: pāi na pāili mote nohilā prāpata
māgo prasanna hoi yebe dilu svāmīdāna
se mote prāpata nohile debi stirīhatyā doṣaṭi | 155 |
santoṣe sudaẏā tu kara debī mahāmāẏe | 156 |
asura śr̥ṅgāre mora na baḷāa mati
bhojana śaẏana bāḷī na karai kicchi
prāpata yebe nohilā mote kiṁpe dilu kāmākṣī | 159 |
āho caitana mr̥gaẏā binode gale chāribhāi
bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba prabeśa hoile yāi | 160 |
dropatī bikaḷa ye arjune na dekhi
yujheṣṭhi boile sahadeba re arjuna kimpāiṁ nailā | 165 |
hāthaku chāhiṁ bolai ye mantrī sahadeba | 166 |
śuṇa ho deba svāmī ẏesaneka rīti
arjuna ṭhākure gale deba pacchima pradeśe
svāmī se bane arjuna susvādu phaḷa khāi
maḷaẏa pabana lāgi āḷase nidrā ye ghārai | 173 |
sustha pāi śoile pātha debīṁka āgara | 174 |
svāmī nikumbha daita svarguṁ hari āṇilā hārābatī
kāmākṣī debīṁki se pūjai ye niti | 175 |
tāhāre icchā se nakale bāsabara santati | 178 |
mohe paḍigale debī dr̥pada rājāra dulaṇī
hā hā nātha boliṇa kāndai jighnasenī | 181 |
bhīmasena bole deba bahana chāla yibā
ẏekāaśi tāḷa gabhīra jīrṇṇakūpe paḍiacchi bīra pātha | 183 |
arjuna samare se asura hoibaṭi badha | 184 |
bijaẏe kale keśaba ye bainetra bāhane
pabongta upare ye bijaẏe deba dharme
bainetr̥ utta rile deba puruṣa uttame | 190 |
aneka binoẏī ye deba jagatabhūta svāmī
yujheṣṭhi āgyāṁ dile yāa he nakuḷa
koḷāgrata kari bege se hariṁku taḷuṁ toḷa | 192 |
prāṇara sakhā mohora nāhiṁ ta bibaccha | 195 |
gaṇḍā māriṇa ye galā bīrabara pātha | 196 |
se hārābatī arjunaku baḷe nelā hari
na pāilā śr̥ṅgāra se kāma paritāpe
teṇukari cintā tote kalu he śrībatsi | 200 |
to tahuṁ āmbhanta kehi nāhiṁ sāhā
pañchu pāṇḍaba ye tohora sinā pañchu bāhā | 202 |
bhīmara bacana śuṇi ye nārāẏaṇa śānti
bainetra bāhāne ye bijaẏe kari yāānti | 203 |
śaṅkha catra gadā padma khaḍaga āẏudha

lg.note: bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba achanti nāhānti bibatsa | gha, jha, ḍa, ḍha, tha, ja, da

lg.l: dineka prabeśa hele se rākṣasa bhmabane | 207 |
pachāranti asure adabhmate kehu pure paśi | 209 |
garuḍara radi boli na jāṇanti kehi
gobinde boile ẏebe kebaṇa buddhi karibā
paśiṇa nidrāgha baḷa muhiṁ pakāibi māri | 213 |
ẏehi se bichāra yogāi mohora manaku | 214 |
tu dekhiṇa paśa yāi rājyara bhitara | 215 |
muhiṁ āge deba karai kinā gamana | 216 |
śuṇiṇa āgyāṁ tāṁku dile deba catrapāṇi
dekhiṇa rajye yāi tu kara yā bhramaṇi | 217 |
binatā nandana paśilā yāi kāḷañchi nāma deśe
apāra dānaba baḷa achanti baḍāi sambhabonge | 219 |
bārasvatī bhmabana prāẏeka diśai tāra rājya
banasta bhitare diśai tāra samasta sampada aiśurya | 220 |
yamadaṇḍa na paśai ye dānaba rājyaku | 221 |
kaḍhā ghumurā marddaḷa ye bīratūra dāuṇḍi
mattāra rase dānabe kṣemaṭā nāṭa khaṇḍi | 222 |
nikumbha daitara rājya bhāṁji hoilā bhaganasta | 226 |
meḍha maṇḍopa aṭāḷī jagatīmāna bhāñjiṇa sabong cūri | 227 |
asura baḷa dropiṣṭhamāne sabong uḍile gagane
śate yojane kehu sahasra yojane kehu yāi paḍi
asura nagara ye daśa yojana pariyante
bāsa khaṇḍaẏe na rahilā ye bhāñjile samaste | 231 |
pacchima bhāge yāiṁ paḍilā dvādaśa yojana | 232 |
kiẏe keṇe paḍile yāi hoiṇa aniryāpa
janajantu kehi na rahile kāḷañchi nagrapure
barṇṇa cihna ghara grāma na rahilā asura rājyare | 234 |
garuḍa boilā deba rājyaku chāla yibā
chāriheṁ paśile yāi asura rājya ṭhāba | 237 |
dekhile dhana bhaṇḍāra paḍi achai samasta
beni aṁkuśa sanya paḍile ke keṇe apramita | 238 |
gobinde boile āī tu go jagata mohinī
keuṇa bhmabanuṁ dānaba ailā tote gheni | 243 |
muhiṁ se amarābatī bhmabane aṭai sambhana | 244 |

lg.note: muhiṁ se amarābatī bhmabanara ẏeba |–ta, ña, ḍha
lg.l: ẏe nikumbha daita amaraku dilāka dhāḍi
muhiṁ se hārābatī ye rambhāra dulaṇī
sahadeba boilā āī tu jagata mohinī
muhiṁ se kāmākṣī debī karai nitya sebā | 251 |
tāhākaiṁ gheni muṁ ye ailaiṁ mora pure
se mote nirāśa kalāka deba yahuṁ
yahiṁ se achai deba dekhāibi bega hoi āsa | 257 |
lg.note: mote nikumbha daita yatane hariāṇi |–ta, ña, ka
āmbhanta rakṣā kari pāribu ki mānanī |–ṭa, gha
yahiṁ achai se puruṣa dekhāibi āsa |–jha, ka, ḍa, ḍha, ja, da, ta, ñja

lg.l: kebaṇa bāge mahātmāṇī āṇibu puṇa ẏethi | 260 |
ẏehikṣaṇi bāhāra hoiba mohora ḍāka dile | 261 |
jagannāthe boile āmbhe satyakalu debu se puruṣaku
tu ẏebe bāhāra go karasi tāhāṁku | 262 |
pādaka mantra paḍhi ḍākibi kūpe chāhiṁ
kisa nāma tāhāra mote kahibā gosāiṁ | 264 |
ẏekāaśi tāḷa gabhīru bāhāra hoilā sabongsācī | 266 |
bhīmasena boilā svāmī an kara abhimāna
peśilā bāsebi ye nārāja lakṣa tini | 274 |
arjuna nārāja ghāte paḍile ṭhābe ṭhābe | 275 |
āhāra kṣīna hoi hāthe śasra nāhiṁ | 276 |
arjuna nārāja ghāẏe paḍanti loṭi bhūmi | 277 |
nācanti kobandhe ye paḍanti śira cchiḍi

lg.note: śarmeṇa āsi paśuchanti asuramāne |–jha, ṭa, ḍa, ḍha
śrameṇa āsanti dāneba baḷamāne |–ka, da, ja, cha
lg.l: dusaha pratagyāṁ se ye karai pābeni
upabāse dānabe ye nuāranti śasra gheni | 286 |
ye abā āsuchanti se paḍanti bāṭe ghāṭe
ke kāhiṁ paḍile kehi na jāṇanti se drapiṣṭhe | 287 |
āho caitana abikṣaṇe saini paḍile bhumimāḍi
yete āsuchanti ke na yānti bāhuḍi
chāridvāre tini tini yojana paḍile dānabe
bhagnabaḷa sanya tule chanti sahasra daśa | 293 |
ratha gaja bājī bāhāna nāhiṁ tāra tule
dhanu troṇa gadā phaḷāmāna nāhiṁ tāra bhale | 294 |
baḷabīryya darpa tuṭai ye ghoṭai āpada | 301 |
yāhāra bhaẏe amara tejyākalā indra debata | 302 |
rahile dānabe ye na paśile bhitaraku
kare gheniacchi upāḍilā beni śāḷadr̥kṣa daita rāẏe
diśai dāneba ye rāhura teja prāẏe | 305 |
śire paḍi benibr̥kṣa hoilā śate cūra | 307 |
cūra hoigalā gadā nikumbha śire paḍi | 309 |
dhāiṁlā nikumbha daita bipuḷa śiḷa kare gheni
beni mutha uñchāiṇa bhīmasenakaiṁ kalā se ātroṣa | 312 |
bhmajeṇa bhmaja bhiḍi pādeṇa pāda chandi
bhīṣmarūpe māḍi basilā se hoiṇa mahādambha | 318 |
mukheṇa mutha mārai se dāneba mahābaḷī | 320 |
puṇa puṇa nārāja pātha karai prahāra | 323 |
dānaba dehe paḍi bhagagalā nārāja lakṣa tini | 324 |
tāhā ṭāṇi binddhalā se pāṇḍeba pañchāṇa | 327 |
puṇa puṇa śahasra ye bindhai dhanurjaẏe
ẏemanta samaẏare nāraẏaṇe āsi kaleka bijaẏe | 330 |
taḷe paḍi bhīmasena pañchujanya śaṅkhaśada(?) śuṇi | 334 |
āho caitana śuṇiṇa śateśiṁga pabongtaku bhīma sumaraṇā kalā
tadyāpi se caḷi nuārilā ye māruti
ẏesana samaẏe sannidhye keśaba bijekale dhāti | 336 |
meru cūrṇṇa hoiyāẏe yeuṁṇa gadā paḍi
gadā gheni puṇa hari kaleka prahāra
koṭiẏe sūryya prāẏe tāra teja birājuci | 344 |
birañchira bare ye bajra tāra kāẏe
samare śrama bahuta pāileni deba banamāḷī | 350 |
sūryyābrateka catra nei arjuna hāthe dile | 351 |
catra dhariacchi daita chaḍāi nuārile hari | 352 |
nikumbha pachakati nei prahāra kalāka bahana | 353 |
catra bighāte rākṣasara kāẏe galā jaḷi | 354 |
āho caitana nikumbha daita badha hoilā yetebeḷe
ākāśe thāi aneka ānanda hoile digapāḷe | 355 |
sehi kāḷañchi nagre rahile paṇḍura nandana | 357 |
yujheṣṭhi ṭhākuraṁku tumbhe āṇa yā hakāri | 358 |
lg.note: birañchira bare ye bajra tāra kāẏe

lg.l: śuṇiṇa aneka haraṣa hoile aṭhāśi sahasra maharuṣa
tāhāra bhaẏe āmbhe tape nuāri bane paśi | 360 |
se kāḷañchi nagre rahile paṇḍura nandana | 361 |
boilā bhalahelā malā se nikumbha rākṣasa
sādha sādhu arajuna boli praśaṁsanti svarge debarājā | 365 |
babu tohore se bhārābhara hoilā niśodhana
asura yoge aneka tīrtha nāśa yāithilā | 367 |
sukheṇa tapa karibu bābu ẏebe tohora parasane | 368 |
āho kāḷebara bolikari ẏekai kirāta rāẏe
kaḷañchi nagre tāhākaiṁ rakṣā pāḷaka ẏe | 369 |
se kaḷañchi nagre tāku kale ẏekāṅga catrabratī | 370 |

lg.note: tuhi se rakṣākalu ẏe tini bhmabana |–ka, ḍha

lg.l: arjunaku kāḷañchi nagr̥ āṇa ho bege yāi | 372 |
puṣyeka ratha gheni se galāka tatakṣaṇānti | 373 |
māteḷiki dekhiṇa bahuta binaẏa ye bhāba | 376 |
ki kāryye āgata hela kahasi māteḷi
keuṁṇa kāryye ailu kaha mane bhāḷi | 378 |
moe pāśe rāi āgyāṁ dile śacīnātha | 379 |
gobinde boile svagī śuṇimā yujheṣṭhi rājana | 382 |
yujheṣṭhi śrīhari boile pātha yāa svargabhmabanaku | 383 |
bābu hārābatī pāiṁ upujilā bahuta ye dvandamāna
hua tu bibhā kicchi na kara sandehe | 386 |
arjuna boilā ye yoḍiṇa kara beni | 388 |
svāmī bāseba debatāra ye rambhā manohārī
se rambhāra tahuṁ ẏe ye utapatti kumārī | 389 |
bhāi bhagnī madhye kāhiṁ achai pīrati
ẏesaneka āgyāṁ mote na dia deba śirīpati | 391 |
yānu yāṇu kesaneke hoibi muṁ bibhā
ẏehi āgyāṁ na debāṭi mote jagaddebā | 392 |
ẏehi kanyā neiṇa samarpibi bāseba debatāṁku | 393 |
arjuna śutilā śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba lāi | 395 |
dhanya sādhu arajuna dhanya mohora tu putra | 396 |
tohora lāgi svarga mohora hoilā sukhārtha | 397 |
ẏebe nikumbha daita amarakaiṁ dilā dhāḍi
hārābatī kanyāku ākāśuṁ baḷe nelā hari| 399 |
bābu nikumbha ẏehāku svarguṁ nelā dhari
indra boile sundarī tu go dharmeṇa holu pāra
tu se arjunaku nei marāilu nikumbha asura | 404 |
tu yebe arjunaku na niantu banuṁ hari
hārābatīkaiṁ aneka ratna basra deiṇa sunāsīra
triputi hoili sundarī tu māgi gheni bara | 407 |
lāja bhaẏe upekṣā kariṇa kahai hārābatī

lg.note: ẏehāku paṭāntara rūpeṇa nohanti pābongti |–ka, ḍha
bābu nikumbha dānaba ẏehāku nelā amara pura tyāgi
tote yebe asura na niantā hari
svāmī arajune mohora baḷilāka mati |–ka, ḍa, ḍha
lg.l: debarājā chāmure ki muṁ kahibaiṁ mithyā
bhāriyā rūpe muhiṁ arjunaku khaṭibi manaicchā | 409 |
bibasanaśāhī hoi muṁ basili ẏehāra koḷe
tebeheṁ svāmī ẏehāra mana na ṭaḷilā
tu yebe baradebu prārthanā kaḷi deba
hārābatīki pradāna hua se apāra tote icchi | 413 |
āho caitana kumbhamāsa śukḷapakṣa saptamī gurubāra
rohiṇī nakṣatra bhoga aṭai se dinara | 417 |
śubha anakūḷa aṭe dhanu lagna beḷā
pāpagraha nāhiṁ ye māhendra ana kūḷā | 419 |

lg.note: tu yebe bara mote debuṭi hoi deba

lg.l: purohite boile bākya nāhiṁ ye tāhāra mana icchā
āho caitana barilā icchāẏe se rambhāra dulāḷī
āho caitana yujheṣṭhi debe rahile manohara bane
sehi nagre hārābatīki gheni tinimāsa rahile phālagunye | 426 |
lg.note: deśa kāḷa bākye uccāraṇa kale gotre
arjune hārābatīki pradāna karāile dhaumya purohite |
indra boile ākāśa nirbhaẏe hoilāka ẏebe |
homakarma sāri kale ghr̥ta ye pāraṇa
amr̥ta bhojane bara kanyāẏe ẏekai āsana |
aneka pīrati se duheṁ kaleka toṣa citte |

lg.l: babr̥bāhana boli tāra tahuṁ putreka utapatti | 428 |

lg.note: ehi pāṭha anya kauṇasi pothire na thileheñ nikumbha
“ākaśare ucchaba ṭiki kale maghabāna” pādānta pare ca, cha, ṇa pothire pāṭhāntara

lg.l: arjuna boile hārābatīki prasanna hoigale sureśvara
boile nikumbha nāśakalā to yoguṁ māgasi tu mote bara | 432 |
kāḷe māgilā debuṁ ẏe tohora putra arajuna
debarājā pitāra bacana muṁ bhāñjibi kemante | 434 |
tāhāra biḷāse nātha rahili māsa chāri | 435 |
sahadeba boilā tahuṁ putreka hoiba utapanna
se putrara nāma hoiba babhr̥ ye bāhana | 437 |
svamī dvārikā chāḍi muṁ ẏethaku aili pañchamāse | 439 |
lg.note: ‘svāmī dvārikā chāḍi muṁ ẏethaku aili pañchamāse’
yete kukha pāiacha na dhariba mana (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: āgyāṁ debā mote yibi muṁ dvārikā bhmabane
naba baraṣa hoilāni tumbhe bihaḍila bane | 440 |
svāmī tu ye dhārmika bibeka puṇyaśīḷa
nikumbha niśodhane ẏebe sakaḷa kāryya sidhi | 444 |
svāmī pitr̥kāryya kala dekhila samasta tīrthamāna
aṭhāaśi sahasra ruṣiṁki nityāpati deu ye bhojana | 446 |
lg.note: bahu dukha dile mote dekhucha kaurobe
ẏethaku sakhā hari to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ
āu kicchidina deba thiba dukha sahi
bipatti khaṇḍana heba pāiba nija mahī |
kahanti agasti muni śuṇa ho manu rājane |

lg.l: dvārikā purīku yibāku hoile prabhma saje | 447 |
punabongsu nakṣatra bhogya aṭai se dinara | 448 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoga
bāhmaṇeka hoi dharmadebatā aile yujheṣṭhiṁki kaṣaṇa karibāku | 450 |
apūbong yati dekhi pāde kale bahuta pūjā | 453 |
byāse se bipraṁku pucchākale samasta kuśaḷabāṇī | 456 |
tāhākaiṁ kicchi samasyā na diai brāhmaṇa

lg.note: siṁghamāsa śukḷapakṣa dvādaśī arkabāra |–ḍa, ḍha, da, ja
lg.l: sahadeba boile ẏe aṭanti deba dharme
jāta anta nāhiṁ deba akūḷa amūḷa | 462 |
na dekhi na śuṇi anamite kehu kahi | 464 |
svāmī śarada śiśira hema grīṣma basanta baraṣā
gotra sohodra mitra pātra yāhāra hāde nāhiṁ
baikuḷa ādi madhya batsaḷa kandaḷa yāhāra nāhiṁ | 467 |
kāmanā bhābanā kāmanā yācanā tuhi se aṁsagatā | 469 |
aharniśi hr̥de bhābai dharma ye debatā
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa dharmadebatāra caraṇe śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷambitā | 472 | | 6094 |
lg.head: satyaāmbara bibaraṇa

lg.l: āho pāṇḍabe āmbha tule se kheḷile paśākheḷa
ẏebe ta tāhāṁkara nāma bikhyāta nāhiṁ bhūmi | 6 |
ki abā male se annaśāsti pāi
ẏebe keṇe gale kibā male kicchi tathya na pāilu | 9 |
rājāra mukha chāhiṁṇa rādheba suta kahi
karṇṇara bacana śuṇi se rājā driyodhana
pāṇḍabaṁka cihnabarṇṇa ke khojiba bane paśi
ẏesaneka kari āmbhe kalu saṁkalpa bidhāna | 24 |
puṇa dvadaśa baraṣa yiba banabāsa rājya parityāji | 25 |
ẏehenneka parijā kalu hārile paṇḍu suta
dvādaśa baraṣa gale bane hoile gupata | 26 |
ẏebe sātabarasa hoilāni na pāuṁ bāratā | 27 |
yāa ho gauramukha khoji bege āsa | 28 |
purañjana brāhmaṇara nandana bacana boilā prakāśi
muhiṁ na cihnai pāṇḍabanta śuṇa ho kuruśiṣi | 29 |
sehi na cihnile bhala hoiba āmbhaṁku | 30 |
āśvina māsare tu māgibu pakvacūta phaḷa | 32 |
khojiṇa se bane yadi āmba na pāibe
āho kāhīṁ rahanti pāṇḍabe kāhiṁ karanti basā

lg.note: ẏetekaiṁ na jāṇi tahiṁ cihna ye sarūpa |
satyaāmba hoibaṭi tāhāṁkara kale |–ḍa, ḍha, da

lg.l: adine tumbhanta yebe debeṭi se āmba
āmbha tahiṁ tāhā tumbhe gheniṇa āsiba | 38 |
yebe se tumbhaṁku na debe cūtaphaḷa
cchidreka na chāḍanti se khojanti sakaḷa stāne | 42 |
gauramukha boli se purañjana paṇḍāra baḷā
mukata gaṅgā bahai ye uttara bāhāne | 44 |
gopyāna rūpa hoiṇa se gauramukha dvija

lg.note: pañchāṇoi dine se pāṇḍabanta bheṭilā |–ka, tha
gupata gaṅgā bahai uttara udyāne (udayāne) |–ka, ḍa, ḍha
tapodhana rūpa hoi paśai se gauramukha dvija

lg.l: hr̥deṇa baiṣṇaba māḷa kaṇaẏa padma khañji | 49 |
ẏehenneke prapañcha rūpa se chadrama brāhmaṇa | 51 |
mauna brateṇa tapodhana yāiṁ basile ārambhe | 52 |
śarīra diśai tāra nirdhuma agni jāṇi
tambāra tatra prāẏe benilocana sūryya jiṇi | 54 |
bho mahātamā tumbhe aṭa keuṁṇa deśī
ādhāra anna kisa kara he biprabhogī
binā ādhāre tumbhe brata he keuṁṇa mata | 58 |
dhīrakari tapodhana boilā tumbhe sāra ya āhānnika
yujheṣṭhi boile tapī śuṇa mo bacana

lg.note: tambāra catra prāẏe beni locana bhramaṇi |–ḍa, ḍha

lg.l: atithi basai āge bhojana ye kale
deba pitr̥loke pāṇi na pābanti bhale | 62 |
śate yojana pariyante ẏethe nāhiṁ ghara grāma
pūbonge tetraẏā yuge ẏethe biśrāma kaleka śrīrāma | 64 |
nānā jībajantumāna yahuṁ na pāile ẏetheṁ loḍi
kopeṇa śrīrāma boile ẏe abā rābaṇara bana
āmbhanta dekhi abā ẏe hoile gopyāna | 66 |
āre sabongbr̥kṣe aphaḷa hoa boli boile mahākopa | 67 |
banajība hoi ẏetheṁ goṭiẏe na thāa
śuṇa ho bhagabanta śrīrāmaṁkara ẏesaneka śāpye
br̥kṣe aphaḷanti banajībe barṇṇacihna nāhiṁ paratakṣe | 69 |
tapodhana boilā muṁ na bhmañjai anna
jībaghāta doṣe māẏeṁsa nāhiṁ mo bhojana | 70 |
aparace phaḷa na karai muhiṁ bhojī
tāhā pāile bhojana kare deba dharmarāẏe | 72 |
yujheṣṭhi debe āśrija hoile tāhā śuṇi
durlabha kathā ẏe mahātmā bañchāilu āṇi | 73 |
lg.note: pakvaphaḷa na pāi āhānnika na kari |–ja
lg.l: śrīrāma abhiśāpe ẏethe na phaḷanti br̥kṣe
beniśata yojana se na pāile loḍi
tahuṁ chāri pāṇḍabe ye aile bāhuḍi | 79 |
kemante pāra hoibi kaha he gobinda | 80 |
gobinda boile svāmī biṣāda kisa arthe
svāmī yadyapi aṭai ẏehu hiḍimbeka bana
ẏekādaśa māse pāi bhādrabe na pāi āmbacihna | 82 |
na thilā drabyaku deba ratna nohai sari
svāmī mahata lokaṁku dharma kaṣaṇa jāṇa ẏehi
ẏethuṁ uburi pārile dhārmika mahatva jana sehi | 84 |
svāmī utapatti paṁku phaḷa nāhiṁnā banaste
satyaāmba phaḷāi pāriba ki pañchu bhrāthe | 85 |
lg.note: anna bhojana ye mora nāhiṁ sabongkāḷa |–pāṭhāntara

lg.l: gobinde boile āmbeka phaḷiba deba satya bacana kahile | 86 |
nirutānta satya kahiba chāḍiba ye mithyā prakr̥ti | 87 |
śrīhari boile kiñchita mithyā kahile nuhai cūtapaṁku
yujheṣṭhi debe boile mama pañchabhūta prakr̥ti
mithyābākya kahi nuārai mohora ye gyāne | 93 |
yisa abā sandeśa paḍai āpaṇāra baśe
rāga moha hiṁsā lobha nāhiṁ kaṣṭhora aneke | 95 |
pureṇa mithyā nāhiṁ jībare na karai ahantā
anubrate hr̥dagate dharmahiṁ se mohora cintā | 96 |
yebaṇa prāṇīmāne āne dukheṇa hoanti yati
tāhānta dekhile mohora hr̥daẏa ākuḷa pañchu mati | 97 |
lg.note: rāga moha hiṁsā lobha nāhiṁ mora mukhe |–kha, na, tha
lg.l: aneka gabhīra kathā dharme kahile dibyabāṇī
ẏekalaẏa kari tapodhana śuṇai hr̥de guṇi | 98 |
puṇa yujheṣṭhi deba boile mātā kontī pitā mora dharma ye debatā
ẏehāuṁ hr̥dagate mama nahiṁ āna cintā | 99 |
nija rājya nimante hoibi abaśya dvandī
hou satyaāmba satya satya ẏe yugate | 101 |
āho yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara bākye sarūpa satyapaṇe
mandāra puṣya prāẏeka pratakṣe patra ye bighaṁsi

lg.l: aḷapa kiñchita māẏā prapañcha tora thile
br̥kṣa bhasma hoibaṭi micha ye kahile | 105 |
bhīmasena boilā deba muṁ kahuacchi satyi
bhojane śaẏane śr̥ṅgāre sāṁgrame muhiṁ atriputi | 106 |
abhāi kathā kahile muṁ abaśya aprīti | 107 |
svāmī gāndhārī nandana ye dhr̥tarāṣṭaṁkara śateputra
ẏekāẏe ẏehānta māribi ẏe mohora satya satya | 108 |
svāmī yujheṣṭhi abhimāna ẏe brikodara nāmaku
ye abā dūṣaṇa karai mora bāuna bhara gadāku | 109 |
abaśya samare muṁ śira tāhāra pakāibi chedi | 110 |
ẏe mohora satya bacana kahili debarāẏe | 111 |
bistāra hoilā cūtabr̥kṣa pallabilā ḍāḷa chāri | 112 |
dekhiṇa parama sānanda ye hoile śirībatsa
sānande keśaba ye tahuṁ bacana parakāśi
tu ho dhanurjaẏa mote sarūpa kahasi | 114 |
suraloka nāgaloka naraloka asuraloka muṁ samasta pārai jiṇi | 115 |
sabongdā bhagati mora śrī jagannāthaṁka pādagate
keśabara nindā muṁ na sahai kadāścite | 116 |
gāṇḍiba dhanu mohora kare thai yetebeḷe
ẏekādaśa rudra jiṇi pārai muhiṁ abaheḷe | 117 |
lg.note: kāhā nei śaṁkā mora nāhiṁ raṇasthaḷe |–kha, na, ca
lg.l: keśabara nāmaku gāṇḍima dhanuku akṣaẏa ye troṇaku bho deba pāśuoata śaraku
yehu nindā karai abaśya muhiṁ nāśa karai ẏehāṁku | 118 |
parastirī mātā mohora ṁuṁ na harai kadācite
paradrabyaku āśā nāhiṁ mohora pañchu bhūte | 119 |
parabhūmi na harai parakāryye śatr̥ ku na nāśai
sāṁgrāme śatr̥ piṭhi dile śahasra na mārai | 120 |
ẏe mohora satya satya aṭai keśaba hāde | 121 |
arjunara satya satya ẏesaneka yahuṁ bāṇī
br̥kṣa pallabita hoilā phaḷa puṣpa jāṇi | 122 |
tuho satya satya kaha ye cūtaphaḷa ẏebe byāpu | 123 |
svāmī yetebeḷa pariyante kunta thāi mora hātha
pr̥thibīra madhye deba muhiṁ ye ẏekachatra | 125 |
anubrate lepana heuthibi icchā ye mohori | 126 |
ādhāra maithuna nidrā nāhiṁ mora icchā
sukhabhoga paṇahuṁ mora āne nāhiṁ bāñcchā | 127 |
tāhāra chaḷe bhāiki uprodha nāhiṁ mohori | 128 |
pr̥thibī āpa teja ye bāẏabya ākāśa

lg.note: para cintāre na thai aharniśi na ghenai paradoṣai |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: ẏe mohora dr̥ḍhabākya kahili deba sādhyeṁ | 130 |
tohora agrate mithyā kahite ki pāri | 131 |
tuhi satya kahi satyaāmba ẏebe pachā | 133 |
bhūta bhabiṣya barttamāna jāṇaiṁ muhiṁ sabong | 134 |
dakṣiṇa karasthaḷe achai mohora sabongguṇa nidhi
tāhāku chāhānteṇa mohora sakaḷa hoẏe siddhi | 135 |
jāta anta kahibāku kāḷa ye mohori | 136 |
jāṇikari na kahai muhiṁ mahamantra prāẏe
mote pachārile prāṇīṁki na paḍe apacaẏe | 137 |
svāmī yebaṇa mantre yebaṇa kathā hoai parāpata
na paḍhi paṇḍita muhiṁ na sādhi bhigyaṁbante | 139 |
mantrī sahadebara bākya sampāde satya bacane
kahu kahu baḍa cañchu mañji ye hoilā bidyamāne | 140 |
gobinde boile tumbhe śuṇa go pāñchāḷī

lg.note: tāhā chāhānte mohora prasarai buddhi |–ca, cha, kha, na, ṭha
lg.l: tuhi debī satya kaha yebaṇa tohora kathā
stirīṁkara carita ye samasta aṭai mithyā | 143 |
svamī chāḷiśa baraṣa pariyante stirīṁkara kisa dharma | 144 |
gobinde boile ẏe yugate aṭai bichāra
yati satīna thile ki go bratai saṁsāra | 145 |
tu parama māheśvarī go anādi aparṇṇā
ayoni sambhutā tu bhārābhara nibāriṇī sinā | 146 |
śūrabanta sundara puruṣa dekhile se abaśya baḷābanti mati | 147 |
yadyapi abā bhrātha putrahiṁ yebe heu
mote ye kaurobe sabhātaḷe kale apamāna
āṇante caraṇa mora na paḍai taḷa
ātreṣi jhiṁkante se phiṭilāka mohora bāḷa | 151 |
sehidinu keśa mohora na kali bandhana
tebe se keśa hari mohora bandhana karibi | 153 |

ẏemāne thānte mohora karṇṇe baḷe mati | ṭha, na, ca, cha

lg.l: tebe se pāṇḍabe bhrathā mora kahili satya satya | 154 |
satya satya kahili muṁ mithyā nuhai deba | 155 |
śuṇa ho caitana ẏesaneka satya yahuṁ kahile pāñchāḷī
duja āmbagoṭiku bāsebi kara ye prasāri | 159 |

lg.note: bhojane na chāhiṁbi muhiṁ kāhāri badana |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhiṁki praśaṁsanti jībana tora dhani dhani | 161 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bipra ye tumbha icchā
ẏe triputi hoile mohora pūrṇṇa hoai manabāñcchā | 166 |
neiṇa chāmure debi dekhu kinā dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 168 |
kapaṭa boli jāṇile na puṇa pāṇḍabe karanti rāge | 169 |
āho se tapodhana saḷakhe āmba gheni yāuacchi | 170 |
kebaṇa se dvija aṭe tāku cihnilu ki tuhi
sahadeba boilā se ye purañjana brāhmaṇa
jau sajaḷasa ghara ye kapaṭe kalā niribāṇa | 172 |
jaura ghare kapaṭe āmbhanta kalāka dahana
āmba na pāile śāpa deiyāntā āmbhaṁkuiṁ ẏethe | 175 |
ẏebe satyaāmba driyodhana chāmure neiṇa deba
ẏesaneka māẏāre deba ye āsithile sehi
mote na pachārila bheda na jāṇila kehi | 177 |
bhīmakaiṁ paṭhiāibā ki satyaāmba pārai uchuḍi āṇi | 178 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile hari muṁ satyeṇa dili yāhā
yujheṣṭhi agrate kahile deba ye śrībatsi
svāmī dvārikā bhmabanaku ẏebe muṁ yāuacchi | 180 |
yujheṣṭhi kahile hari tote lāgai moha cintā
garuḍe boile tu thāa ẏehi parabate
brāhmaṇa rūpa dhariṇa se gale āgasari | 186 |
se brāhmaṇa sandhyā karuacchi gandhabong nadī tīre
brāhmaṇa pachāre tumbhe keuṁṇa bedī dvija
gaura paṇḍā srāhāna kale paśi jaḷe | 189 |
ṣaṭakarmī brāhmaṇa ye karai tāra karma
gobinde boile paṇḍā ẏeta baḍai apūbong
abasante basanta baraṣāre kāhuṁ pāila phaku āmba | 192 |
gobinde boile paṇḍā ẏeta baḍāi apūbong padārtha
apūbong padārtha pāile tāhā bahana kari bhmañji
biḷamba kari rakhile tāhā nohai aprāpata | 197 |
gauramukha boilā muṁ ẏehā neuachai yatane
apūbong padārtha ẏehā debi mānagobinda rājane | 198 |
gobinde boile paṇḍāẏe tumbhanta ke kalā bāi
bhādraba māse cūtaphaḷa prāpata hoiba kāhiṁ | 201 |
dekhibā dekhibā boli tāhāra dhaile karagoṭi
sata nohe paṇḍāẏe māẏā prapañcha heṭi | 203 |
dvijabara boilā pratakṣe aṭai ẏe āmba
māẏā boli jāṇili muṁ debakūṭa ẏehi | 205 |
satya kahante ẏehāṁkara āmba hoẏe jāta | 207 |
gobinde boile dekhi āmbhe kahu sata
āhe paṇḍāẏe āmbhe dekhiluṁ jaḷe pathara upuciāi
br̥ṣa diai kṣīra gāba ṣaṇa(?) hoi
gari śikhare dekhilu padma phuṭiṇa achai | 211 |
padmara bāsanā nāhiṁ nāhiṁ puṣpa teja

lg.note: padmara bāsa nāhiṁ kiṁśuka puṣya teja

lg.l: brāhmaṇa boilā ho mora satya āmbagoṭi kāhiṁ
keṇe harila paṇḍāẏe dekhu dekha nāhiṁ | 218 |
gobinde boile paṇḍāhe nikaḷaṁka tumbha hiẏā
driyodhana sabhākaiṁ yebe tumbhe tāhānta nianta
ẏehimate keṇe yāānta aneka lāja ye pāānta | 220 |
ẏe māẏā prapañcha phaḷa paṇḍāẏe na thāi sarbathā
hiraṇapuṭaka bidyā ẏehā sata nuheṁ mithyā | 221 |
se māẏādhara caraṇe mora praḷamba śatekoṭi | 223 |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa badaẏanti parama sānande | 224 | = 7318
lg.head: {@gokarṇṇa tīrthara māhātmya@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare caḷai dvijabara lajjā abhimāne
dhuśāsana śakuni karṇṇa achanti ye basi
gauramukha brāhmaṇa ẏemantara samaẏe prabeśilā āsi | 2 |
dhuśāsana boilā paṇḍāẏe gala pāṇḍabanta ṭhābakari
paṇḍāẏe boile āmbhe aneka durgama patha galu
āmbhe ẏethuṁ galuṁ jyeṣṭha kr̥ṣṇa pañchamī dinare
tāhānta bheṭilu siṁgha śukaḷa sapatamī dinare | 6 |
mote cihni nuārile pāṇḍaba pñchu bhrāthe | 7 |
gaṇḍā mr̥ga māriṇa ruṣiṁku dianti bhojī
se banaku tretaẏāre śāpya deichanti śrīrāmacandra debe | 13 |
āmbagoṭāẏeka se ye mote dile āṇi
āṇa ho paṇḍāẏe boli bolai dhuśāsana
kareṇa gheniṇa brāhmaṇa boilā bahuta miche
micha kahila he paṇḍāẏe na dekhila pāṇḍabe | 22 |
lāja pāi brāhmaṇa āpaṇā deśa āsi | 23 |

lg.note: pāñchagoṭi phaḷilā ye baḍāi ārambha |–ḍa, ḍha, ja

lg.l: askanda nāma banare thile ye pāṇḍabe
āho caitana yujheṣṭhiṁka saṅgare achanti aṭhāaśi sahasra muni
karanti nānā tīrtha se pāṇḍabanta saṅge gheni | 31 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki boile bābu srāhāna kara ẏethe | 32 |
hāṭakeśvara boli kapiḷāseka rañchile pātāḷa svarge
someka ruṣi sarūpe tapasyā kale pātāḷa gaṅge | 34 |
āho br̥ṣabha māsa śukḷapakṣa tithi ye nabamī dinara
citrā nāmare nakṣatraku se dina bhauma bāra | 85 |
āhārṇṇika sāranti se deba gaṅgājaḷe paśi
gomātā nandinī tahiṁ cari cari āsi | 37 |
carante kuśubiḍi ye khāilā sehu batsā
sabu āhāra kalā se āpaṇāra icchā | 38 |
dekhiṇa jaḷaru hara bāhāra hoile bege
īśvara prahāra karante cchiḍilāka tāra muṇḍa
se gomuṇḍa paḍilā yāiṁ khapara bhitara | 41 |
śūḷa gheni īśvare khaparuṁ tā kāḍhi
se gomuṇḍa tāhāṁkara khaparuṁ na chāḍa | 42 |
gohatyā īśvare kale ye helā mahādoṣa
kehi tāhāṁka badana na chāhiṁle ākāśa | 43 |
brahmāra muṇḍapare se gomuṇḍa yāi lāga
hatyā doṣeṇa hara boile samasta parityāgī | 46 |
aneka tīrtha hara bulile na chāḍilā gomuṇḍa | 47 |

lg.note: gomātā nandinī pāṇi āhāreṇa āsi |–na, cha, kha, ṅa
hatyā doṣe hara tapeṇa anurāgī |–kha, na, ca, cha, ja
lg.l: āho bairocana rājya karuthilā rahi baidhr̥ta deśe
nadī jora khāla nāhiṁ tahiṁra katipāśe | 49 |
śūḷeka gheni bairocana ākāśagaṅgā kūḷaku galā
ākāśuṁ gaṅgā āsuchanti meru mekhaḷī bhedi
sehiṭhāru se rājā śūḷa gheni āṇilāka khoḷi
śateka yojana se tahiṁki aṭai dhūra | 54 |
bailocana āṇilā tā nāma hoilā baitaraṇī | 55 |
bābu baiśampāẏana ruṣiṁkara ẏe aṭai tapasthāna
bahuta agāda gabhīra se nadī nabatāḷa
rāgeṇa jhāsile ẏetheṁ deba ye soḍhaḷa | 57 |
tebe se gomuṇḍa chāḍilā rudradebaṁkara hātha | 58 |
gohatyā bimocana ẏethe āsi kale trilocana
teṇu ẏe mahātīrthara nāma aṭai gokarṇṇa | 59 |

lg.l: bābu gohatyā pātakamāna thāi yebaṇa bongśe
tada doṣa khaṇḍai ẏe mahātīrtha abakāśe | 60 |
ẏe gokarṇṇa tirthe tu kara ho srāhāna | 61 |
ẏethe srāhāna kale sakaḷa pāpa binaśvati | 62 |
gokarṇṇa tīrthe yāiṁ srāhāna se kaẏe | 63 |
